MsgEn: However, it would be wise to obtain the approval of those who have been observing your battle prowess at the temple before continuing as an Alchemist.
MsgJp:
もっとも、その前に神殿で君の戦いぶりを
日頃見ているであろう者から
本当にアルケミストを続けるべきか
同意はもらっておいた方がいい

MsgEn:
If you, as an Alchemist, seek something even greater.
And if those who witness your battles are willing to forgive—
Then, I shall personally guide you.
MsgJp:
君がアルケミストとしてさらなるものを求め
君の戦いぶりを見ている者も許すのであれば――
その時はわたしが直接手ほどきをしよう

MsgEn: Oh, I see— You, as an Arisen, wish to learn the alchemy that the White Dragon once sealed away.
MsgJp:
ほほう――
君は白竜がかつて封じた錬金術を
覚者でありながら、究めようというんだね

MsgEn:
With happiness and uncertainty intermingled--
But if that's what you've chosen,
I will respect your decision.
MsgJp:
嬉しくもあり、危うくもあり――
だが君が選んだのなら
私はその選択を尊重するよ

MsgEn:
Alchemy is, in the first place, the study of using human logic to guide people.
You might be able to coexist with reason, too.
MsgJp:
錬金術とはそもそも、人の論理を用い
人の為に導く学問
理との共存も、君ならできるかもしれないね

MsgEn: Well, based on what you have learned so far, what I will teach you next is the advanced edition. Delve deeper into logic, the essence of attributes and materials, the essence of Elixirs.
MsgJp:
さて、これまで君が学んできたものを基礎とすると
これから私が教えるのは応用編だな
さらに深く論理を知り、属性と物質の
精――エリクシルの本質に迫る

MsgEn: And thus, understanding, transformation, and recombination are the true essence of the Alchemist's order.
MsgJp:
その理解と転化、そして組み換えこそが
《アルケミスト》の理

MsgEn: Now, let's promptly submit the assignment. I hope you can lend a hand in that regard.
MsgJp:
さぁ、さっそく課題を出そう
君がその一端に触れてくれることを願うよ

MsgEn: Hmm, your dedication to studying as an Alchemist is truly remarkable. It seems you have reached a level where you can learn and apply skills extensively.
MsgJp:
ふむ、君のアルケミストとしての研鑽には
目を見張るものがある
十分応用を学べるレベルになっているようだね

MsgEn:
If you are willing to take a step deeper into the path of alchemy, I would love to teach you directly--
but it's hard to decide if I should.
MsgJp:
もしも、君が錬金の道の奥深くへと
歩みを進めようというならば
わたしが直接手ほどきしたいところだが――
そうするべきかどうか、判断が難しい

MsgEn: If those who have witnessed your training and battles at the temple agree, I have no objections.
MsgJp:
神殿で君の訓練や戦いぶりを見てきた者
が賛成するなら、わたしは構わないが

MsgEn: I see, an Arisen, huh?
MsgJp: なるほど、覚者か――

MsgEn: It seems like a situation that doesn't allow for any speculation.
MsgJp: 予断を許さない状況のようだね

MsgEn:
I'm curious about you--
but let's not pry too much into each other's affairs--we're both here for each other.
MsgJp:
君のことは気になるが――
余計な詮索は止めにしておこう――互いにね

MsgEn: If you are alive, you can have such experiences, Ah, indeed life is wonderful.
MsgJp:
生きていればこんな体験ができる
ああ、やはり人生は素晴らしいね

MsgEn: Excessive is as bad as useless.
MsgJp: 過ぎたるは及ばざるがごとし、か

MsgEn:
How did this happen--
I'll reveal it to you one day.
Oh, and of course, I'm looking forward to it!
MsgJp:
なぜ、こうなってしまったのか――
いつか明らかにしてみせよう
ああ、もちろん、楽しみで仕方がないよ

MsgEn:
Since that day - the battle between the Golden Dragon and hours.
This time we have spent, I will unravel it for you.
MsgJp:
あの日――黄金竜と白竜の戦い以来
我々が過ごしてきたこの時間を――
わたしが解き明かしてみせよう

MsgEn: Everyone makes mistakes. It is the courage to correct them that is precious.
MsgJp:
過ちは、誰にでもある
それを正す勇気こそ、尊いのだ

MsgEn: Even if you think you know everything, unexpected events can still happen. It's both exciting and terrifying, isn't it?
MsgJp:
すべてを知りつくしたつもりでも
まだこうして予測不能な出来事が起こる
うれしくもあり――恐ろしくもあり――だね

MsgEn: Ah, Klaus's friend, what's up?
MsgJp: ああ、クラウスの友達か、どうしたんだい？

MsgEn: What the alchemist started, the alchemist will finish.
MsgJp:
錬金術師が始めたことは
錬金術師が終わらせる

MsgEn: That is our Arisen's resolve.
MsgJp: それが我々の覚悟だ

MsgEn: Diamantes is a disgrace to the alchemists.
MsgJp: ディアマンテスは錬金術師の面汚し――

MsgEn: I never thought I'd see the day he'd be defeated. Oh, it's been worth it.
MsgJp:
奴を倒せる日が来ようとは
ああ、堪え忍んだ甲斐があったというものだ

MsgEn:
Please convey my regards to the temple personnel.
Once I am mentally prepared, I would like to go and greet them.
MsgJp:
神殿の連中によろしく伝えてくれ
心の準備ができたら、わたしの方から
挨拶に行きたいと思う

MsgEn: Now, it's better to go home quickly.
MsgJp: さあ、今は早く帰った方がいい

MsgEn: Ah, that story, right? That's fine.
MsgJp:
ああ、その話だな
いいだろう

MsgEn: On principle, I cannot show favoritism, but my most beloved job is, of course, "Fighter."
MsgJp:
立場上、ひいきするわけにはいかないが
私が最も愛するジョブは当然《ファイター》だ

MsgEn: Exposing oneself to the enemy and deftly wielding shield and sword. It's like a dance—.
MsgJp:
己が身を敵前にさらし、盾と剣を巧みに操り
それはまるで舞の如く――

MsgEn:
Opening a breakthrough and infiltrating deep into enemy territory
Disrupting their main force -
Hehe, being able to see the surprised and bewildered faces up close
Is something only a Fighter can do!
MsgJp:
突破口を開いて敵陣深く入り込み
本陣をかく乱する――
ふふ、敵が驚き、呆ける顔を間近で見られるのは
《ファイター》だけだ！

MsgEn: You have also been improving quite a bit and seem to be gaining a sense of being a Fighter.
MsgJp:
おまえもなかなか腕を上げ、《ファイター》と
しての自覚を身に付けつつあるようだな

MsgEn: Alright, I will impose training upon you And thus, polish your skills even more, become a first-class swordsman!
MsgJp:
――よし、私から修練を課してやろう
そして今以上に技を磨き、一流の剣士となれ！

MsgEn: Okay, fine. I'll allow you to call yourself a Fighter.
MsgJp:
よし、いいだろう
《ファイター》を名乗ることを許そう

MsgEn: Well, never mind. I will teach you a new sword technique.
MsgJp:
まぁいい
新たな剣技を教えてやる

MsgEn: If you want to become stronger than you are now, train harder and further hone your skills.
MsgJp:
今以上に強くなりたければ、修練を重ね
さらに技を会得するのだな

MsgEn:
Well, you've really improved your skills, haven't you?
With your current ability, you should be able to use that technique and master it.
MsgJp:
ほう――、かなり腕を上げたようだな
今のおまえなら、あの技も使い
こなせるだろう

MsgEn:
The role of a sword is to slash the opponent.
However, that is only its function as a tool.
It is not the essence of a sword.
MsgJp:
剣の役割とは相手を斬ること
だが、それは道具としての役目であって
剣の本質ではない

敵を削ぎ己を活かす
それこそが本質だ
勝敗、生死は全て、その結果
付いてくるものにすぎない

MsgEn: Remember that in your heart, you should strive to master this technique.
MsgJp: それを心に留め、この技を修得するがいい

MsgEn: As you know, the weapon of a Fighter is a sword and a shield and their own body.
MsgJp:
知っての通り《ファイター》の武器は剣と盾
そして己自身の肉体だ

MsgEn: The greatest role imposed on a Fighter is to defeat enemies, but it's not simply about attacking. Protecting oneself and staying at the forefront can save comrades and ultimately lead to victory.
MsgJp:
敵を討つ、それがファイターに課された最大の
役割だが、ただ攻撃をすればよいというわけではない
自身を守り、先陣に居続けることが仲間を救い
ひいては勝利につながるのだ

MsgEn: Regardless of whether you neglect offense or defense, it means that you cannot be called a first-class Fighter.
MsgJp:
攻守どちらをおろそかにしても、一流のファイター
とは言えないというわけだ

MsgEn:
With cutting with the enemy, the skill comes later.
If you want to be a fighter, first swing your sword and shield until you feel like they are part of your body
and familiarize yourself with them.
MsgJp:
敵と斬り結ぶ中、技術は後からでも付いてくる
ファイターとなるなら、まずは剣と盾が身体の一部と
思えるようになるまで振るい、感覚をなじませろ

MsgEn: I will teach you more when you become a full-fledged Fighter.
MsgJp:
それ以上のことは、おまえが一人前のファイターに
なった頃に教えてやる

MsgEn: The shield is not just for self-defense. Depending on how it is used, it can block the enemy's attacks and serve as a foothold for counterattacks.
MsgJp:
盾は、身を守るだけのものではないぞ
使いようによっては敵の攻撃をいなし
反撃の足掛かりとすることもできる

MsgEn: Just before receiving an attack, determine the moment when the enemy's weight is applied.
MsgJp:
攻撃を受ける直前、敵の体重がかかる
わずかな瞬間を見定めろ

MsgEn:
If you seize that moment, the recoil will be completely returned to the opponent
, and you will be able to disrupt their stance.
MsgJp:
そこを捉えれば反動はそっくり相手に
返り、態勢を崩すことができるだろう

MsgEn:
《Critical Timing》――
It seems that is what they call it.
Remember that.
MsgJp:
《クリティカルタイミング》――
ちまたではそんな呼び方をしているらしい
覚えておくことだ

MsgEn: Oh... Do you want me to teach you a lesson?
MsgJp:
ほう――
私に稽古をつけてもらいたいのか？

MsgEn: Then, let us send you to the past. Oh, Arisen of the White Dragon, may fortune favor you.
MsgJp:
なら少なくとも《ファイター》となり
ジョブレベル１８以上の経験を
積むことだな

MsgEn: After that, I'll think about it if the Training Officer Renton gives the green light. Then we'll talk about it.
MsgJp:
その後、訓練官レンテンの許可が
出たなら考えてやろう
話はそれからだ

MsgEn: Oh—you want me to train you? Well, you certainly look like you're up to snuff.
MsgJp:
あぁ――
私に稽古をつけてもらいたいのか？
なるほど確かに相応の腕になったようだ

MsgEn:
But there's an order to everything.
First, you should at least report to Lenten, the temple trainer,
that you've mastered the basics of the job.
MsgJp:
だが何事にも順序がある
まずは神殿の訓練官レンテンに
ジョブの基本を修めた報告くらいはしてこい

MsgEn:
If you have come to formally seek knowledge,
I shall accompany you in your training.
MsgJp:
正式に教えを請いにきたならば
稽古に付き合ってやろう

MsgEn: You want me to teach you tactics? Then there's no better way to learn than through combat.
MsgJp:
戦術を指南してほしいのか？
ならば実戦に勝る教えはないぞ

MsgEn: We fight in order to win. Do not neglect the effort required for that.
MsgJp:
戦いは勝つためにするのだ
そのための努力、怠るな

MsgEn:
I'm sorry,
but I'm not good at small talk
MsgJp:
すまないな
世間話というものが苦手なんだ

MsgEn: Concentration! Don't let your guard down even in your sleeping quarters!
MsgJp:
集中だ！
戦闘態勢は寝所でも解くな！

MsgEn: What is an Arisen? There may be various thoughts, but I believe I am a warrior.
MsgJp:
覚者とは何か――
いろいろな考えがあるだろうが
自分は、戦人（いくさびと）だと信じている

MsgEn: I'm getting tired after all these battles-- I'd like to relax in Kinoza.
MsgJp:
こう戦闘続きでは疲れもたまるな――
キノザでゆっくりしたいものだ

MsgEn: I will teach you the name of an enemy more frightening than monsters. It is--carelessness, complacency, and negligence.
MsgJp:
魔物より恐ろしい敵の名を教えてやろう
それは――油断、慢心、怠慢だ

MsgEn: How many enemies must I defeat for peace to come to this land? To think such a thing... have I grown old?
MsgJp:
どれほどの敵を倒せば
この地に平穏が訪れるのか――
こんなことを思うとは――老いたか

MsgEn: The secret strategy for victory? If such a thing exists, wars wouldn't happen in the first place.
MsgJp:
勝利の秘策？
そんなものがあるなら、そもそも戦争など起こらない

MsgEn: Before you question the value, shut up and protect unless you want to lose it and regret it.
MsgJp:
価値を問う前に、黙って守れ
失って後悔したくなければな

MsgEn: What? A proposal regarding base defense?
MsgJp: 何？　拠点防衛に関する提案？

MsgEn: Even if you knock the orcs off and drive them out the smell lingers for a while. I can't stand it -- damn it!
MsgJp:
オークどもをぶっ倒し、追いだしても
臭いはしばらく残るんだ
たまらん――くそっ！

MsgEn: Did you come to exterminate the enemy?
MsgJp: 魔物掃除に来たのか？

MsgEn: Then you should at least become a 《Fighter》 and have at least 18 job levels of experience.
MsgJp:
だったら遠慮はいらない
砦の外でひと暴れしてきてくれ

MsgEn: I heard you met Alvar. If that's the case, why don't you finish the contract quickly? You shouldn't be here instead.
MsgJp:
アルヴァーと会ったらしいな
だったら、こんなところにいないで
さっさと契約をすませたらどうだ？

MsgEn: What's the matter? Bored of talking to Leo?
MsgJp:
どうした？
レオの話し相手は退屈か？

MsgEn: In that case, there's no need to hold back. Fight monsters to your heart's content.
MsgJp:
だったら遠慮することはない
思う存分魔物と戦ってくれ

MsgEn: Oh, you've come back again.
MsgJp: おや――また来たのか

MsgEn:
If you say you have free time, there's no need to hold back.
Please defeat all the enemies around here one by one.
I wonder where they're coming from.
MsgJp:
ひまだと言うなら、遠慮はいらない
このあたりの魔物を片っ端から倒してくれ
まったくどこからわいてくるのやら――だな

MsgEn: The behavior patterns of the Orcs have clearly changed. Please also inform Captain Leo and Gerd to stay alert.
MsgJp:
オークどもの行動様式が明らかに変化している
そちらも警戒を怠るなとレオとゲルト団長に
伝えてくれ

MsgEn: Since The Ark appeared, the Orcs seem strange.
MsgJp:
アークとやらが出現してから
オークの様子がおかしい――

MsgEn: Did I misunderstand it -
MsgJp: そう感じたのは自分の勘違いか――

MsgEn: How is the temple?
MsgJp: 神殿の様子はどうだ？

MsgEn: If there are any idle Arisen, please tell them to come and train with me as a practice session.
MsgJp:
ひまそうな覚者がいたら
訓練がてら顔を出すように伝えてくれ

MsgEn: Don't rush like that. First, talk to Leo for guidance.
MsgJp:
そう焦るな
まずはレオ統率と話してからだ

MsgEn: Do you remember what Mogok looked like? What that guy had--what was it?
MsgJp:
モゴックの様子を覚えているか？
あいつが持っていたものは――なんだ？

MsgEn: The Orc has formed an alliance with a creature called Zuhl. The true identity of the discomfort I had been feeling lately seems to be that.
MsgJp:
オークはズールとかいう魔物と手を組んだ
このところ感じていた違和感の正体は
それだったようだ

MsgEn: I didn't mind fighting against stupid orcs every day. Honestly, it made me feel alive.
MsgJp:
わたしはバカなオークと毎日戦っているのが
嫌いじゃなかった
正直、生きている実感があった

MsgEn: However, that Zuhl changed the orcs into a cunning, filthy enemy... There is only hatred left.
MsgJp:
ところがあのズールがオークを変えてしまった
小賢しい――薄汚い魔物め――
もう憎しみしかない

MsgEn: Fighting with hate-- sure is sad, isn't it? But maybe that's the way it's going to be from now on.
MsgJp:
憎しみを抱えながら戦うのは――
きっと悲しいぞ？
だが、これからはそういう時代なのかもな

MsgEn: If you meet Iris, please tell her to show her face once in a while.
MsgJp:
イリスに会ったらたまには顔を出すように
伝えてくれ

MsgEn: Are you not like me?
MsgJp: もしやおまえはわたしと同類ではないのか？

MsgEn:
I prefer the frontline fortress over the tidy temple――
I cherish the dirty armored soldier more than the well-dressed residents of the city――
MsgJp:
小ぎれいな神殿よりも最前線の砦が好き――
着飾った街の住人よりも
薄汚れた鎧カブトの戦士を愛おしく思う――

MsgEn: Then you don't need to hold back. Please go wild outside the fortress.
MsgJp: ならば遠慮せず、いつでもここに来い

MsgEn: I am not Arisen - I am ashamed -
MsgJp: 不覚だ――面目ない――

MsgEn:
But don't fret.
I've already seen the future.
I won't let the orcs have their way anymore.
MsgJp:
しかし、案ずるな
わたしはもう未来を見ている
もうオークの好きにはさせないさ

MsgEn: How's the temple going? I'm thinking of showing up when I'm done rebuilding this place.
MsgJp:
神殿はどうだ？
ここの体制の立て直しが一段落ついたら
顔を出そうと思っているんだ

MsgEn: Rumor has it that the atmosphere of the temple has changed.
MsgJp: うわさでは神殿の雰囲気が変わったのだとか

MsgEn:
It seems filled with a sense of tragedy.
Honestly, I lose my motivation to go.
MsgJp:
悲壮感に満ちているらしいな
正直、行く気が失せる

MsgEn:
I can feel the awakening of the White Dragon even here.
So I also receive Dragon Force at the same time as you.
MsgJp:
ここにいても白竜の目覚めは感じられるんだ
だから、わたしもおまえと同じ時に
竜力を受け取っている

MsgEn:
And think about repaying the favor.
Oh--I think about it all the time!
MsgJp:
そして、その恩に報いることを考える
ああ――いつも考えている

MsgEn: Mysial seems to have come out of the Audience Chamber. It would be good to get them out even more.
MsgJp:
ミシアルが謁見の間から出たらしいな
もっと引っ張り出してやるといい

MsgEn:
――No, it would be impossible to invite her.
――Yeah, it's impossible.
MsgJp:
――いや、誘っても無理か
――うん、無理だな

MsgEn:
This fort, which used to be the front line,
now sees only occasional skirmishes.
MsgJp:
最前線だったこの砦も
今では時折小競り合いが起こる程度だ

MsgEn: A battlefield where the skin stings with a killing intent - Should I search for such a place and embark on a journey? Lately, I've been thinking about such things.
MsgJp:
殺気で肌がヒリヒリ傷むような戦場――
そんな場所を探して旅に出ようか
――最近、そんなことを思うんだ

MsgEn: Do you know where Iris is? It might be better to tell her to hide.
MsgJp:
イリスの行方を知っているか？
身を隠すように言ってやった方が
いいかもしれないぞ？

MsgEn: Hmph――so that's it. As expected of Leo.
MsgJp:
ふん――そうか
さすがレオだ

MsgEn: I heard that the temple is in trouble— Wouldn't it be better for you to come back?
MsgJp:
神殿が大変だと聞いているが――
おまえは戻った方が良くはないか？

MsgEn: I think I'll leave the command here to my subordinates.
MsgJp: ここの指揮は部下に任せようと思う

MsgEn:
Once the handover is complete, I will also go to the temple.
Let's meet there, shall we?
MsgJp:
引き継ぎが終わり次第わたしも神殿へ行く
向こうで会おうではないか

MsgEn: Don't worry about Leo. I'm sure he's doing everything for the best.
MsgJp:
レオのことは心配するな
すべて良かれと思ってしていることだろう

MsgEn: My actions may be foolish, but it has always been this way.
MsgJp: 行動が愚かだが――昔からだ

MsgEn: Damn it―― The enemies around here are getting noisy. I can't seem to get away easily.
MsgJp:
くそっ――
このあたりの魔物が騒がしくなってな
なかなか離れることができないのだ

MsgEn: Here I am --you know what I mean?
MsgJp:
ここにはわたしがいる
――わかるか？

MsgEn: The defense here is strong—That's what I'm talking about. Go ahead and fight to your heart's content.
MsgJp:
ここの守りは堅い――そういうことだ
思う存分、戦ってこい

MsgEn: I rushed over upon hearing the report. Were you at the front line? You've worked hard.
MsgJp:
報せを聞いて駆けつけたぞ
おまえは最前線にいたのだろう？
ご苦労だったな

MsgEn: Tell me your achievements next time. I'll celebrate them with great envy.
MsgJp:
今度手柄話を聞かせてくれ
盛大にうらやましがってやろう

MsgEn: Hmm? You want to be friends with me?
MsgJp:
ん？
俺と仲良くなりたいっての？

MsgEn: Chatting is not on my mind right now—
MsgJp:
世間話ねえ
そんな気分じゃないんだよな――

MsgEn: Hey, if you're free, how about spending some time with me... Oh, you're not? Well, that was rude.
MsgJp:
なああんた、ひまなら俺と――
あ、ひまじゃない？　そりゃ失礼

MsgEn: Living free is not as easy as I thought it would be.
MsgJp:
自由に生きるってのは
思ったほど楽じゃないんだな、これが

MsgEn:
What would you like the world to be like?
I've never really thought about it.
MsgJp:
あんた、この世界がどうなるのが理想？
なーんて、俺も考えたことないけどな

MsgEn: Some say it's a hard time. I'm having a pretty good time.
MsgJp:
苦難の時代だなんて言うやつもいるけど
俺は結構楽しんでるよ

MsgEn:
I'm in trouble, I'm in trouble--
Enemies keep coming one after another.
MsgJp:
まいったまいった――
次から次へと魔物がよぉ

MsgEn: There are people who think of Arisen as a handyman, right?
MsgJp:
覚者のことを便利屋みたいに
思ってる奴、いるよな――

MsgEn: I'm good at just listening, you know-- If that's really okay, then go ahead. Now, speak up!
MsgJp:
俺、聞き流すの得意でさ――
それでもいいなら、どうぞ
――さあ、話せ！

MsgEn: Today is different from yesterday, and tomorrow will be different from today―― The world is made up of such repetitions ―― That's what it means.
MsgJp:
昨日と違う今日、今日と違う明日――
世界はその繰り返しでできてるんだ
――てな

MsgEn:
Once-in-a-lifetime encounter――That's a nice phrase
Me, the product, the client――
Every encounter is like that
MsgJp:
一期一会――いい言葉だね
俺、商品、客――
すべての出会いが、そうなんだな

MsgEn: If you're going to pretend to be an Arisen, be selective about what you wear. How about I pick something for you?
MsgJp:
あんたもいっぱしの覚者を気取るなら
身につけるモノは厳選しなよ
どうだい、ひとつ見繕ってやろうか？

MsgEn: It's amazing how much product is coming and going in these times-- I think we should all be proud!
MsgJp:
こんな時代なのに商品が行き来しているのは
凄いことだ――
俺たち、誇っていいと思うぞ

MsgEn: I'm sure you've got plenty of money. I'll give you a discount. Make a deal with me.
MsgJp:
金なら、余ってるんじゃないのか？
安くするぜ、取引していきなよ

MsgEn: Hey, how are you doing?
MsgJp: よぉ、調子はどうだ？

MsgEn: Wow, you stink. You certainly smell the part, Arisen, but it couldn't hurt to take a bath every now and then.
MsgJp:
その臭い――戦う覚者という感じで
悪くはないが、日常も大切にな

MsgEn: If you have time, it's not a bad idea to run around for the sake of the world and for others. It can even bring you money as well.
MsgJp:
時間があるなら世のため人のために
駆け回るのも悪くないぞ
金にもなるしな

MsgEn:
There are various Arisen.
There are various ways of living.
I think it's a very natural thing.
MsgJp:
いろんな覚者がいる
いろんな生き方がある
とても自然なことだと思うね

MsgEn: Oh, wow—something about you has really changed. It's like you've shed a whole new skin.
MsgJp:
へえ――なんだか見違えたな
一皮むけたってやつだ

MsgEn: If you find something rare, please let me know. Depending on the situation, I might be able to take it off your hands for a high price, you know?
MsgJp:
珍しいものを見つけたら声をかけてくれよな
場合によっては高値で引き取って
やれるかもしれないぜ？

MsgEn: The Ark, no, I give up—But if you look, there might be rare items.
MsgJp:
アークでは、いや、参った――
でも、探せば珍品があったかもな

MsgEn: Did you go far? Maybe you found flowers or materials that aren't found around here.
MsgJp:
遠出したのか？
このあたりにはない花とか素材とか――

MsgEn: You've got nothing to lose, so take it home if you see it.
MsgJp:
損をすることはないから
目についたら持ち帰るといい

MsgEn: Even if you fight, it's in vain―― even if you make money, it's in vain―― But the life of the Arisen continues no matter what―― You have to enjoy it, or else it's a loss, you know?
MsgJp:
戦っても空しい――金を儲けても空しい――
だが、どんな時でも続く覚者人生――
楽しまなくちゃ損だぜ？

MsgEn: I am a lucky person to have friends who worry about me. - As long as Iris doesn't forget that, nothing will go wrong.
MsgJp:
心配してくれる友達がいるなんて幸せ者だ
――イリスがそれを忘れていなければ
何も問題は起こらないさ

MsgEn: How is the situation in the Audience Chamber? I'm going to keep my distance for a while.
MsgJp:
謁見の間の様子はどうだ？
俺はしばらく距離を置くことにするよ

MsgEn: I hear great things are about to begin. Let's climb the grand staircase for the first time in a while—
MsgJp:
凄いことが始まるらしいな
ひさしぶりに大階段を登ろうか――

MsgEn: Being an Arisen is not just about fighting-- However, the momentum for battle has never been higher--
MsgJp:
戦うだけが覚者じゃない――
とはいえ、かつてないほど戦いの機運が
盛りあがっている――

MsgEn: I'm not sure what position I should take.
MsgJp: どんな立ち位置をとるべきか――悩むね

MsgEn: I don't see Iris around, do you know anything?
MsgJp: イリスの顔を見ないけど何か知ってるか？

MsgEn: I heard about Iris. She is a friend, but - -
MsgJp:
イリスのことは聞いた
友達ではあるが――

MsgEn: It'd be best to leave it to Leo, who has a long history with her.
MsgJp:
彼女との付き合いが長い
レオに任せるのが一番だな

MsgEn:
When unprecedented events continue to occur, I cannot concentrate on anything.
I am lacking in self-discipline!
MsgJp:
これまでになかったことが立て続けに起こると
何に対しても集中できなくなる
我ながら修行が足りないぜ

MsgEn: The knowledge that long-lived Elves possess is invaluable.
MsgJp: 長命のエルフが持つ知識は値千金――

MsgEn:
What a pity.
I wanted to get along with you, no gain or loss.
MsgJp:
なんてな
損得抜きで、仲良くしたかった

MsgEn: If the white dragon had been healthy, I wouldn't have been an Arisen. Even if the elf had died— I wouldn't have cared.
MsgJp:
白竜が元気だったら、俺は覚者じゃなかった
たとえエルフが死のうが――
なんとも思わなかっただろう

MsgEn: Life's encounters are strange, aren't they?
MsgJp: ――人生の巡り合わせは不思議だよな

MsgEn: A new Ark... It would be nice to personally investigate once the heat dies down.
MsgJp:
新たなアーク――
ほとぼりがさめたら個人的に調査もいいな

MsgEn: I saw it-- How does it feel to walk with a priestess?
MsgJp:
見たぞ――
巫女と歩くなんてどんな気分だ？

MsgEn: The Arisen has to take care of the Arisen's business.
MsgJp: 覚者のことは覚者が始末をつける――

MsgEn: It's an old habit. Let's just be prepared.
MsgJp:
昔からの習慣だ
覚悟だけはしておこう

MsgEn: I'll be here for a while, as I don't have any weapons to aim at comrades.
MsgJp:
しばらくここにいる
同志に向ける武器は持っていないからな

MsgEn: There are no weapons for comrades-in-arms -
MsgJp: 同志に向ける武器はない――

MsgEn: You can't be so naive. Damn!
MsgJp:
甘いことを言っている場合じゃないのか
くそっ！

MsgEn: What's going on in the audience chamber?
MsgJp: 《謁見の間》はどんな様子だ？

MsgEn: Surely - No, let's leave it. Even if my imagination was correct, it wouldn't make me happy.
MsgJp:
さぞ――いや、やめておこう
想像が当たったところでうれしくもなんともない

MsgEn: Everyone seems to be preoccupied with the expedition. How can we be assured of the safety of this place?
MsgJp:
みんな遠征に夢中になっているようだが
ここの安全が保証されたわけではあるまい？

MsgEn: So, although it may not be the most appropriate way to say it—Leave it to me.
MsgJp:
というわけで、こんな言い方はらしくないが――
俺に任せてくれ

MsgEn: How's it going in Mergoda? You may be busy fighting the battle, but don't miss the gems and curiosities, okay?
MsgJp:
メルゴダの様子はどうなんだ？
戦いで忙しいかもしれないが
逸品珍品を見逃すなよ？

MsgEn: In the end, this was a battle with the past, so to speak―― No, because it has been continuing for a long time, it has not become the past yet――
MsgJp:
結局これは過去との戦いだったというわけか――
いや、ずっと続いていたわけだから
まだ過去にはなっていない――

MsgEn: It's troublesome... It would be good for you to make a thing of the past with your own hands.
MsgJp:
面倒だな――おまえの手で
過去にしてやるといい

MsgEn: You must have heard it said everywhere by now. But let me say it too.
MsgJp:
あちこちで言われて聞き飽きただろうが
俺からも言わせてくれ

MsgEn: You've grown strong—even dignified. Now, you have a report to give, don't you? Get it over with and tell me about your souvenirs.
MsgJp:
逞しくなったな――貫禄すら漂うよ
さあ、報告があるんだろう？
早くすませて土産話を聞かせてくれ

MsgEn: Let me drink—
MsgJp: 呑ませてくれ――

MsgEn: Right now, I'm drinking - drinking - I'll properly do it starting from tomorrow.
MsgJp:
今は呑んで――呑んで――
明日からちゃんとするからさ

MsgEn: B-Blood Orb... I have to find it...
MsgJp: ブ、ブラッドオーブ――探さなくちゃ――

MsgEn: I will do what I can here for the Arisen who fell with the White Dragon.
MsgJp:
俺はここで白竜様と倒れた覚者のために
やれることをやるよ

MsgEn: I entrust you with the Black Knight.
MsgJp: あんたたち、黒騎士を頼むぞ

MsgEn: For a moment, I thought I was done for. If things had stayed that way -
MsgJp:
一時はどうなることかと思ったよ
もしあのまま――

MsgEn: - Never mind! Just think about the fun parts.
MsgJp:
――やーめた！　楽しいことだけ
考えるわ

MsgEn:
Phew - being an Arisen is tough, but
we both just have to do our best.
MsgJp:
ふう――覚者でいることは大変だけど
お互い、がんばりましょう

MsgEn: I want to go far away. To a place no one has ever been before.
MsgJp:
遠くへ行きたいのよ
誰も行ったことがない地へね

MsgEn: I'm told that I don't seem like an Arisen, but... I still understand, you know.
MsgJp:
覚者っぽくないって言われるけど――
やっぱり、わかっちゃうよね

MsgEn: A person who only seeks constant battles just because they are an Arisen, honestly, I think that's questionable.
MsgJp:
覚者だからって戦いばかりの人は
正直、どうかと思うな

MsgEn: I want to see the beautiful scenery throughout Lestania, but those kinds of places tend to attract enemies.
MsgJp:
レスタニア中のきれいな風景を見たいけど
そういう場所は魔物が集まりがちだよね

MsgEn:
If you defeat the enemy,
the White Dragon will praise you every time--
If that's the case, don't you think it's rewarding?
MsgJp:
魔物を倒したら
白竜様が毎回ほめてくれる――
そんなのだったら、やりがいあると思わない？

MsgEn: Hello. Well, where shall we go today?
MsgJp:
ごきげんよう
さあ、今日はどこへ行こうかな

MsgEn: Being Arisen -- it's lonely, isn't it? I miss the time when I was just a normal person. -- Just kidding!
MsgJp:
覚者って――孤独よね
普通の人だった頃が懐かしい
――なんてね

MsgEn: The feelings of an Arisen can only be understood by another Arisen, or so I thought... But even among Arisen, there are many things we don't understand.
MsgJp:
覚者の気持ちは覚者にしかわからない
そう思っていたけど――
覚者同士でもわからないこと多いよね

MsgEn: In reality, there should only be one Arisen in the world Have you ever heard such a story? If so... what will happen from now on?
MsgJp:
本当なら覚者は世界にひとりしか存在しない
そんな話を聞いたことがあるの
だったら――これからどうなるんだろうな

MsgEn: Captain, look at these arm and leg muscles! Don't you think they look so cool and shapely?
MsgJp:
隊長、見てこの腕と足の筋肉！
シュッとして、かっこいいと思わない？

MsgEn: Lately, I've been getting a lot of attention and being approached a lot. Does that mean I've become quite a renowned Arisen?!
MsgJp:
最近、やたらと声をかけられるんだけど――
わたしも結構名の売れた覚者になったってこと！？

MsgEn: For example, someone like Vanessa, isn't she an ideal type both as an Arisen and as a woman?
MsgJp:
例えば、ヴァネッサなんて
覚者としても女性としてもひとつの理想型でしょ？

MsgEn: So, I intentionally won't aim for that.
MsgJp: だからわたしは、あえてそこは目指さないの

MsgEn: I used to feel regret about becoming an Arisen, but...
MsgJp: 覚者になったことを嘆く気持ちが前はあったけど――

MsgEn: It feels like my calling from heaven now. Well, it's not really a job though.
MsgJp:
今は天職って感じ
ま、仕事じゃないけどね

MsgEn: Oh, good day.
MsgJp: あら、ごきげんよう

MsgEn: I can't believe that we can be in the heart of the temple all at once like this. Thank you Joseph!
MsgJp:
こうして一気に神殿の中枢に食い込めるなんて
ジョゼフ様々！

MsgEn: I'll do my best, captain, and you'll patronize me, right?
MsgJp: 精一杯頑張るから、隊長、ひいきしてよね？

MsgEn: Everyone seems to be obsessed with Cecily, Cecily.
MsgJp:
みんなセシリーセシリーって
どうかしちゃったみたい

MsgEn: Well, I can understand their feelings. I also want to do something to help.
MsgJp:
まあ、気持ちはわかるけどね
わたしだって、なんとかしてあげたいもの

MsgEn: Sometimes you have to say it strongly. You're not a customer anymore, you're a friend. What doesn't work doesn't work.
MsgJp:
時には強く言わないとね
もうお客さんじゃなくて、仲間なんだから
ダメなものはダメ

MsgEn: Ah, it's about Cecily.
MsgJp: あ、セシリーの話ね

MsgEn: Elliot is all fired up, but I won't lose either. The number of victories in defeating the corrupt is mine!
MsgJp:
エリオットの奴、張り切っちゃって
わたしだって負けないから
侵食魔討伐数勝負はわたしのもの！

MsgEn: It seems like everyone has calmed down. Is it okay?
MsgJp:
なんだかみんな落ち着いちゃってさ
いいのかな

MsgEn: The Black Knight is a formidable opponent, huh? I don't think you can win by fighting blindly.
MsgJp:
黒騎士は難敵だよね――
闇雲に戦っても勝てないだろうなぁ

MsgEn: Loeg seems to find it fascinating and irresistible that we take care of him and go all out for his treatment.
MsgJp:
ロイグは、わたしたちが看病したり
治療のために奔走するのが不思議で
たまらないみたい

MsgEn: He's not accustomed to people's goodwill.
MsgJp: 人の善意に馴れていないんだね

MsgEn:
Maybe I'll just specialize in fighting
and keep my skills sharp and stay out of the way
I'll just fight.
MsgJp:
もうさ、わたしは戦うの専門でいいかも
腕を磨いて、口出ししないで
ひたすら戦うよ

MsgEn: Loeg was brave when the Black Knight came. It made me reassess him.
MsgJp:
黒騎士が来た時、ロイグは勇敢だったよね
見直しちゃったな

MsgEn: I believe in Leo-- Yeah, I believe in that guy! --I'm just saying to myself.
MsgJp:
レオを信じる――
うん、わたしはあの人を信じる！
――って、自分に言い聞かせているところ

MsgEn: Captain, I don't know, I'm just going to have to do it!
MsgJp: 隊長、なんだかさ、もう、やるしかないよね！

MsgEn: Leo is still thinking about us. He protected us.
MsgJp:
レオはやっぱりわたしたちのことを考えていて
くれたんだよね

MsgEn: No, it's different after all. Leo protected the future of Lestania, right?
MsgJp:
ううん、やっぱり違う
レオが守ったのは
レスタニア全体の未来だよね？

MsgEn: Captain, hey, expedition? Survey? Walk? Anything is fine, let's go.
MsgJp:
隊長、ほら、遠征？　調査？　散歩？
なんでもいいから、行こうよ

MsgEn: Captain, how was Lestania? If everything is okay, why don't we just focus on the mission over here?
MsgJp:
隊長、レスタニアはどうだった？
問題がないなら、こっちでの任務に専念しない？

MsgEn:
This Phindym, it's simple--
No, it's more like primitive, Not refined--
MsgJp:
このフィンダムって、単純――
ううん、原始的っていうか
洗練されてないっていうか――

MsgEn:
No, it's not - ah, rustic!
I don't mind the simplicity.
MsgJp:
ちがうな――ああ、素朴！
この素朴さ、わたしは嫌いじゃないな

MsgEn: We're kind of behind the curve...
MsgJp:
わたしたち、後手後手というか――
遅れちゃってるよね

MsgEn: Hey captain, hurry up and take the lead in the situation!
MsgJp:
ねえ、隊長
急いで、事態の先頭に立とうよ

MsgEn: The culprit who took away《Primeval Drops》doesn't care what happens to Phindym after all— I still can't understand their feelings no matter how much I think.
MsgJp:
《原始の雫》を持ち去った犯人は
フィンダムがどうなっても構わない――
やっぱり、幾ら考えても気持がわからないな

MsgEn: Loeg's actions are unforgivable, but—
MsgJp: ロイグのしたことは許せないけど――

MsgEn: I don't hate. I just wonder how the people of Phindym are going to judge me.
MsgJp:
わたしは憎めないな
フィンダムの人たちはどう裁くつもりなんだろう

MsgEn: I feel like— Cecily has become a very distant person.
MsgJp:
なんかさ――
セシリーが、すごく遠い人になっちゃった気がする

MsgEn: But well, I guess there's no helping it. Because this is her world, you know.
MsgJp:
でもまあ、仕方ないか
ここはあの子の世界だからね

MsgEn: Because it's battle after battle-- I guess I'm really tired now.
MsgJp:
連戦連戦だからね――
さすがに疲れちゃったかな

MsgEn: Do you want to go fight the corrupted monsters? Oh, you shouldn't fight like this, you'll get injured.
MsgJp:
侵食魔退治でも行く？
あー、こんな気持で戦っちゃ
絶対怪我するよね

MsgEn: Cecily, you're still the same as usual. I wonder how you feel--
MsgJp:
セシリー、普段と変わらないね
どんな気持ちなのかな――

MsgEn: Sometimes the cave's shining softly, as if it's a prelude to something starting.
MsgJp:
洞が時々、ふわっと輝くの
まるで何かが始まる予兆みたい

MsgEn: Alright Captain, I'll go with you wherever you go.
MsgJp:
さあ隊長
どこへでも一緒に行くからね

MsgEn: What's the difference between someone who gets swallowed up in a hopeless situation and someone who moves forward?
MsgJp:
絶望的な状況に呑み込まれてしまう人と
前を向いて進む人の違いって
なんだろうね？

MsgEn: The Liberation Army has brightened up. It's the General Meirova effect.
MsgJp:
解放軍が明るくなったね
メイロワ将軍効果だね

MsgEn: The prince became a bandit in body and soul... It's not true, right?
MsgJp:
王子は身も心も盗賊に染まってしまった――
なんてことはないよね？

MsgEn: I wonder if the prince is safe. I'd rather know if he's safe than where he is.
MsgJp:
王子は無事なのかな
居場所よりも安否の確認が先だよね

MsgEn: The prince's goal is to save his benefactor, the bandit Bertha. We must cherish that sentiment.
MsgJp:
王子の目的は恩人の盗賊ベルタを救うこと
その気持ちは大切にしないとね

MsgEn: Prince Nedo, I feel like I want to protect you. Is this what it's like to have a little brother?
MsgJp:
ネド王子、守ってあげたくなっちゃう
小さな弟がいるのってこんな気分？

MsgEn: Prince Nedo seems to think that it is his duty to encourage the soldiers on the front line.
MsgJp:
ネド王子は前線に立って兵たちを
鼓舞するのが自分の責務だと
考えているみたい

MsgEn: The air feels polluted, doesn't it? Maybe it's because the stench of Orc attacks is lingering in the air.
MsgJp:
空気が汚れた感じがするよね
オークの攻撃臭が漂ってくるからかな

MsgEn:
Prince Nedo, your face looks so chipper;
I hope you're not forcing yourself.
MsgJp:
ネド王子、顔がいきいきしてるよ
無理してなければいいけど

MsgEn: Waiting is tough.
MsgJp: 待機はつらいなぁ

MsgEn: Waiting is tough.
MsgJp: 待機はつらいなぁ

MsgEn: When I'm with Gurdolin and Elliot, I somehow get anxious.
MsgJp:
ガルドリンやエリオットと一緒だと
なんだか焦っちゃうんだよね

MsgEn: Those people are too aggressive during combat, so it throws off my rhythm.
MsgJp:
あの人たち戦闘中はガツガツするから
調子を乱されちゃうんだ

MsgEn: Now that Prince Nedo's thanked me personally, I feel like I need to redouble my efforts just for him.
MsgJp:
ネド王子にお礼を言われると
うん、お姉ちゃんもっと頑張るよって
気になるんだよね

MsgEn: I feel like a big sister now.
MsgJp: すっかりお姉ちゃん気分

MsgEn: There are various things that I am concerned about, but first, I have to accomplish the objective of the Liberation Army.
MsgJp:
気になることはいろいろあるけれど
先に解放軍の目的を果たさなくちゃね

MsgEn: I also talked to Elliot. Now let's focus on the enemies in the Royal Capital.
MsgJp:
エリオットとも話したんだ
今は王都の敵に集中しようってね

MsgEn: Captain - I - no, it's nothing.
MsgJp: 隊長――わたし――ううん、なんでもない

MsgEn: It's okay... It's okay.
MsgJp: だいじょうぶ――だいじょうぶだよ

MsgEn: Captain - I won't forgive him.
MsgJp: 隊長――わたし、あいつのこと許さないから

MsgEn: I caused you trouble, didn't I? I will make it up to you!
MsgJp:
迷惑かけちゃったよね
この埋め合わせはするから！

MsgEn: Haa ―― I wish they would believe in us more, you know
MsgJp:
はぁ――もっとわたしたちを
信じてほしいよねえ

MsgEn:
If I were to meet Prince Nedo again,
I might give him a little sermon.
MsgJp:
ネド王子と再会したら
わたし、ちょっとお説教しちゃうかも？

MsgEn: I'm worried about the prince, but if we leave it to General Meirova and the others, it should be fine, right?
MsgJp:
王子のことは心配だけど
メイロワ将軍たちに任せておけば
大丈夫だよね

MsgEn: Elliot, come on, you say it's okay too much! You're making me nervous.
MsgJp:
エリオットさあ、大丈夫大丈夫って言い過ぎ！
その方が気になっちゃうじゃない

MsgEn: Prince Nedo will become a dragon someday.
MsgJp: ネド王子はいつか竜になるんだよね

MsgEn: I wonder what it feels like. How is it different from Cecily?
MsgJp:
どんな感じなのかな
セシリーとは違うのかな

MsgEn: Please tell me something.
MsgJp: なにかお話ししてくださいな

MsgEn: How are you feeling?
MsgJp: うふふ――ご機嫌いかがですか？

MsgEn: Uncle Joseph will scold you for talking in private.
MsgJp: 内緒話は、ジョゼフおじさまに叱られます

MsgEn: Have the Arisen ever thought about it? How was this world made?
MsgJp:
覚者様は考えたことがありますか？
この世界がどうやって出来たのか――

MsgEn:
Only the White Dragon knows everything in this world--
I want to hear the story quickly.
MsgJp:
白竜だけがこの世界の
すべてを知っている――
早くお話しを聞きたいですね

MsgEn: What does it feel like to become an Arisen?
MsgJp: 覚者になるって、どんな気分ですか？

MsgEn: War exists in any era, huh? Even though there should be more people who hate it.
MsgJp:
戦争って、どんな時代にもありますね
嫌いな人の方が多いはずなのに

MsgEn:
If we all sing a song together, there will be no more fighting--
Pamela says so.
I bet it's not that easy!
MsgJp:
みんなでお歌をうたえば戦いがなくなる――
パメラがそう言うんだけど
きっと、そんなに簡単ではないですよね

MsgEn:
Sometimes I feel sad for no reason.
No, I mean, I have my reasons, but...
I talk about it, and no one ever comes back.
MsgJp:
時々、わけもなく悲しくなるの
ううん――わけはあるけど――
話しても誰も戻ってこないから

MsgEn: Both the White Dragon and humans, as well as the Arisen, and even enemies, all live in the same way.
MsgJp:
白竜も、人間も、覚者も――魔物だって
同じように生きているんだよね

MsgEn:
Friends are things that eventually disappear ――
But still, you can't help but want them.
MsgJp:
お友達はいつかいなくなるもの――
それでも、ほしいと思ってしまうの

MsgEn: I wonder, this wind—Is it blowing in that forest, too?
MsgJp: この風――あの森にも、吹いているのかな

MsgEn: Those who proceed straight ahead tend to forget important things. Arisen one, be cautious.
MsgJp:
真っ直ぐに進む人は
大切なことを忘れがちです
覚者さん、気をつけてね

MsgEn: Time is-- harsh.
MsgJp: 時は――少し、意地悪です

MsgEn: Oh? What should we play? Draw? A story?
MsgJp: あれ？　何して遊ぶ？　え？　お話し？

MsgEn: Hello, I'm Mayleaf
MsgJp: こんにちは、メイリーフです

MsgEn:
Oh, you remember me?
If so, I'm glad!
MsgJp:
あ、覚えていてくれましたか？
だとしたら、うれしいです！

MsgEn: Hey, I'm sorry for causing you trouble, but let's get along, okay?
MsgJp:
あのね――迷惑かけちゃったけど
仲良くしてね？

MsgEn: I'm good friends with Iris, so I'm glad she's back.
MsgJp:
わたしはイリスとも仲良しなんだ
だから、イリスが戻ってわたしもうれしいの

MsgEn: Leo had a scary look on his face— I was a little surprised.
MsgJp:
レオが恐い顔をしていたの――
ちょっとびっくりしちゃった

MsgEn: Who, don't bully—Peco— I won't do bad things.
MsgJp: 白竜様、元気になーれ！

MsgEn: I will never leave the Temple alone again!
MsgJp:
わたしはもう絶対にひとりでは神殿から
出ないからね

MsgEn: To both you and Pamela and Master Joseph, I apologize for causing you worry...
MsgJp:
あなたにもパメラにもジョゼフ様にも
心配をかけちゃって――

MsgEn: So from now on, I'll be sure to go out with someone—of course, someone we all know—and—
MsgJp:
だからこれからは、必ず、誰かと一緒に――
もちろん、みんなが知ってる誰かと一緒に
お出かけすることにして――

MsgEn: And I promise that I won't go to places I don't know!
MsgJp:
しかも、知らない場所へは行かないって
約束するよ！

MsgEn:
Kieshildt--you're safe, right?
You're going to escape, aren't you?
MsgJp:
キースヒルト――無事だよね？
ちゃんと逃げるよね？

MsgEn: Please take care of Kieshildt.
MsgJp: キースヒルト兄様をお願いします

MsgEn:
――This is painful. 
How can it be this painful――
MsgJp:
――つらいよ
こんなにつらいなんて――

MsgEn:
Is it my fault--
Was I wrong--?
MsgJp:
わたしのせいなのかな――
わたしが悪かったのかな――

MsgEn: I'm going to live on, for Kieshildt.
MsgJp:
わたしはこれからキースヒルトのぶんまで
生きるから――

MsgEn: No, for all those who have died. I'm going to live - I've decided.
MsgJp:
ううん、死んでしまった人、全員のぶん
わたしは生きるの――そう決めたの

MsgEn: Don't go anywhere. I don't want anyone to disappear.
MsgJp:
どこにも行かないで？
誰にもいなくなってほしくないの

MsgEn: Mysial, is it true that you walked around this area? Why didn't you come visit me?
MsgJp:
ミシアルとこのあたりを歩いたって本当？
どうしてうちに寄ってくれなかったの！？

MsgEn: I feel like something scary is about to happen—
MsgJp:
何か怖いことが起こりそうな――
そんな気がするよ？

MsgEn: The air is tingling - This is the sign of something bad -
MsgJp:
空気がビリビリ震えているの――
これは良くないことのシルシなの――

MsgEn: Hey, where is Iris?
MsgJp: ねえねえ、イリスはどこにいるの？

MsgEn: Why won't you tell me? Is it because everyone is angry with you for taking me far away?
MsgJp:
わたしを遠くに連れ出したことで
みんな怒っているから教えてくれないの？

MsgEn:
What should I do―― Mysial――
But, please―― Do not make Iris angry!
MsgJp:
どうしよう――ミシアルが――
でも、お願い――イリスを怒らないで！

MsgEn:
I'll become friends with the White Dragon like Mysial.
I hope you support me――okay?
MsgJp:
ミシアルみたいに白竜と仲良くなるよ
応援して――ね？

MsgEn:
I might not be good enough,
but please support me anyway.
MsgJp:
わたしじゃダメかもしれないけど
それでも応援してね

MsgEn:
Are you all leaving?
You'll come back, won't you?
MsgJp:
みんな行っちゃうの？
ちゃんと帰ってきてね？

MsgEn: I don't want everyone to disappear already.
MsgJp: もう、誰もいなくなったら、いやだよ？

MsgEn: I'm praying to the White Dragon to help me--
MsgJp:
力を貸してください――って
白竜様にお祈りしてるの

MsgEn: But they still won't wake up at all.
MsgJp: でも、全然起きてくれないの

MsgEn: Do your best! Do your best!
MsgJp:
がんばれ！
がんばれっ！

MsgEn: Welcome back! Um, as for me... um...
MsgJp:
おかえりなさい！
ええと、わたしね――ええと――

MsgEn: Oh, I'm sorry. It's not me, but The White Dragon first, right?
MsgJp:
あ、ごめんなさい
わたしじゃなくて、まず、白竜様だよね？

MsgEn: I hope The White Dragon gets well soon.
MsgJp: 白竜様も、早く元気になるといいね

MsgEn: Where did The Black Knight go? It's scary not knowing their whereabouts!
MsgJp:
黒騎士はどこへ行ったの？
行方がわからないなんてこわい！

MsgEn: Lise, I don't think he can hear me anymore—
MsgJp: リズ、もう聞こえていないみたい――

MsgEn: Captain, be careful.
MsgJp: 隊長さん、気をつけてね

MsgEn: Is it all finished?
MsgJp: 全部終わったんだよね？

MsgEn: Scary and sad things won't happen anymore, right?
MsgJp:
こわいことや悲しいことは
もう起こらないんだよね？

MsgEn:
Now is the time to prepare for battle.
We'll talk about it another time.
MsgJp:
いまは戦いに備える時
語り合うのは、またの機会だ

MsgEn: Arisen - the one who holds the power of The White Dragon.
MsgJp: 覚者――白竜の力を預かる者か

MsgEn:
――? Ah, excuse me.
Just thinking about something for a moment, hmm.
MsgJp:
――？　ああ、失礼
考え事を少々、ね

MsgEn:
Come to think of it, I didn't have many conversations with the Arisen—
Shall we talk in detail next time?
MsgJp:
そういうえば覚者と話したことは
あまりなかったな――
今度ゆっくり話そうか

MsgEn: There are so many things I want to ask. That's the kind of expression you have.
MsgJp:
聞きたいことが山ほどある
そんな顔だね

MsgEn:
How do I look?
Do I look like I'm enjoying life?
MsgJp:
僕はどんなふうに見えるんだい？
生を楽しんでいるように見えるかい？

MsgEn: I hadn't noticed— you have a good eye.
MsgJp:
気づかなかったが――
きみはいい目をしているな

MsgEn: Remember, insignificant—nothing—such things actually mean a great deal. It's a great joy to realize that, you know?
MsgJp:
覚えていてほしい
取るに足りない――なんでもない――
そういうことが実は大きな意味を持っている
それに気づくのはね、大いなる喜びだよ

MsgEn: I really think the world is, you know, complicated black and white, good and evil-- there's no such simple division.
MsgJp:
つくづく思うよ
世界はね、複雑なんだ
白と黒、善と悪――
そんな単純な区分けはできないのさ

MsgEn: Humans are interesting but sometimes, they are too difficult to understand.
MsgJp:
人間は興味深いけど
時に、難解すぎる存在だよ

MsgEn: The power of belief is very important. I believe in it too. The place I should return to - the safety of my comrades.
MsgJp:
信じる力はとても大切だ
僕も信じているんだ
帰るべき場所――仲間の無事をね

MsgEn: I like mornings, because it reminds me of the scent of that wind when I was a child.
MsgJp:
朝が好きなんだ
幼いころに感じた、あの風の匂いがするからね

MsgEn: Ah, it's you.
MsgJp: ああ、君か

MsgEn: Do you want to hurry up and die, you brat?
MsgJp: 死に急ぐか、若造が

MsgEn: No mercy, just death.
MsgJp: 慈悲などやらん、死ね

MsgEn: I'm tired of these puppets already.
MsgJp: 木偶どもにはもう飽きたわ

MsgEn: I don't understand— you don't stand a chance.
MsgJp:
わからんな――
お前に勝ち目などない

MsgEn: In the midst of the killing, You make me laugh.
MsgJp:
殺し合いの最中に――
笑わせてくれるわ

MsgEn: Go home... or I'll kill you. I don't like you.
MsgJp:
帰れ――殺すぞ？
おまえは好かん

MsgEn: If you still dare to thrust your shield――then allow me to give you death
MsgJp: まだ盾突くか――ならば、死をくれてやる

MsgEn: Kill, just kill. That's how the world works.
MsgJp:
殺す、ただ殺す
それが世界だ

MsgEn:
You may have noticed, but...
Your deaths will not be in vain.
Hahaha!
MsgJp:
気づいているだろうが――
おまえらの死は無駄にはならん
ふははは！

MsgEn: Give me that life. Come on, give it to me!
MsgJp:
その命、よこせ
さあ、よこせ！

MsgEn: You fool, know your place.
MsgJp: ほう――身の程知らずめ

MsgEn: What's that? You got a better offer?
MsgJp: なんだ？　うまい話でもあるのか？

MsgEn: Talking to me? Gahahahaha, you make me laugh!
MsgJp:
オマイと話だと？
ガハハハ、笑わせる！

MsgEn: I'd love to play, but see ya.
MsgJp: 遊びたいが、またな

MsgEn: You want to become friends with me? Not bad, but well, I'll pass.
MsgJp:
俺サマとトモダチになろうってか？
悪くないな、でも、まあヤメとくよ

MsgEn: You, are you strong? Shall I test you a little?
MsgJp:
オマイ、強いんだろ？
ちょいと、試してやろうか？

MsgEn: I'll destroy all of you at once!
MsgJp: オマイら、まとめてブッ壊すからな

MsgEn:
What?　You said you wanted to do this?
I like to keep my pleasures a secret.
MsgJp:
あ？　目的だと？
楽しみは秘密にする主義でな

MsgEn:
When you want to go wild, just go wild.
That's what life is all about.
MsgJp:
暴れたいトキに暴れる
それが人生ってヤツだ

MsgEn:
Boring.
Are there only weak people around here?
MsgJp:
つまんねえな
ここいらにゃ、弱いヤツらしかいねえのか

MsgEn: Doing that, it becomes like this! Gufu, gufufufufu!
MsgJp:
アレを、アレして――こうなる！
グフ、グフフフフフ！

MsgEn: What is it - you, what is it!
MsgJp: なんだよ――オマイ、なんだよ！

MsgEn: I feel the Dragon Force circulating around— After all, it's a pleasant sensation.
MsgJp:
巡る竜力を感じます――
やっぱり、心地良いものですね

MsgEn: I was thinking about The Black Knight...
MsgJp: 黒騎士のことを考えていました――

MsgEn: Despite my appearance, I am prepared to fight rather well. If necessary, I am willing to do whatever it takes.
MsgJp:
こう見えて、結構戦えるつもりです
必要とあればなんなりと

MsgEn: Everyone's way of fighting is very refined, isn't it? I will learn from it.
MsgJp:
みなさんの戦い方はとても洗練されていますね
勉強させてもらいます

MsgEn: It's an honor to be here with you all.
MsgJp: みなさんとご一緒できて光栄です

MsgEn: Yes, I will return the favor someday.
MsgJp: ご恩はいつかお返しさせていただきます

MsgEn: Arisen are respected because of everyone's wonderful daily conduct, aren't they?
MsgJp:
覚者が一目置かれるのは
みなさんの普段の行いが素晴らしいからですよね

MsgEn: Are you tired?
MsgJp: お疲れじゃないですか？

MsgEn: It's strange for someone like me who is causing trouble to say it, but please take occasional rests.
MsgJp:
面倒をかけているわたしが言うのも変ですけど――
時々休んでくださいね

MsgEn: Yes, what is it?
MsgJp: はい、なんでしょう

MsgEn: I really can't thank you enough for everything you've done for me.
MsgJp:
本当に何から何までお世話になってしまって
お礼の言葉もありません

MsgEn:
Let me know if there is anything I can do for you.
I'm sure I can be of some help on the battlefield.
MsgJp:
わたしにできることがあれば言ってください
戦場でも少しはお役に立てると思います

MsgEn: I understand I'm a little bit - no, I'm quite anxious.
MsgJp:
わかっています
少し――いいえ、かなり焦っています

MsgEn: It pains me to cause you any more trouble.
MsgJp:
これ以上、ご迷惑をおかけするのが
心苦しくって――

MsgEn:
Loeg ――
That person knew me.
But I ――
No matter how much I search my memory, Loeg does not appear.
MsgJp:
ロイグ――
あの人はわたしを知っていましたけど
わたしは――
いくら記憶を探ってもロイグが登場しません

MsgEn: Is he such a distant person to me - If I could see him again - If I could talk to him -
MsgJp:
それほど交わりの薄い人なのでしょうか――
もう一度会えれば――話せれば――

MsgEn: It's strange and I feel uneasy and anxious, but.
MsgJp:
不思議です
不安だし、焦りもあるんですけど

MsgEn: Unlike before - I feel like I can manage with everyone.
MsgJp:
以前とは違って――
みなさんと一緒なら、なんとかなる
そんな風に思えるようになりました

MsgEn: If I can talk to Loeg, I'm sure my memories will come back.
MsgJp:
ロイグと話せればわたしの記憶は
きっと戻ると思います

MsgEn: Please wait for me. I'm sure—I'll definitely remember everything.
MsgJp:
待っていてくださいね
きっと――
きっと全部思い出しますから

MsgEn: I should talk to Loeg more often, right? I know that but it's frustrating.
MsgJp:
もっともっとロイグと話すべきですよね？
それはわかっているんです
でも、もどかしくて――

MsgEn: We are definitely on the road to victory.
MsgJp:
わたしたちは勝利に向かって
確実に進んでいるはずですよね

MsgEn: Of course, winning isn't everything. But it's a signpost for the future, right?
MsgJp:
もちろん勝利が全てではありませんけど
未来への道しるべになりますよね？

MsgEn: Let me take care of the gate. No matter how long it takes, I promise to bring you all to Phindym!
MsgJp:
ゲートのことはわたしに任せてください
どんなに時間がかかっても
皆さんを必ずフィンダムにご招待します

MsgEn: Let's get to the village as soon as possible. Above all, it is not safe in the forest!
MsgJp:
早く集落を目指しましょう
何より、森の中は安全とは言えません

MsgEn: Captain, let's hurry. I know Gurdolin is a good person, but they have a personality that is easily misunderstood. I have a feeling of unease!
MsgJp:
隊長、急ぎましょう
ガルドリンさんがいい人なのは知っていますが
誤解を招きやすい性格ですから――
胸騒ぎがします！

MsgEn: Don't just be swept away by the situation, try to resist-- It's still a new idea in Phindym!
MsgJp:
状況に流されるだけではなく、抵抗を試みる――
フィンダムではまだ新しい考え方です

MsgEn: Since there are still very few people who are willing to help, I have to find my father myself...
MsgJp:
協力してくれる人はまだまだ少ないので
わたしが父を探してあげないと――

MsgEn: Captain -- If something were to happen to my father -- I...
MsgJp:
隊長――
父に――父にもしものことがあれば
わたしは――

MsgEn: Sorry, I should probably put these personal thoughts away for now.
MsgJp:
すいません、今はこんな個人的な思いは
しまっておくべきですよね

MsgEn: Captain, is Father going to be okay? His wounds are not fatal, right?
MsgJp:
隊長、父は元気になりますよね？
父の傷は、致命傷ではありませんよね？

MsgEn: Left: just a little more, Captain. The "Primeval Drops" will cleanse the core tree- and in turn, cleanse Phindym for us.
MsgJp:
あと少しですよ、隊長
《原始の雫》が芯なる樹を――
ひいてはこのフィンダムを浄化してくれます

MsgEn: I will show everyone the beautiful Phindym that comes after that.
MsgJp:
その後の美しいフィンダムを
皆さん、ご案内しますからね

MsgEn: I will protect the《Primeval Drops》 with my life. Captain, please focus on defeating the enemies.
MsgJp:
《原始の雫》はわたしの命に替えても守ります
隊長たちは魔物退治に専念してください

MsgEn: If we completely eliminate these corrupting demons in this area, then it will finally be time for the purification. A little while longer, please.
MsgJp:
このあたりの侵食魔を一掃すれば
次はいよいよ浄化です
もう少し、よろしくお願いします

MsgEn: Bright future-- It's okay to dream, right?
MsgJp:
明るい未来――
夢見ても大丈夫ですよね？

MsgEn: Captain--I'll be counting on you for a few more minutes.
MsgJp: 隊長――あと少しだけ、よろしくお願いしますね

MsgEn: Captain--I'll be counting on you for a few more minutes.
MsgJp:
おつかれさまです、隊長
俺のやる気、爆発しそうですよ！

MsgEn: Captain, please keep me busy I don't want to go back to Master Joseph.
MsgJp:
隊長、俺を忙しくしてください
ジョゼフ様のところへは戻りたくないんです

MsgEn: Lestania is in trouble again, but— that allowed me to work with the captain and—
MsgJp:
レスタニアはまた大変なことになりましたけど――
そのおかげで隊長と一緒に働けて――

MsgEn: I know it's inappropriate—but I'm glad I'm here.
MsgJp: 不謹慎だけど――俺、うれしいです

MsgEn: If Captain is Leo's right-hand man, I will be Captain's right-hand man!
MsgJp:
隊長がレオ統率の右腕なら――
俺は隊長の右腕になります！

MsgEn: Lise and me—In a way, we are enemies, aren't we? It's like, who will earn the captain's trust?
MsgJp:
リズと俺――ある意味、敵同士ですよね
どっちが隊長の信頼を勝ち取るか――みたいな

MsgEn: Cecily is a bit stiff or-- too serious.
MsgJp:
セシリーはちょっと固いというか――
真面目すぎるんですよね

MsgEn:
I heard that during the orc wars, Lise was cruising around Lestania looking for treasures and stuff.
I feel like I'm falling behind!
MsgJp:
オーク戦争の頃、リズはレスタニアを巡って
お宝とか探してたらしいですね
なんだか、遅れを取った気分です

MsgEn:
Maybe it's the Corruption?
The air seems a little muddy, don't you think?
MsgJp:
侵食魔のせいかな――
少し空気が濁った感じ、しませんか？

MsgEn: Captain-- Indeed, it is through battle that an Arisen truly shows their worth. I am deeply convinced of this.
MsgJp:
隊長――
やっぱり覚者というのは戦ってこそ、ですよね
つくづく、そう思いますよ

MsgEn: Gurdolin keeps coming up with small bets, you know. Thanks to that... Well, never mind!
MsgJp:
ガルドリンが細々と賭けを持ちかけてくるんですよね
おかげで――いえ、なんでもありません！

MsgEn: After getting used to battles, sometimes, I can't help but think that I want more excitement.
MsgJp:
戦いに慣れてから、時々ですけど、もっと刺激が
ほしいなんて、考えちゃうんですよ

MsgEn: It's not good, thinking about things like that.
MsgJp: ダメですよね、こういうこと考えちゃ

MsgEn: I hear about Gurdolin from various people, and it seems that recently, they have become more well-rounded, or rather, calmer.
MsgJp:
ガルドリンのこと、いろんな人から聞くんですけど
どうやら最近は丸くなったというか
落ち着いたというか――

MsgEn: From my perspective, as someone who only knows recent things, I have to say... is this it!? But well, that's how I feel.
MsgJp:
最近のことしか知らない俺にしてみれば
これで！？　って感じですけどね

MsgEn: It has been some time since Captain made their debut, or so it feels, as I heard from Sir Joseph. But I can't exactly remember how long ago it was.
MsgJp:
ジョゼフ様から聞く話に隊長が登場するようになって
どれくらい経つか忘れましたけど――

MsgEn: In my opinion, the captain hasn't changed at all, right?
MsgJp: 思うに、隊長って、全然変わってないですよね

MsgEn:
Lise looks like that, but she sees the world
surprisingly well.
She doesn't seem to see herself, though.
MsgJp:
リズって、ああ見えて、意外と世の中を
見てるんですよね
自分のことは見えていないようだけど

MsgEn: What is it, Captain!
MsgJp: なんでしょうか、隊長！

MsgEn: Cecily is a good girl, isn't she? I want to be supportive.
MsgJp:
セシリーはいい子ですよねえ
力になってあげたいなあ

MsgEn: Captain, let's hurry! with everything, I mean
MsgJp:
隊長、急ぎましょう
何もかも、急ぎましょう

MsgEn: We need to make Cecily feel better soon. I'm choking up too!
MsgJp:
早くセシリーを楽にしてあげないと
こっちまで息が詰まりそうです

MsgEn: Well, even if I say I want to make it easier, I don't know what to do, you know?
MsgJp:
まあ、楽にすると言っても
どうしたらいいかなんて
わからないんですけどね

MsgEn: Some Arisen believe in gaining favor with the knight order as much as possible, but in my opinion, it's all about mutual support.
MsgJp:
騎士団には売れるだけ恩を売っておけなんていう
覚者もいますけど、俺に言わせれば
持ちつ持たれつですよ

MsgEn: Selling, buying, borrowing, lending... It's all trivial stuff. I want to become someone who can think about more important things—me.
MsgJp:
売ったとか買ったとか、借りた貸したなんて
どうでもいいことです――
って、考えられる人になりたいんです、俺

MsgEn: Sometimes, Cecily has a troubled look on her face, you know? Can't we do something to help her? I can't bear to watch anymore.
MsgJp:
時々、セシリーが思い詰めた顔をしていますよ？
なんとかしてあげられませんかねえ
もう、見ていられませんよ

MsgEn: Captain, Lestania is far, isn't it? I am feeling this particularly keenly this time.
MsgJp:
隊長、レスタニアは広いですね
今回ばかりは痛感しています

MsgEn: Running, fighting, and endless enemies. Yes, it's challenging!
MsgJp:
走っても、戦っても、尽きない敵
ええ、やりがいがありますよ！

MsgEn: I'm a little tired from the consecutive battles...
MsgJp: 俺、連戦でちょっと疲れちゃって――

MsgEn:
Of course, if you need me to move, I'll move.
Otherwise, please let me stay put here.
MsgJp:
もちろん、何かあれば動きますから
それ以外はここでジッとさせてください

俺は隊長の右腕を自認してますから
誰が戻ろうと、去ろうと、そこだけは
変わりませんからね

MsgEn: Of course, I have really high expectations, but -
MsgJp: もちろん、ものすごく期待はしていますけど――

MsgEn: Even if Cecily's memory returns, it doesn't mean the problem will be solved, right? Maybe I should train and sharpen my skills.
MsgJp:
セシリーの記憶が戻っても問題が
解決するわけじゃないんですよね
鍛錬して、腕を磨いておこうかな

MsgEn: Is countermeasures against the Black Knight the urgent matter here?
MsgJp: 黒騎士対策が急務ってところですかね

MsgEn: Back to memory, or whatever, it doesn't matter anymore. At least if consciousness can return—
MsgJp:
記憶が戻るとか、どうでも良くなりましたね
せめて意識が戻ってくれれば――

MsgEn: Captain, let's hurry up. There's no time to waste by rushing. We can't afford to be talking about it!
MsgJp:
隊長、急ぎましょうよ
急いては事をし損じるなんて
言ってる場合じゃありません！

MsgEn: Isn't it unlikely to ever have the opportunity to fight alongside any dragon's Arisen other than the White Dragon?
MsgJp:
白竜様以外の竜の覚者と一緒に戦うなんて
こんな機会はもうないかもしれませんよね？

MsgEn: I am happy just being able to be with the captain, And now, witnessing the way of life of Leo up close... My heart is burning.
MsgJp:
隊長と一緒にいられるだけでも幸せなのに
その師匠筋のレオ統率の生き様まで
間近で見られて――俺、胸が熱いです

MsgEn: When you listen carefully, you can hear unfamiliar sounds. The air is thick and sticky, as if it is enveloping you.
MsgJp:
耳を澄ますと、聞き慣れない音がしますね
空気が濃くて、ねっとりとまとわりつくような――

MsgEn: Is it because I'm worrying too much - Am I just being scared after all?
MsgJp:
気にしすぎですかね――
やっぱり、ビビってるんですかね

MsgEn: Gurdolin will be found
MsgJp: ガルドリンは俺が見つけてみせますよ

MsgEn: That person might not admit it, but I feel like our hearts are somewhat connected, you know?
MsgJp:
あの人は認めないでしょうけど
俺たち、結構、心が通じ合っているような
気がするんですよね

MsgEn: Where can Loeg be? Gurdolin also seems to be lost.
MsgJp:
ロイグはどこでしょうね
ガルドリンも、はぐれたきりらしいですよ

MsgEn: I think Cecily's father was waiting for his daughter to return after she grew up to be a strong warrior in her own right.
MsgJp:
セシリーのお父さんは
それなりに強い戦士に育った娘の帰りを
待っていたのではないでしょうか？

MsgEn: I really wanted to go with my daughter, but I couldn't wait forever to--
MsgJp:
本当は娘と一緒に行きたかったけど
いつまでも待っているわけにはいかず――

MsgEn: If that's the case, maybe it's our fault for not getting Cecily home sooner.
MsgJp:
とすれば、セシリーを早く帰してやれなかった
俺たちの責任も、あるのかもしれません

MsgEn: Once the clan chief has recovered, we can depart immediately, so let's keep our bodies warm. It's time for the lightning-fast operation to reclaim the drop!
MsgJp:
族長が回復したらすぐに出発できるように
身体を温めておきましょう
電光石火の、雫奪回作戦です！

MsgEn:
Ahahahaha!
Somehow, Cecily looks bigger, doesn't she?
She seems like a completely different person from when she was feeling uncomfortable here.
MsgJp:
あははは
なんだかセシリーが大きく見えますよね
ここで居心地悪そうにしてた時とは
別人のようです

MsgEn:
We're heading to the heart of Phindym,
And to save the world--
This is awesome!
MsgJp:
フィンダムの中心部に向かうんですよね
しかも、世界を救うために――
これって、凄いことだなあ

MsgEn:
Well, there are still enemies here!
There is no time to rest.
MsgJp:
さあ、まだ魔物はいますよ！
休んでいるヒマなんてありません

MsgEn: I can't stop the excitement— What is this?
MsgJp:
胸騒ぎが止まりません――
なんでしょう、これ

MsgEn: Wahaha! Captain, I can't contain my emotions anymore. Let's decide quickly!
MsgJp:
わははは！
隊長、もう感情を抑えられません
早く決めちゃいましょう！

MsgEn: Depending on how you look at it, order can be a cruel thing, you know.
MsgJp:
理というのは――
見方によっちゃあ、酷なものですね

MsgEn: I don't understand the intentions of the dragon that brought us here, but Acre Selund needs our assistance.
MsgJp:
俺たちをここに連れてきた竜の思惑なんて
わかりませんけど、アッカーシェランには
俺たちの援助が必要です

MsgEn: I am convinced of that!
MsgJp: 俺は、そう確信しています！

MsgEn: Let's change this situation, and show what we can do!
MsgJp: この状況、俺たちで変えて見せましょう！

MsgEn: Where is the prince, I wonder?
MsgJp: 王子はどこですかねえ

MsgEn: According to reports, the western region is said to be quite troublesome area.
MsgJp:
聞くところによると西方はなかなか
厄介な地域らしいですよ

MsgEn: The royal family's authority does not seem to reach very far.
MsgJp: 王家の威光もあまり届いていないとか

MsgEn: Captain, it's in your best interest to keep your distance from Acre Selund's history and politics
MsgJp:
隊長、アッカーシェランの歴史や政治とは
距離を置いた方が得策ですよね

MsgEn: I'm currently focused on rescuing the prince, but where could the "Evil Dragon" be?
MsgJp:
王子救出に夢中になっていましけど
“悪しき竜”はどこにいるんでしょうね

MsgEn: And they don't seem to want to interfere.
MsgJp: 邪魔する気もないみたいですし

MsgEn: The prince is still a child and unreliable, but thanks to that, the liberation army will unite as one.
MsgJp:
王子はまだまだ子供で頼りないけど
そのおかげで解放軍は一丸となる――

MsgEn: Even I, want to protect you.
MsgJp:
俺でさえ、守ってやりたいと
思いますからね

MsgEn: Prince Nedo, I feel like he's trying to be more like a prince and forcing himself. Captain, what do you think?
MsgJp:
ネド王子、王子らしくあろうとして
無理してる気がするんですけど
隊長、どう思います？

MsgEn: Weapons, armor--equipment, all taken care of perfectly!
MsgJp:
武器、防具――装備品、全ての手入れは
完璧です！

MsgEn: Do you remember the words of the "Evil Dragon"?
MsgJp: “悪しき竜”の言葉を覚えていますか？

MsgEn: "Enjoy the Land of Despair" - we are being provoked. Shall we ride?!
MsgJp:
絶望の大陸を楽しめって――
俺たち、挑発されてますよ？
乗ってやりましょうか！？

MsgEn: Rest when you can. We often forget this!
MsgJp:
休める時には休む
これ、俺たちよく忘れちゃいますよね

MsgEn:
Rest when you can.
We often forget this!
MsgJp:
休める時には休む
これ、俺たちよく忘れちゃいますよね

MsgEn: After all, an Arisen should fight.
MsgJp: やっぱり覚者は戦ってこそ、ですね

MsgEn: This is also a battle in the broad sense of protecting the White Dragon, that only the Arisen can fight.
MsgJp:
これも広い意味で白竜様をお守りする
覚者ならではの戦いですから

MsgEn:
I'm not Joseph, but--
the more things go well, the more I wonder what the "evil dragon" is up to.
MsgJp:
ジョゼフ様じゃありませんが――
事がうまく運ぶほど“悪しき竜”の
動向が気になっちゃいますね

MsgEn: If the liberation army is increased, our burden will be reduced, so let's think about the black knight at that time!
MsgJp:
解放軍が増員されれば俺たちの負担も
多少は減るでしょうから、黒い騎士のことは
その時に考えましょう

MsgEn: Why, in such a state...
MsgJp:
鎧の中身が誰だろうと目の前に現れたら
俺は戦うだけですよ！

MsgEn: Captain, what should we do I don't even know where to start--
MsgJp:
隊長、どうしましょう
何から手をつけていいのか――

MsgEn: If we don't do something soon, even we will become unable to move.
MsgJp:
早くなんとかしないと俺たちまで
動けなくなりますね

MsgEn:
Let's do it, Captain.
I'll take care of Lestania, Acre Selund,
I'll take care of everything!
MsgJp:
やりましょう、隊長
俺、レスタニアもアッカーシェランも
全部引き受けますよ！

MsgEn: Let's defeat the Black Knight and restore the power of the White Dragon and Megado!
MsgJp:
黒騎士を倒して白竜様の力と
メガドを取り戻しましょう！

MsgEn:
Well, somehow, a song just slips out.
I can't help but get carried away.
MsgJp:
いやー、なんか、鼻歌出ちゃいますよ
ついつい浮かれちゃうんです

MsgEn: Prince Nedo wants to leave us—
MsgJp: ネド王子が我々と離れたがっている――

MsgEn:
Given what we've been through,
that's unlikely.
MsgJp:
これまでの経緯を思うと
それは考えにくいですよね

MsgEn: At this time, there may be something we can do, right?
MsgJp:
この時間に何かできることが
あるかもしれませんね？

MsgEn: Maybe we should think about increasing our strength, or checking the terrain--
MsgJp:
体力増強とか地勢確認とか――
考えてみましょうか

MsgEn:
I'm the captain's right hand man whenever and however you need me.
You can count on me.
MsgJp:
俺はいつ、どんな時でも隊長の右腕です
頼りにしてくださいね

MsgEn:
I'm fine!
Everyone is worrying too much.
MsgJp:
大丈夫ですってば！
みんな心配しすぎですよ

MsgEn:
Ahahaha――
I got a little too carried away.
MsgJp:
あははは――
少し張り切り過ぎました

MsgEn: Once I get settled down, I plan to soak in the Kinoza hot spring for recuperation.
MsgJp:
落ち着いたらキノザのお湯に浸かって
養生するつもりです

MsgEn: I'm still getting the hang of this. Let me know if I'm being rude.
MsgJp:
まだ勝手がわからなくてね
無礼があったら教えてくれ

MsgEn: I've been thinking about what I'm here for.
MsgJp:
わたしがここにいる意味――
それをね、ずっと考えているんだ

MsgEn: I really have a lot to learn from you guys.
MsgJp: 君たちから学ぶべきことは本当に多いよ

MsgEn: How many encounters have brought me here?
MsgJp:
幾つもの出会いが――
わたしをここまで連れてきたのだろうね

MsgEn: If I were also an Arisen―― I can't help but think that when I look at all of you.
MsgJp:
わたしも覚者だったら――
君たちを見ているとそう思わずにはいられない

MsgEn: You don't know the crossroads of life until you pass through them; that's what I've been thinking lately.
MsgJp:
人生の分岐路なんて、通過してみないと
わからないものだね――最近、そう思うんだ

MsgEn: Ah, excuse me, I was reminiscing about the old days, thinking about my hometown.
MsgJp:
――ああ、失礼
昔のことをね――故郷のことを思い出していた

MsgEn:
People change――Ah, for better or worse
We change
MsgJp:
人は変わるね――ああ、良くも悪くも
変わるものさ

MsgEn: I wonder what it is.
MsgJp: なんだろう

MsgEn: Leo is a good guy. Even though we don't know each other well, that much is clear.
MsgJp:
レオはいい奴だ
付き合いが浅くても、それだけはわかるよ

MsgEn: I need some rest. I've got a lot to think about.
MsgJp:
少し休ませてくれ
いろいろ考えたいんだ

MsgEn: Cecily looks like she's asleep.
MsgJp: セシリーは眠っているようにしか見えないな

MsgEn: Wishing you good luck!
MsgJp:
セシリーは助かるんだろう？
君たちが動いているんだから不安はない
そう言い聞かせてはいるんだけどね

MsgEn: I'm glad Cecily has regained her health. It was my suggestion that put her in crisis, so that's why.
MsgJp:
セシリーが元気になって本当に良かった
わたしの提案が彼女を危機に追いやった
わけだからね

MsgEn: Ah, this sky―― After all, it's irresistibly delicious.
MsgJp:
ああこの空気――
やっぱりたまらなくおいしいよ

MsgEn: My daughter has told me so much about it— I wish I could see Lestania at least once.
MsgJp:
娘から色々と聞いたが――
わたしも一度はレスタニアを見たいものだ

MsgEn:
Phindym is changing.
The attitude of the people living here is definitely changing.
MsgJp:
フィンダムは変わりつつある
暮らす者たちの意識は確実に変わっている

MsgEn: If the core tree falls ill, the dragons and the earth will also suffer. Even humans, and the monsters, will fall ill!
MsgJp:
芯なる樹が病めば、竜も、大地も
人も、魔物さえも病んでしまう

MsgEn: That's right—Everything is connected by the power of the dragons.
MsgJp: そう――全ては巡る竜力で繋がっているのだ

MsgEn:
Thinking about it now, it seems very strange.
Why didn't I try to fight against sickness and disaster, 
just as I would fight against enemies?
MsgJp:
今にして思えばとても奇妙に思えるのだ
なぜ魔物と戦うように、病魔や厄災と
戦おうとしなかったのか――

MsgEn:
Phindym must have sacrificed a lot already -
Is it still not enough?
MsgJp:
フィンダムはもうずいぶん犠牲を払ったはずだが――
まだまだ足りないのだろうか

MsgEn: Where did that black knight come from—Is the black knight responsible for this evil?
MsgJp:
あの黒騎士が、どこから来たのか――
この凶事は黒騎士の仕業なのだろうか――

MsgEn: Did the Black Knight take advantage of the calamity? And what is their goal? I can't understand anything.
MsgJp:
黒騎士が凶事に便乗したのか――
して、その目的は？　わからぬことばかりだ

MsgEn:
--Isn't Cecily a good girl?
I'm very proud of her.
MsgJp:
――セシリーは良い子だろう？
わたしの自慢の娘だ

MsgEn: And yet, I ended up burdening you with an enormous load.
MsgJp: それなのに、途方もない重荷を負わせてしまったな

MsgEn: It's strange. You become accustomed even to this sickly, stagnant atmosphere.
MsgJp:
不思議なものだ
この、病み、淀んだ空気にも馴れてしまうものだな

MsgEn: The spirit dragon Willmia is a beautiful and lovely dragon. Even now, when I close my eyes, I can see its graceful flying figure.
MsgJp:
精霊竜ウィルミアは美しく愛らしい竜だ
今でも目を閉じると、優雅に飛ぶ姿が目に浮かぶ

MsgEn: Lestania's people, anything you want.
MsgJp: レスタニアの人よ、なんなりと

MsgEn: Arisen of Lestania, As much as it pains me, this is a Phindym Still halfway on the path to stability...
MsgJp:
レスタニアの覚者たちよ
心苦しい限りだが、このフィンダム
まだまだ安定への道半ば――

MsgEn: Please continue to walk with us, until the end
MsgJp: 最後まで、我々とともに歩んでくれ

MsgEn: Rely on the "Primeval Drops" and Cecily.
MsgJp: 《原始の雫》とセシリーを頼んだよ

MsgEn: In terms of intruders into the forest, both us and the enemy are not much different. If we are attacked by Willmia-- Yeah, it would be best to escape with all our strength.
MsgJp:
樹内への侵入者という意味では
我々も、魔物もそれほど違わない
もし、ウィルミアに攻撃されたら――
そうだな、全力で逃げるのが得策だろう

MsgEn: The purification has already begun - but it seems to be taking longer than anticipated.
MsgJp:
浄化はすでに始まっているのだが――
想像以上に時間がかかるようだ

MsgEn:
I have nothing more to say.
This is fate.
There are types of fate that are not allowed to be resisted.
MsgJp:
もう何もいうまい
これはさだめだ
抗うことを許されない種類のさだめもある

MsgEn: I will simply wait for now; my daughter will come home again.
MsgJp:
今はただ待とう――
娘はまた帰ってくる

MsgEn: To be reborn as a dragon.
MsgJp: 竜として生まれ変わってな

MsgEn: Now, quickly do what needs to be done!
MsgJp: さあ、早く為すべき事を！

MsgEn: We'll be here all the way, supporting you!
MsgJp:
我々はずっとここにいるし、あなたたちの
応援をしているよ

MsgEn: There is nothing to say anymore.
MsgJp: 話すことなどない

MsgEn: Know your place.
MsgJp: 身の程を知れ

MsgEn: I refuse to listen to you.
MsgJp: 聞く耳持たぬわ

MsgEn: Disappear.
MsgJp: 消えろ

MsgEn: Ridiculous...
MsgJp: 笑止――

MsgEn: Such an annoying voice.
MsgJp: 耳障りな声だ

MsgEn: Don't get conceited.
MsgJp: 思い上がるな

MsgEn: Don't be conceited.
MsgJp: 自惚れるな

MsgEn: You half-baked Arisen—Disappear.
MsgJp: 半端覚者め――失せろ

MsgEn: Our cunning cannot be understood by your worldview
MsgJp: 貴様らの世界観で我が遠謀深慮ははかれぬ

MsgEn: Ignorant fool, know your place.
MsgJp: ふん、身の程知らずめ

MsgEn: Acre Selund is actually a nice place. Please let me guide you once you settle down.
MsgJp:
アッカーシェランは、本当は良いところなんです
落ち着いたら案内させてくださいね

MsgEn: The Evil Dragon is a hated enemy - the nation's foe.
MsgJp: 悪しき竜は憎き敵――国の仇です

MsgEn: However, I am grateful for allowing me to meet with the captains.
MsgJp:
けれども、隊長さんたちと会わせてくれたこと――
これだけは感謝しています

MsgEn: I apologize for not being able to provide any hospitality. I'm sorry.
MsgJp:
いつもなんのおもてなしもできずに
申し訳ありません――ごめんなさい

MsgEn: Gillian is really reliable.
MsgJp: ジリアンは本当に頼りになります

MsgEn: Are there any other brave people like that in Acre Selund?
MsgJp:
このアッカーシェランには他にもあのような
勇気ある人がいるのでしょうか

MsgEn: I am a prince, but I had to leave the castle halfway through my royal education.
MsgJp:
僕は王子なのですが、王族としての教育半ばで
城にいられなくなってしまいました

MsgEn: If there was any rudeness— I apologize.
MsgJp: 不作法があったら――お詫びします

MsgEn: General Meirova is the king's most loyal retainer. If you have any trouble, please let Meirova know.
MsgJp:
メイロワ将軍は王家の一番の家臣です
困ったことがあったらメイロワに言ってくださいね

MsgEn:
Acre Selund has been ravaged by The Evil Dragon--
We all have to work together to restore it!
MsgJp:
悪しき竜に荒らされたアッカーシェラン――
みんなで力を合わせて元に戻すんです！

MsgEn: I had a sister who passed away from illness.
MsgJp: 僕には病で命を落とした姉がいました

MsgEn:
I thought my sister would inherit the throne, so--
It's a secret, you know? I'm confused in this position.
MsgJp:
姉が王座を継ぐと思っていたので――
内緒ですよ？　こんな立場に戸惑っています

MsgEn: Captain, Elliot, Gurdolin, Lise—
MsgJp: 隊長、エリオット、ガルドリン、リズ――

MsgEn: Whatever happens next, your names will be etched in Acre Selund's history.
MsgJp:
たとえこの先に、何が起ころうと
皆さんの名前はアッカーシェランの歴史に
刻まれることでしょう

MsgEn: Heaven only bestows hardships that one can endure, or so I hear
MsgJp:
天はその者に耐えられる苦難しか与えない
と聞きます

MsgEn: What do you think? No matter what you think, please say it exactly as it is.
MsgJp:
どう思いますか？
たとえ思いはどうあれ、その通りだと
言ってくださいね

MsgEn: Yes, you wanted to see me?
MsgJp: はい、僕に用でしょうか？

MsgEn: As an Arisen--and a warrior, I hope you can teach me a lot!
MsgJp:
覚者として――そして戦士として
いろいろ教えてくださいね

MsgEn: Yes, I don't want to just be protected at the back of the battlefield.
MsgJp:
陣の奧で守られているだけなんて
僕はいやですから

MsgEn: Captain, I must be the hope of the people
MsgJp:
隊長さん、僕は人々の希望であらねば
なりません

MsgEn: And how should one behave in that situation? It's quite a difficult problem.
MsgJp:
それには、どう振る舞えばよいのか――
なかなかの難問です

MsgEn: I'm nervous, aren't you? Is it always like this before a battle?
MsgJp:
緊張しますね
いくさはいつもこうなのですか？

MsgEn: I am still lacking. I must become stronger, much stronger.
MsgJp:
僕はまだまだです
もっともっと強くならなくてはなりません

MsgEn:
Once you find the secret entrance
we'll take care of the rest.
MsgJp:
秘密の入り口が見つかったら
あとは任せてください

MsgEn: The path beyond the door must lead to Lookout Castle.
MsgJp: 扉の先は必ず展望城へと通じているはずです

MsgEn: At the very least, the secret door of the royal family existed.
MsgJp:
少なくとも、王家の秘密の扉は
存在したわけですから

MsgEn: Thank you, Captain. It's thanks to you all that we've made it this far.
MsgJp:
隊長さん、ありがとうございます
ここまで来られたのも隊長さんたちの
おかげです

MsgEn: To be able to stand in Lookout Castle again like this ―― it's an indescribable feeling.
MsgJp:
こうして再び展望城に立つことができるとは――
感慨無量です

MsgEn: The purpose is to find our comrades in hiding and at the same time to let those who have been living in uncertainty know that we are coming!
MsgJp:
隠れている同志を見つけ出すと同時に
不安な日々を送ってきた人々に
僕たちが来ていることを知らせる目的もあります

MsgEn: Nice to meet you!
MsgJp: よろしくお願いします！

MsgEn:
I'll go around to all the soldiers in the various locations and call them out.
I'll meet you all at the stone tower.
MsgJp:
僕は各所の兵たちを回って声をかけたら
石塔のところで皆さんをお待ちします

MsgEn:
I'll go around to all the soldiers in the various locations and call them out.
I'll meet you all at the stone tower.
MsgJp:
僕は各所の兵たちを回って声をかけたら
石塔のところで皆さんをお待ちします

MsgEn:
Oh Captain, 
It's reassuring to have you here!
MsgJp:
ああ隊長さん
いてくれると心強いです！

MsgEn:
Now, everyone,
Let's fulfill our wishes and go to The White Dragon!
MsgJp:
さあ、みなさん
思いを果たして白竜様のもとへ！

MsgEn:
Oh Captain,
when things settle down, I'll be visiting you and the General and Gillian in Lestania!
MsgJp:
ああ隊長さん
落ち着いたら将軍やジリアンと一緒に
レスタニアにお邪魔しますからね

MsgEn: I have to express my gratitude and greetings to Lord White Dragon and Master Joseph
MsgJp:
白竜様やジョゼフ様にお礼とご挨拶を
しなくてはなりません

MsgEn: Elliot is seemingly unreliable, but he is skilled.
MsgJp: エリオットは一見頼りないけど、腕は立つ

MsgEn: Lestania citizens are not easy to deal with.
MsgJp: レスタニア者は一筋縄ではいかないね

MsgEn: Lise, believe it or not, is a pretty reliable girl.
MsgJp: リズはああ見えて、かなりしっかりした子だね

MsgEn: Appearances are deceiving--I remember that saying.
MsgJp: 人は見かけによらない――そんな言葉を思い出したよ

MsgEn: Gurdolin--seems to be exactly what he looks like.
MsgJp: ガルドリンは――見たとおりの人物のようだ

MsgEn: The harshness of words is also a means to conceal one's goodness, just like a man from Acre Selund, it is easy to understand.
MsgJp:
言葉の荒さも人の良さを隠すためのもの
まるでアッカーシェランの男のようにわかりやすい

MsgEn: Captain ―― you are an intriguing person I believe you can do something ―― You make me think that way.
MsgJp:
隊長――あなたは不思議な人だな
あなたならなんとかしてくれる
――そう思わせてくれるよ

MsgEn: We in Acre Selund call such a person "loved by the dragon."
MsgJp:
そういう人のことを、このアッカーシェランでは
“竜に愛されてる”と言うのさ

MsgEn: Lestania is probably the same but Acre Selund also has a long history—
MsgJp:
レスタニアも同じだろうけど
このアッカーシェランにも長い歴史があってね――

MsgEn: Usually, it is a history of conflict between houses and houses, and people and monsters. It's the first time there's been a conflict with dragons.
MsgJp:
たいていは家と家、人と魔物の対立の歴史なんだ
竜との対立なんて初めてのことさ

MsgEn: Until the evil dragon appeared, I didn't think anything of the fields and mountains.
MsgJp:
わたし、悪しき竜が現れるまでは野や山を見ても
何も思わなかったんだ

MsgEn:
But you know, ever since I can no longer freely wander around,
I cherish it so much――it's selfish, isn't it?
MsgJp:
だけどね
自由に歩き回れるわけじゃなくなってからは
愛おしくてたまらない――勝手だよね

MsgEn: Are there a lot of Arisen in Lestania?
MsgJp: レスタニアには覚者が大勢いるんだろう？

MsgEn:
Are they all strong?　Are they first-class warriors?
There's also a freshly minted unit called the White Wing Arisen Corps.
MsgJp:
みんな強いのか？　一流の戦士なのか？
白翼覚者隊という生え抜きの部隊もあるんだよね

MsgEn: -- I'm sure there's a lot of fighting going on.
MsgJp: ――戦いが、いっぱいあるんだな

MsgEn: I have heard that The White Dragon has been ill for a long time.
MsgJp: 白竜は長く病んでいると聞いている

MsgEn:
I hope you get better soon.
The world seems to be covered in darkness if the dragon is not always healthy both mentally, and physically.
MsgJp:
早く良くなるといいな
竜はいつでも心身ともに健やかでいてくれないと
世が闇に覆われてしまうようだ

MsgEn: Um, what?
MsgJp: えーと、なに？

MsgEn: You'll be working with me while you're here.
MsgJp:
こっちにいる間はわたしと一緒に
行動してもらうからね

MsgEn: Having a general boosts overall morale. That's the kind of person General Meirova is.
MsgJp:
将軍がいれば全体の士気もあがる
そういう人だよ、メイロワ将軍は

MsgEn: Prince Nedo and I were taken by the General to greet him—that's it.
MsgJp:
ネド王子とは、将軍に連れられて
挨拶に行って――それだけ

MsgEn: Still, if it's for the prince, I can fight, and if I think of the prince, I can hold onto hope.
MsgJp:
それでも、王子のためなら
戦えるし、王子を思えば希望を抱ける

MsgEn: -- all the same. The Royals are that kind of family.
MsgJp:
――みんな同じさ
王家は、そういう一族なんだ

MsgEn: Right now, Prince Nedo is the top priority. I don't want to think about anything else.
MsgJp:
今はネド王子が最優先
それ以外は考えたくないの

MsgEn: The prince seems to be actively moving forward without succumbing to the circumstances.
MsgJp:
王子は状況に屈することなく
積極的に動いているみたいだね

MsgEn: I'd say you're reliable, but... To tell you the truth--no, I shouldn't.
MsgJp:
頼もしいと言えば頼もしいけど
本音を言うと――いや、やめておくよ

MsgEn:
Make time to be with Prince Ned.
Be a good advisor.
MsgJp:
ネド王子と一緒の時間を作ってよ
良き助言者になってほしい

MsgEn: The Orcs are quite active, huh? Hmph, even though they're under the control of the "Evil Dragon".
MsgJp:
オークどもの動きが活発だ
ふん、“悪しき竜”の言いなりのくせに

MsgEn: If all the orcs in Acre Selund start moving, we'll need to disperse our forces as well - that's not good.
MsgJp:
アッカーシェラン全土のオークが
動き始めたら、こっちも戦力を
分散する必要があるから――マズいね

MsgEn: I heard an "evil dragon" showed up. If he comes again, I won't let him get away.
MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”が現れたってね
今度来たら、逃がさないよ

MsgEn: Fighting near Gerhard is very educational.
MsgJp:
イェルハルドの近くで戦うのは
とても勉強になるよ

MsgEn: Fighting near Gerhard is very educational.
MsgJp:
イェルハルドの近くで戦うのは
とても勉強になるよ

MsgEn: When the battle is over—I'll see you at the castle.
MsgJp:
戦いが終わったらさ――
城で会おうね

MsgEn: Ha--good, I knew it. This castle is so relaxing!
MsgJp:
はあ――いいね、やっぱり
この城は、落ち着くよ

MsgEn: It seems like we can strengthen the Liberation Army by coming here.
MsgJp: ここに来て解放軍を増強できそうなんだ

MsgEn: The more people we have, the more operational options we have, and the less work you guys have to do.
MsgJp:
人数が増えると作戦の選択肢も増えるし
あなたたちの負担も減るからね

MsgEn: We will run around inside the castle, causing confusion and chipping away at the enemy's forces—sound good?
MsgJp:
わたしたちはとにかく城内を駆け回って
混乱を誘いつつ敵の部隊を削る――いい？

MsgEn: Is it okay if I stay here?
MsgJp: ここにいてもいいの？

MsgEn: It seems that the time has come to repay the debt.
MsgJp: 借りを返すときが来たようだね

MsgEn: Both there and here, we have made some progress for now.
MsgJp: そっちも、こっちも、とりあえず一段落だね

MsgEn: The Prince is the only Arisen of Acre Selund.
MsgJp:
王子はアッカーシェランのただひとりの
覚者なんだ

MsgEn: The prince's feelings, our feelings, no matter what, there is no option.
MsgJp:
王子の気持ち、わたしたちの気持ちが
どうあっても、選択肢はないよね

MsgEn: There's no point in rushing -- that's what I keep telling myself.
MsgJp:
焦っても仕方がないよね
――そう自分に言い聞かせてるよ

MsgEn: When you suddenly realize, you depend on yourself and think, huh? When I suddenly realize it, I find myself relying on you guys. I become aware of myself and think, "Huh?"
MsgJp:
ふと気づくと、あなたたちに頼っている
自分に気づいて、あれ？って思うんだよね

MsgEn: Did the prince also think that way?
MsgJp: 王子も――そんな風に考えたのかな

MsgEn: The battle against the Evil Dragon is right around the corner, but there are too many things that I'm worried about.
MsgJp:
悪しき竜との決戦がすぐそこにあるのに
気になることが多すぎるの

MsgEn: Since I might die, I want to feel refreshed, but is that being extravagant?
MsgJp:
死ぬかもしれないんだから、スッキリして
おきたいけど――贅沢なのかな

MsgEn: Finally, the decisive battle—.
MsgJp: いよいよ決戦――

MsgEn: Quietly, firmly—I'm steeling my resolve.
MsgJp:
静かに、ギュッと――
覚悟を固めているのさ

MsgEn: Once this situation here settles down, I will definitely come to visit.
MsgJp:
こっちの状況が落ち着いたら
かならず訪ねていくから――

MsgEn: Can you show me around?
MsgJp: 案内してくれる？

MsgEn: I can't say this to the people who are suffering, but...
MsgJp:
こんなこと
苦しんでいる民たちにはけして言えないが

MsgEn: It is an honor and joy to fight alongside warriors like us. Soldiers.
MsgJp:
おぬしたちのような戦士たちとともに戦えるのは
武人の誉れ、喜びだ

MsgEn:
The Acre family values their retainers,
And it is now my duty to repay their kindness.
MsgJp:
アッカー家の方々は家臣を大切にする家柄
その恩に報いることが今のわしの責務

MsgEn: You all are undoubtedly a gift for someone like me. Let's not think about the giver.
MsgJp:
おぬし達は、そんなわしへの贈り物にちがいない
贈り主のことは考えないようにするよ

MsgEn: Gillian is my granddaughter. We hardly talked much until it came to this, but she has grown up to be a good child, just like her mother.
MsgJp:
ジリアンはわしの孫だ
こんなことになるまで、ほとんど話したことも
なかったが
娘に似て良い子に育ったわ

MsgEn: Listen, it's a secret from them.
MsgJp: よいか、本人には内緒だぞ

MsgEn: You are blessed with good subordinates. No, perhaps it's better to say comrades.
MsgJp:
おぬしは良い部下に恵まれておるな
いや、仲間というべきかな

MsgEn: My life is already in its twilight.
MsgJp: わしの人生はもう夕暮れ時だ

MsgEn: Up until now, you have made my life interesting and enjoyable. Before I leave Acre Selund, I must express my gratitude.
MsgJp:
これまで面白おかしく生かしてくれた
このアッカーシェランに恩返しをしないうちには
立ち去るわけにはいかんのだ

MsgEn: I have lived thinking that getting older is not a bad thing, but to be an old man in the midst of such a crisis... Oh, how I resent my fate.
MsgJp:
歳を取るのは悪くないと思ってここまで生きてきたが
こんな危機の最中にジジイでいるのは――
まったく、運命が恨めしいわ

MsgEn: I hear orcs stink in Lestania too.
MsgJp: レスタニアでもオークは臭いらしいな

MsgEn: If it were only the orcs here that smelled, I would have cursed the heavens for how unfair it was.
MsgJp:
臭いのはこの地のオークだけなら
なんと不公平なことかと
天を呪ってやるところだったぞ

MsgEn: But if someone as capable as you were in this country, I would gladly give up my position as general.
MsgJp:
おぬしほどの者がこの国にいたら
わしは喜んで将軍の座を譲るつもりだ

MsgEn: And thus, I shall proclaim myself as the Supreme General! Hahaha!
MsgJp:
そしてわしは、大将軍を名乗るのだ！
はははは！

MsgEn: It's my pleasure to give a harsh retaliation to the young people who treat me like an old man.
MsgJp:
人をジジイ扱いする若造に手厳しく仕返しするのが
わしの楽しみでな

MsgEn: However, I became too famous. I want to go to a land where no one knows me and make fools of those youngsters.
MsgJp:
だが、わしは有名になりすぎた
わしのことを誰も知らぬ土地へ行って
若造どもをからかい倒してやりたいわ

MsgEn: Oh, I see.
MsgJp: おお、そうだな

MsgEn: Prince's reunion is guaranteed.
MsgJp: 王子とは必ず再会できる

MsgEn: You all too believe in that. It is said that if you believe, it will come true.
MsgJp:
おぬしらもそう信じてくれ
信じればそれは実現するというではないか

MsgEn: I'm in a hurry-- But, after all, they say haste makes waste.
MsgJp:
気が急くのう――
いかし、急いては事をし損じるというからな

MsgEn:
Please do not think badly of Gerhard.
He is also a loyal man.
MsgJp:
イェルハルドを悪く思わないでくれ
あれもまた忠義の男だ

MsgEn: I will make sure to speak well of you all to Prince Nedo. Leave it to me.
MsgJp:
おぬしたちのことはネド王子には
良く言っておくからな
わしに任せておけ

MsgEn:
Confidentially speaking, if the prince isn't an Arisen,
I had intended to conceal that fact--
MsgJp:
ここだけの話、王子が覚者でなければ
その事実、隠し通すつもりでいたが――

MsgEn: I breathed a sigh of relief.
MsgJp: 胸を撫で下ろしたわい

MsgEn: I kindly ask for your continued support in the future. Your experience and skills in battle are indispensable.
MsgJp:
これから先もよろしく頼むぞ
戦慣れしたおぬしらの力が
ぜひとも必要だ

MsgEn: The Liberation Army is an elite few and they don't even think about the head-to-head clashes of large armies.
MsgJp:
解放軍は少数精鋭
大軍の真っ向ぶつかり合いなど
考えちゃいない

MsgEn: I'm expecting great things from you.
MsgJp: おぬしら、期待しているぞ

MsgEn: Careful--proceed with caution.
MsgJp: 慎重に――慎重に事を進めるぞ

MsgEn: If it appears that I am being impatient, please do not hesitate to admonish me.
MsgJp:
わしが焦っているように見えたら
おぬしら、遠慮無く諫めてくれよ

MsgEn: Hmmm, royal secrets are not supposed to be recorded. We don't even have a map!
MsgJp:
ふーむ
王家の秘密は記録に残さないのが習わし
地図すらないのだ

MsgEn:
Hmmm
Royal secrets are not supposed to be recorded
We don't even have a map!
MsgJp:
ふーむ
王家の秘密は記録に残さないのが習わし
地図すらないのだ

MsgEn: The lord of Lookout Castle is Prince Nedo Acre. I will remind those Orcs of that.
MsgJp:
展望城の城主はネド・アッカー様
そのことをオークどもに思い出させてやるわ

MsgEn: This fortress, which was thought to be impregnable, was easily taken down by the "Evil Dragon." The frustration of that defeat is my driving force.
MsgJp:
難攻不落と思われたこの城も
あっさりと“悪しき竜”に落とされた
その口惜しさが、わしの原動力だ

MsgEn: Defeat makes us stronger. I've seen it firsthand.
MsgJp:
敗北は人を強くする
身をもって知ったぞ

MsgEn: Please listen to Gillian for the specific details. And of course, please respect Prince Nedo.
MsgJp:
具体的な話はジリアンから聞いてくれ
もちろんネド王子を尊重してくれよ

MsgEn: I'm counting on you, strong warriors of Lestania.
MsgJp: 頼むぞ、レスタニアの強者たちよ

MsgEn: Even if it falls into the hands of the enemy, it is indeed a royal city that will not be easy to conquer!
MsgJp:
たとえ敵の手に落ちようとも、さすが王都
攻略は容易ではないわい

MsgEn: I'll leave the black knight to you. That's what you want, isn't it?
MsgJp:
黒騎士はおぬしらに任せるぞ
それが望みであろう？

MsgEn: I hear that the White Dragon of Lestania has regained its power.
MsgJp:
レスタニアの白竜様はその力を
取り戻したと聞く

MsgEn: I'm really glad.
MsgJp: 本当に良かったなあ

MsgEn: I can't understand the prince's actions at all.
MsgJp: 王子の行動がさっぱりわからん

MsgEn: -- But I have decided to trust the prince, and I hope you will not abandon him.
MsgJp:
――しかし、わしは王子を信じると決めた
おぬしらも王子を見捨てることなく
よろしく頼むぞ

MsgEn:
I'm sorry――
Even if I apologize, it probably won't mean much,
But right now, this is all I can say.
MsgJp:
すまんな――
わしが謝っても意味はなかろうが
今はこれしか言えん

MsgEn: The prince is neither crazy nor has he lost his mind. If that's the case, my feelings are already decided.
MsgJp:
王子は気が触れたわけでも
心を奪われたわけでもない
となれば、わしの気持ちは決まっている

MsgEn: Even if it's a big mistake, I have no worries Because you are here.
MsgJp:
たとえそれが大きな過ちだとしても不安はないぞ
おぬしらがいるからな

MsgEn: Oh, I'm so busy, I have so much to do! I'm in such a rush I can't get anything done!
MsgJp:
ああ忙しい
やることはいっぱいなのに
気が急いて何もできんわ！

MsgEn: There's no choice but to move forward.
MsgJp: もう進むしかない

MsgEn: The first priority is the protection of Prince Nedo, but we must also be prepared for the decisive battle. The time has come.
MsgJp:
理想はまずネド王子の保護だが
決戦と同時になっても良しとせねばなるまい
時は来たのだ

MsgEn:
There are many things that I need to discuss with the prince.
I can't afford to rest just yet.
MsgJp:
王子と相談して決めねばねばならんことが
多々あるのだ
まだまだ休むわけにはいかない

MsgEn: Well, being busy for Acre Selund is my true calling.
MsgJp:
まあ、アッカーシェランのための多忙は
本懐だがな

MsgEn:
My hometown, Rothgill, has been a land of demons since ancient times.
So, although I look like this, I am proud to say that I can fight well!
MsgJp:
わたしの故郷、ロスギルは古来より魔物の多い土地
よってこう見えて、そこそこ戦えると自負しています

MsgEn: I hope to have a chance to spar with you someday.
MsgJp: いつか、手合わせ願いたいものですね

MsgEn: When I was younger, I was swept away by General Meyrowa's thoughtful words and actions, his impetuous words and deeds. But it has strengthened me both physically and mentally.
MsgJp:
若い頃はメイロワ将軍の思いつきのような言動に
振り回されましたが
おかげで身も心も鍛えられましたよ

MsgEn:
Strategies, tactics--
such things are only useful when the opponent is human!
MsgJp:
戦略、戦術――
そんなものが役に立つのは相手が人間の時だけです

MsgEn: No, if it's an Orc, it will barely work. However, when facing the Evil Dragon, I wonder if it will be effective...
MsgJp:
いや、オークならば、かろうじて通用するでしょう
しかし、悪しき竜相手では、果たして――

MsgEn: Even though they're called the Liberation Army, they're just a ragtag group. Everyone has their own determination and loyalty that they can't do without for victory.
MsgJp:
解放軍とは言っても、寄せ集めです
勝利に欠かせない執念や忠義心の強さは人それぞれ

MsgEn: In the midst of a difficult situation where it is also challenging to achieve unity through training, the ability to inspire people lies solely in the power that victory itself holds.
MsgJp:
訓練による意思統一も難しい状況の中で
人々を鼓舞するのは勝利そのものが持つ力に他ならず

MsgEn: It's like the chicken and the egg problem, you know.
MsgJp: 親鳥が先か卵が先か――みたいな話ですけどね

MsgEn: A simple handful of courage can be blown away by a single roar from the Evil Dragon.
MsgJp:
ほんの一握りの勇気など、悪しき竜のひと啼きで
吹き飛ばされてしまいます

MsgEn: Many of the people... They are not strong.
MsgJp: 多くの民は――強くはありません

MsgEn: I used to be General Meirova's trusted subordinate.
MsgJp: わたしはかつてメイロワ将軍の腹心の部下でした

MsgEn: Please remember this: The general is not a bad person.
MsgJp:
これだけは覚えておいてください
将軍は、悪い人ではありません

MsgEn: What about Gillian?
MsgJp: ジリアンはどうですか？

MsgEn:
If you are being pushed around by General Meirova,
there may be some advice I can give you.
Please let them know to come to me.
MsgJp:
メイロワ将軍に振り回されているのであれば
何か助言ができるかもしれない
わたしのところに来るように伝えてください

MsgEn: My hope is— to see the next fire dragon!
MsgJp:
わたしの希望はね――
次の火竜を見たいということです

MsgEn: Acre Selund, a dignified Fire Dragon, living alongside.
MsgJp: アッカーシェランとともに生きる、真っ当な火竜を

MsgEn: I've seen enough of warfare.
MsgJp: 戦乱の世は嫌というほど見てきました

MsgEn: The blood that is spilled, the bitter cry that will not go away - that's how we got stability, peace, and prosperity, and we can't just sit back and let a dragon from another land disrupt it!
MsgJp:
流される血、消えない苦鳴――そうして手に入れた
安定、平和、繁栄を、よそから来た竜に乱され
黙っているわけにはいきません

MsgEn: If I oppose something, I would like you to think that there is a reason behind it.
MsgJp:
わたしが何かに反対したら、そこには何か
理由があると思っていただきたい

MsgEn: General Meirova tends to attribute things to resentment and emotions, you know.
MsgJp:
メイロワ将軍は、反発心だのなんだの
感情のせいにしがちですからね

MsgEn: Hmm, what can I help you with?
MsgJp: ふーむ、何用でしょうか？

MsgEn: Oh my, is the search for the prince on hold?
MsgJp: おやおや、王子探しは中断ですか？

MsgEn: How about the progress over there?
MsgJp: そちらの首尾はいかがです？

MsgEn: I hear that the Prince is safe, both physically and mentally.
MsgJp:
