Look, I've got some pretty good stuff today.
Take it!
MsgJp:
見てくれ、今日は結構良い物があってさ
持ってってくれよ！

MsgEn:
Arisen, there's an abandoned house little ways down the coast.
Did you know there's an underground warehouse there?
MsgJp:
覚者さん、海岸を少し行ったところに
廃墟があるんだけどさ
そこに地下倉庫があるのを知ってるか？

MsgEn:
The villagers all call that place
the "Seaside Cellar".
It was sealed off because of the danger though.
MsgJp:
村のみんなが《海辺の地下室》って
呼んでる場所だよ
危ないから封鎖してたんだけど

MsgEn:
I heard voices coming from within.
It seems that someone is inside.
I wanted to look in, but I didn't have the courage--
MsgJp:
その中から、話し声が聞こえてさ
どうも誰かが入り込んでるみたいなんだ
中を見ようと思ったけど勇気が無くて――

MsgEn:
If you're passing by, take a look.
It may be the "Breya Treasure Bandits" this time.
MsgJp:
もし通りかかったら見てみてくれよ
今度こそ《ブリア宝奪団》かもしれないな

MsgEn:
Thank you for showing up.
Oh yes, please use this.
It may be of some help.
MsgJp:
顔出してくれてありがとうな
そうだ、これ使ってくれよ
何かの足しにはなるだろ

MsgEn:
Arisen, a little advice for you.
Do you know where the harpies are nesting?
You know, the birdbath rock.
MsgJp:
覚者さん、ちょっと相談乗ってくれよ
ハーピーの営巣地、知ってるか？
ほら、《鳥寄せ岩》

MsgEn:
There, the parent harpies with their eggs
started swarming
and they are called "Martell Harpies" and they are more ferocious than the normal
harpies.
MsgJp:
あそこに、卵を抱えた親ハーピーが
群がるようになってさ
《マーテル・ハーピー》って言って、普通の
ハーピーより凶暴なんだよ

MsgEn:
If this keeps up, it's going to be hard to get old Rudolfo to
deliver the goods.
When you get around to it, can you ask him to exterminate them for you?
MsgJp:
このままだとルドルフォの爺さんに
配達にいくのも大変だ
手が空いたらでいいから、退治頼めないかい？

MsgEn:
You've come to the right place.
Here, take this, it's a leftover.
MsgJp:
丁度いいとこにきたな
これ、余りものだけど持ってってくれ

MsgEn:
Lord, you're amazing!
I'm sorry to keep asking you for things
MsgJp:
いやー、さすが覚者さん！
何かと任せちゃって申し訳ない

MsgEn: I'll do my best to get you better items, so please continue to take care of me
MsgJp:
もっと良い物渡せるように頑張るからさ
これからもよろしくな

MsgEn: Ah, you're in a good place, Arisen!
MsgJp: ああ、覚者さん良い所に！

MsgEn: Have you ever been to the southern shore, Blue Claw Beach?
MsgJp:
南の浜辺――《青爪浜》には行った事が
あるかい？

MsgEn:
On the way there, we came across the remains of a camp
and before we knew it, a hobgoblin had settled there.
It's a big guy.
He's big, and if he comes towards the village, it's going to be a big problem!
MsgJp:
そこへ行く途中のキャンプ跡に
いつの間にかホブゴブリンが居付いちゃった
ようなんだ
体格も大きいし、村の方に来たら大変だ！

MsgEn:
If you see him, please exterminate him.
I've contacted the Knights of Columbus, but they haven't gotten back to me
.
MsgJp:
もし見かけたら退治してくれよ
騎士団にも連絡したんだけど、なかなか
返事が来なくてさ

MsgEn: Hey, Arisen! I have big news!
MsgJp: そうだ覚者さん、ビッグニュースだよ！

MsgEn:
I found the treasure
and I think I know where it might be!
MsgJp:
例の財宝なんだけど
ありそうな場所が分かったんだ！

MsgEn:
As it turns out, it's
the 《Tidal Caverns Cave》 near LeFlore--
MsgJp:
結論から言うと、それは
ルフロー近くにある《潮騒洞窟》――

MsgEn:
Hey, you're interested, right?
Would you like to come and look for it?
MsgJp:
なぁ、興味あるよな？
探しにってみないかい？

MsgEn:
It was sealed for a long time,
but I've opened it for you now.
Let me know if you decide to go and
I'll tell you more about the treasure.
MsgJp:
ずっと封鎖されてたんだけど
今は入れるようにしておいたから
行くってなったら俺に話しかけてくれよ
財宝について詳しく話すからさ

MsgEn:
Ah, Arisen--
There's something I'd like to,
ah, speak with you about--
MsgJp:
か、覚者さん――
ちょっと聞いてほしいことが
あ、あるんだけどさ――

MsgEn:
--What?
No, I'm not particularly scared of anything--
I mean, I'm not scared at all!
MsgJp:
――え！？
いや、俺は特になにも――
っていうか全然怖がってないけど！

MsgEn:
Anyway, listen,
see, I told you before
that there's an abandoned village on the southern beach, right?
MsgJp:
とにかく聞いてくれよ
ほら、南の浜辺に廃村があるって話は
前にしただろ？

MsgEn:
There's a long-defunct village called Leflor.
Have you ever been there?
MsgJp:
ルフローっていうだいぶ前に滅んだ村さ
行ったことはあるかい？

MsgEn:
The only thing that's clear is that it was destroyed overnight.
Was it a big wave or did the demons get it?
The real story is a mystery.
We still don't know what happened to the treasure, either.
MsgJp:
一夜で滅んだことだけははっきりしてるけど
大波が来たのか、魔物にやられたのか
本当のところは謎なんだ
財宝の件もまだ分からないんだけどさ

MsgEn:
So, near that Leflor, a traveler who stopped by the inn yesterday
said he saw a figure wandering
around, muttering something--.
MsgJp:
で、そのルフロー付近で、何か呟きながら
彷徨う人影を見たって
昨日宿に寄った旅人が言ってたんだよ――

MsgEn:
-Is this, perhaps, a ghost...?
Hey, Arisen, I'm sure you're curious too, right?
So, come on. Please go and check it out.
MsgJp:
――これって、もしかして幽霊――？
ほら覚者さんも気になるだろ？
だからさ、ほら。確かめてきてくれよ

MsgEn: -You know, I was really glad when you came to Rotes.
MsgJp:
――もう、何ていうかさ
あんたがローテスに来てくれて
本当に良かったよ

MsgEn:
No Knighthood or Temple has ever been so
accommodating, and
I'll support you as much as I can, too.
MsgJp:
今まで騎士団も神殿も、ここまで
親身になってくれた人はいなかったし
俺も、できる限りあんたを支援するよ

MsgEn: From now on, count on me!
MsgJp: これからも、よろしくな！

MsgEn:
Oh my God, Arisen!
A very powerful Cyclops has appeared on the Blue Claw Beach.
MsgJp:
大変だ、覚者さん！
《青爪浜》にすごく強そうなサイクロプスが
現れたらしいんだ

MsgEn:
Maybe that's the demon that destroyed LeFlore
in one night!
MsgJp:
もしかしたら、そいつがルフローを
一夜で壊滅させた魔物なのかなぁ！？

MsgEn:
If such a thing
were to come to Rotes--
MsgJp:
もしそんなのがローテスへ来るような
ことがあったら――

MsgEn:
Please, I know it's a lot to ask, but the only person I can think of who can do something about it is the Arisen!
I can't think of anything else.
You've got to fight that guy off somehow!
MsgJp:
頼むよ、大変だとは思うけど
なんとかできるとしたら、覚者さんくらいしか
思いつかないんだ
そいつをどうにか撃退してくれよ！

MsgEn:
Yo!　If you're in the vicinity of the Brier Coast,
, ask me anything you want.
MsgJp:
よう！　ブリア海岸近辺の事なら
何でも聞いてくれ

MsgEn:
Oh, yeah!
If you're going towards the lighthouse, you should be careful near the "Birdcage Rock"
MsgJp:
そ、そうだ！
灯台の方にいくなら、《鳥寄せ岩》の
近くは気を付けたほうがいいよ

MsgEn:
I've heard that sometimes the crazed parent harpies build nests
and attack passersby
.
MsgJp:
気が立った親ハーピーが巣を作ってて
通りかかった人が襲われることも
あるらしいんだ

MsgEn:
I'm worried!
What if a monster comes from the sea?
MsgJp:
し、心配だ！
海から化け物がきたらどうしよう！

MsgEn:
Ummm, I think I hear something
roaring from the beach out back--
MsgJp:
ううーん、裏の浜辺から何かの
唸り声が聞こえる気がする――

MsgEn:
If the view is good, the enemy will find it
likely, and if it's bad, something will be lurking
which, what to do!
MsgJp:
見晴らしが良くても敵に見つかり
そうだし、悪くても何か潜んでそうだ
ど、どうしたら！

MsgEn: Ah, ah, do you need something from me?
MsgJp: あ、ああ、僕に何か用？

MsgEn: I wonder what fish we're having for dinner tonight.
MsgJp: 今日の晩ご飯のお魚なにかな

MsgEn:
I love walking by the sea!
The water feels so good
MsgJp:
海沿い歩くの大好き！
水が気持ちいいよね

MsgEn:
Do you know? The lighthouse on top of the cliff
has been there for a long time
MsgJp:
知ってる？　崖の上の灯台
かなり昔からあるんだって

MsgEn: Hello!
MsgJp: こんにちは！

MsgEn:
Oh, are you an adventurer?
If you don't mind, could you go inside and tell Anise
the news from outside?
MsgJp:
あら、冒険者の方？
もし良ければなのですが、奥にいるアニスに
外の話を聞かせてやってくれません？

MsgEn:
Ennis--
my boy is crippled
and I feel sorry for him.
MsgJp:
アニス――
私の子は足が不自由で
可哀そうな想いをさせてしまっているんです

MsgEn: Adventurers, I know you guys travel a lot
MsgJp:
冒険者さん、あなた方は色々な所へ
旅されているんでしょうね

MsgEn:
Oh, hello
Thanks for coming all the way out here!
MsgJp:
あら、こんにちは
わざわざ来て下さってありがとう

MsgEn:
Indeed, the "hidden beach" there is a nuisance.
No matter whether you drive them away or not, the tramps
hang around and--
MsgJp:
まったく、そこの《隠れ浜》は厄介だ
追い払っても追い払っても、不逞の輩が
たむろして――

MsgEn:
I can't
let them take all the fish we've caught.
MsgJp:
せっかく捕った魚を奪われては
たまらんよ

MsgEn:
More harpies around the beach
and it's harder to get to the boathouse
They're totally annoying!
MsgJp:
浜のあたりにハーピーが増えて
船小屋まで行きにくくなってしまった
まったく迷惑なやつらだよ

MsgEn:
They say that when Huge Bull wasn't around, they could
sail farther out to sea and swim in deeper water!
MsgJp:
ヒュージブルが居なかった時は、もっと沖まで
船が出せたというし、深い海でも泳げたそうだ

MsgEn:
But who knows about those old days
any more?
MsgJp:
が、そんな昔のことを知っとる奴は
もうおらんな

MsgEn:
Fishing is still going on slowly.
Fugeables and sea dragons are getting noisy.
MsgJp:
漁はほそぼそと続けとるよ
ヒュージブルだの海竜だの、物騒に
なってきたがね

MsgEn:
I can still catch enough fish to eat.
I don't have to make a living.
MsgJp:
食う分の魚はまだ獲れるなぁ
生活には困っとらんよ

MsgEn:
Sometimes big boats wash up on the beach
That one didn't make it back
Is it a temple boat?
MsgJp:
たまに大きな船が浜に流れ着く
あれは、帰ってこれなかった
神殿の船なのかね？

MsgEn: Hm? What's up?
MsgJp: ん？　何だね

MsgEn:
Rotes is a fishing village, but
the residents don't go offshore much because of the fusibles in the sea
MsgJp:
ローテスは漁村ですが
海にはヒュージブルがいるため
あまり住民は沖へでませんね

MsgEn: Shallow areas are fine.
MsgJp: 浅い所は大丈夫でありますが

MsgEn:
The problem with the Lotes these days is that
they are pirates called the "Briar Treasure Robbers"!
MsgJp:
このところのローテスの問題は
《ブリア宝奪団》という海賊なのです

MsgEn:
Both Area Master O'Neill and
myself are in a lot of trouble!
MsgJp:
エリアマスターのオニールさんも
自分も、かなり困っているのです

MsgEn:
Where the heck are they lurking--
I have a few potential suspicious places
mmmm--
MsgJp:
一体連中はどこに潜んでいるのか――
いくつか怪しい場所候補はあるのですが
むむむ――

MsgEn: I am in charge of security here!
MsgJp: ここの警備担当は自分であります！

MsgEn:
You're in charge of solving the village's problems, aren't you?
That would be very helpful!
MsgJp:
覚者殿は、村の問題解決担当で？
そりゃあ助かります！

MsgEn:
One word of caution:
Please stay as far away as possible from the back beach, 《青爪浜》
, down south from the village!
MsgJp:
一つ注意です
村から南に下った裏の浜辺、《青爪浜》
方面はできるだけ近づかないでください！

MsgEn:
The demons are dangerous there
and I'm not confident that I
would be able to help if something were to happen!
MsgJp:
そっちは魔物も危険で
何かあったとしても自分
助けにいける自信がありません！

MsgEn:
There is a "Goblin Camp" on the road leading that way.
Hobgoblins are known to wander there as well.
It is quite dangerous!
MsgJp:
とくに、そっちの方へ続く道には
《小鬼の野営地》があり、ホブゴブリンが
うろつくこともあり、危険であります

MsgEn: Please enjoy playing at the beach near the village!
MsgJp: 浜遊びは村の近くでどうぞ！

MsgEn: Welcome to Rotes!
MsgJp: ようこそローテスへ！

MsgEn: Hello and welcome.
MsgJp: お客さん？　こんにちは

MsgEn:
There are so many places I'd like to go,
but I can't even leave this room--
MsgJp:
行ってみたい所がたくさんあるの
この部屋から出ることもできないのに――

MsgEn:
I can't walk,
so I stay here all the time.
MsgJp:
私、歩けないの
だからずっとここにいるよ

MsgEn:
Please, tell me stories of your adventures.
Any story at all!
MsgJp:
冒険の話を聞かせてほしいな
どんなことでもいいから

MsgEn: Are you looking for a travel companion, Lord Arisen?
MsgJp: 旅の同伴者をお求めですか？　覚者様

MsgEn: May the blessings of The White Dragon, Lady Arisen, be with you.
MsgJp: 白竜様のご加護があらんことを

MsgEn: The radiance of Rift Crystal is always with you.
MsgJp: リムの輝きは常に貴方と共に

MsgEn: If you are thinking of reorganizing your party members, please do not hesitate to ask.
MsgJp:
メンバーの再編をお考えでしたら
なんなりと

MsgEn:
Ho ho!　What do you think of my performance?
I'm as good as the poets of the temple.
MsgJp:
ほほ！　どうです、ワシの演奏は！
神殿の詩人にも引けをとらんでしょう

MsgEn:
Mmmmm~ Blue sea~ White sand~
Sea breeze smells like a dream on the beach~
MsgJp:
ふんふ～ん～　青い海～　白い砂～
潮風薫る浜辺の夢～

MsgEn:
ROTHES!　Rotes~~s!
Come once~~!
MsgJp:
ローテス！　ローテ～ス！
一度はおいでませ～～～

MsgEn:
Hmmm~　Lululu~
A trap lurking at the blue water's edge~
Sticky red creeps up~
MsgJp:
はんは～ん～　るるる～
青い水辺に潜む罠～
赤いべとべと忍び寄る～～

MsgEn:
If you notice, Lord Hyuji-buru ~ ~
is a dangerous enemy Hyuji-buru ~ ~ ~!
MsgJp:
気づけば足元ヒュージブル～～
油断大敵ヒュージブル～～～！

MsgEn: Hohoho! Please relax!
MsgJp: ほっほっほ！　くつろいで下され！

MsgEn:
Ah, welcome.
I'll bring out the goods.
MsgJp:
あぁ、いらっしゃいませ
品物を出しますね

MsgEn:
Ha—
I wonder if it's mental exhaustion
But I can't collapse myself
MsgJp:
はぁ――
気疲れかしら
でも、わたしまで倒れるわけにはいかないし

MsgEn:
There is a tendency of shortage of medicine in this village
due to a strange epidemic — —
There is a sufficient amount to share with travelers though
MsgJp:
この村では薬が不足しがちなんです
妙な流行り病のせいで――
旅の方へお分けする量はあるのですが

MsgEn:
My husband also collapsed
and it's been about half a month now.
Can you tell me if there are any good medications?
MsgJp:
うちの旦那も倒れて
もう半月くらい経つのですが
いい薬があったら教えてもらえませんか？

MsgEn: Ugh--?
MsgJp: うぅ――？

MsgEn: Ugh-- my body hurts--
MsgJp: うぅ――、体が、痛い――

MsgEn: Ah, my head--
MsgJp: あぁ、あ、頭が――

MsgEn: Is it cold or hot--
MsgJp: 寒いのか、暑いのか――

MsgEn:
Welcome to Tell
Let us help you prepare for your journey
How can we help you?
MsgJp:
ようこそ、テルへ
旅の準備はこちらで承ろう
何かご用かな？

MsgEn:
If you're staying overnight, it's<VAL PRICE_INN>.
Want to stay the night?
MsgJp:
宿泊だったら<VAL PRICE_INN>だよ
泊っていくかい？

MsgEn: Yes
MsgJp: はい

MsgEn: No
MsgJp: いいえ

MsgEn:
If it's "Treat Weakness", it's<VAL PRICE_WEAK>.
What do you want to do?
MsgJp:
《弱化の治療》なら
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>だよ、どうするね？

MsgEn: Yes
MsgJp: はい

MsgEn: No
MsgJp: いいえ

MsgEn:
It seems that "Treatment for Weakness" is not necessary.
However, if you are still tired, it would be good to take a break at my place.
MsgJp:
《弱化の治療》は必要ないようだ
それでも疲れているなら
うちで休憩していくといい

MsgEn:
Arisen, the Temple has told me to accommodate you.
Now, feel free to use any room you like.
Shall we take a break?
MsgJp:
覚者さん、神殿からあんたには便宜を図るよう
言われているよ
さ、好きな部屋を自由に使ってくれ
休んでいくか？

MsgEn: Yes
MsgJp: はい

MsgEn: No
MsgJp: いいえ

MsgEn:
Even though it's been tough lately
that thing that crashed in the west--
I'm so anxious to see it, at all!
MsgJp:
ただでさえ近頃大変だというのに
西に墜ちてきたアレ――
まったく、不安でたまらんよ

MsgEn:
Arisen, if you don't mind, can you help me?　
Actually, there's a strange disease going around here in Tel right now--
MsgJp:
覚者さん、良ければ力を貸して
もらえないか？　実は、今ここテルでは
変な病が流行っていてな――

MsgEn:
Finally, some of us are going down.
I've been in touch with the Temple in case you're interested.
MsgJp:
ついに倒れる者もでるようになったんだ
一応神殿にも連絡はしているんだが

MsgEn:
You can ask Alfredo next door at
for more information on this area.
MsgJp:
この辺りの情報なら
隣にいるアルフレドに聞いてみるといい

MsgEn:
I have him handle the day-to-day troubles through
the Knights and the Sentinels.
Well, there are times when it's directly from me.
MsgJp:
日頃の厄介事は、あいつを介して
騎士団や覚者さんに取り次いでもらってる
まぁ、私から直接の時もあるにはあるが

MsgEn:
We're an orthotics shop.
See if there's anything you need.
MsgJp:
ウチは装具屋だよ
要るものがないか見ていってよ

MsgEn:
We've managed to get by thanks to
knights and wisemen.
MsgJp:
うちがなんとかやっていけてるのも
騎士さんや覚者さんのお陰だよ

MsgEn: Do you need anything, sir?
MsgJp: お客さん、何か欲しいのある？

MsgEn: If you need anything, feel free to buy it.
MsgJp: 必要なものがあれば、買ってって

MsgEn: Hmm, what can I do for you?
MsgJp: うん、何か用かな？

MsgEn:
A little north of the river, there's a riverbed
called the "Blood Rinsing Riverbed"
Lizardmen have been gathering there for some time now.
MsgJp:
川を少し北にいったところの河原
《血すすぎ河原》っていうんだが
いつのころからかリザードマンが集まってきてなぁ

MsgEn:
I'm wondering if he's going to swim down the river and come over here.
I'm getting restless.
MsgJp:
川を泳いでこっちへ来やしないかと
落ち着かんね

MsgEn: Arisen, if you don't mind, can you help Alfredo at the Black Grape Pavilion there
MsgJp:
覚者さん、よければそこの黒ブドウ亭
にいるアルフレドに力を貸してやって
くれないか

MsgEn: Ah, I've been getting tired easily.
MsgJp: はぁ、疲れが溜まりやすくなったな

MsgEn:
I feel somewhat feverish
No, no, no, it's just my imagination.
MsgJp:
やや熱っぽいような気が
い、いやいや気のせいだな

MsgEn:
Something huge fell in the woods to the west.
Some people from the temple came to investigate.
No one in the village is afraid to go near it.
MsgJp:
西側の森に、巨大な何かが落ちてきたんだ
神殿から調査の人も来ていたよ
村の者は恐ろしくて誰も近寄らんね

MsgEn: Oh, is something wrong?
MsgJp: あぁ、どうかしたか？

MsgEn:
Heidel isn't so livable either.
Even though the temple is close--
MsgJp:
ハイデルもそう住みよいとはいえないよ
神殿が近いと言っても――

MsgEn:
In particular, a short distance after crossing the bridge,
you will find a group of brigands
called the Black Wolf Gang, or something like that.
MsgJp:
特に、橋を渡ってしばらく進んだところに
野盗達が居付いてるだろう
《黒狼団》といったかな

MsgEn: The rogue will appear near the village and continue to the road leading to Rotes 1 those rogues are really troublesome
MsgJp:
村の近くやローテスへ続く街道まで現れて
あのローグ達は本当に困るよ

MsgEn:
Is there any medicine for the disease in the example
If there is another serious case like Pedro's--
MsgJp:
例の病に効く薬はないのか
ペドロのような重症者がまた出たら――

MsgEn:
You've come at a bad time, adventurer.
I don't think we're going to make good wine this year.
MsgJp:
悪い時期に来たね、冒険者さん
今年は良いワインができそうにないよ

MsgEn:
Sick of objects falling from the sky--
Damn!　Is there anything you can do?
MsgJp:
空から降ってきた物体に病気に――
くそ！　何かできる事はないのか

MsgEn: What do you want? I'm busy.
MsgJp: 何だい、あたしゃ忙しいんだ

MsgEn:
Even taking care of pigs isn't free.
It costs a lot of money to feed them.
MsgJp:
ブタの世話だって、タダじゃないんだ
餌代もかかるってのに

MsgEn:
Life is getting tougher and tougher.
And yet these days I even have a weird disease!
Oh no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no no
MsgJp:
暮らしは厳しくなる一方だよ
なのにこの頃は変な病気まで！
あぁ、いやだいやだ

MsgEn:
Sometimes there's a funny smell coming from a dry well.
It's utterly disgusting.
MsgJp:
たまに、枯れ井戸から変な臭いがするんだよ
まったく嫌んなるよ

MsgEn:
All of them!
They've got a sullen look on their faces!
MsgJp:
どいつもこいつも！
しみったれた面しやがってよぉ！

MsgEn:
I've got nothing to look forward to but drinking.
What am I going to do now?
MsgJp:
はぁ～、酒くらいしか楽しみがねぇのに
どうすりゃいいんだまったく！

MsgEn: Lord, what should I have with this alcohol?
MsgJp: 酒のアテ、次はどうすっかなぁ

MsgEn: Nikki, one more glass!
MsgJp: ニキちゃん、もう一杯！

MsgEn:
Hi, Traveler,
Questions you want to ask?　Ask me anything.
MsgJp:
はぁーい、旅人さん
聞きたいこと？　なんでも聞いて

MsgEn:
Not doing so well lately.
Tell is famous for its wine.
Want a drink?
MsgJp:
最近できがイマイチだけど
テルはワインが有名よ
一杯どう？

MsgEn:
You know that abandoned church out back?
They say it's connected to a huge catacombs.
MsgJp:
あんた、裏の廃教会は知ってるかい？
あそこさ、すんごい地下墓地と繋がってるって話よ

MsgEn:
The dry well in the back sometimes smells really bad
I think it has something to do with an epidemic in the village
I have a woman's intuition.
MsgJp:
裏の枯れ井戸、たまにすごい臭うのよ
わたしさぁ、村の流行り病と関係
ある気がするんだよね、女の勘だけど

MsgEn: Are you an Arisen? Did you come on a mission?
MsgJp: 覚者だな？　任務で来たのか

MsgEn:
Do you know about the Oniminaki Bridge, east of the village?
That place is abominably
occupied by goblins now.
MsgJp:
村の東側、《鬼鳴き橋》のことは知ってるか？
あそこは忌々しい事に
今やゴブリン共の占領下だ

MsgEn:
Even if a knight removes strange decorations
even if a sentient being exterminates goblins
the next thing you know, it's right back to normal again
I hate it, I totally do.
MsgJp:
騎士が変な飾りを撤去しても
覚者がゴブリンを退治しても
気が付いたらすぐまた元通りだよ
嫌になるよまったく

MsgEn:
They occupy it and act as bridge guards!
These little demons are shameless.
MsgJp:
占拠したくせに橋守だと！
図々しいにもほどがある、小鬼どもめ

MsgEn:
There are so many problems, one after another.
If only someone could take one quest from the quest board.
That would be a great help.
MsgJp:
次から次へと、問題は山積みだ
どれか一つでもクエストボードの依頼を
受けて貰えれば助かるんだが

MsgEn:
If it's a mission or something at Tel Village,
make sure to visit the guild lodge.
MsgJp:
テル村での任務か何かなら
組合宿に顔を出しておけよ

MsgEn:
There's a strange cold going around in this village right now.
Don't bring illness into the temple.
MsgJp:
今この村じゃ、妙な風邪が流行っててな
神殿に病を持ち込むなよ

MsgEn:
During the orc invasion, it fell to the west of the village
Ale--
MsgJp:
オーク侵攻のおり、村の西に落ちてきた
アレ――

MsgEn: I wonder what that big hunk of rock is after all?
MsgJp: あのでかい岩の塊は、結局何なんだろうな？

MsgEn: Are you looking for a traveling companion, Master Arisen?
MsgJp: 旅の同伴者をお求めでしょうか、覚者殿

MsgEn: May the blessings of The White Dragon, Lady Arisen, be with you.
MsgJp: 白竜様のご加護があらんことを

MsgEn: The radiance of Rift Crystal is always with you.
MsgJp: リムの輝きは常に貴方と共に

MsgEn: If you are reorganizing your membership, please contact me at
MsgJp:
メンバーの再編でしたら
私にお申し付けください

MsgEn: You want something down the road?
MsgJp: この先に用か？

MsgEn:
You want to go beyond this?
I'm--I'm sorry, but I can't do that.
MsgJp:
この先へ行きたいのか？
――悪いが、それはできない

MsgEn:
This is a dangerous area ahead,
only those who have obtained permission from the temple headquarters are allowed to pass.
MsgJp:
この先《ダウ渓谷》は危険地域
通って良いのは、神殿本部の許可を得た者のみだ

MsgEn:
Unless it's a significant mission or accomplishment,
you won't get permission from Captain Gerd.
MsgJp:
よほどの任務か功績でなければ
ゲルト団長の許可は下りないだろうがな

MsgEn:
I have heard that you have obtained permission to proceed.
However, the enemies in Dowe Valley are tough.
Be sure to take enough precautions.
MsgJp:
ああ、お前が許可を得たことは聞いている
先へいくといい
だが《ダウ渓谷》の魔物は手強い
十分用心するのだ

MsgEn:
The "Dow Valley" is currently designated as a danger zone
, which will cause hardship for the residents of Gingen...
MsgJp:
現在この先、《ダウ渓谷》は危険地域に
指定されている
ジンゲンの住民には苦労をかけるがな――

MsgEn: But we can't allow any more orcs and demons to invade
MsgJp:
だがオークと魔物の侵入をこれ以上
許すわけにはいかんのだ

MsgEn:
Only those with permission from temple headquarters
can pass through here.
MsgJp:
ここを通れるのは神殿本部の許可を
得た者のみだ

MsgEn: Which means you need a commensurate mission or accomplishment.
MsgJp:
つまり、相応の任務か功績が必要だと
いうことだ

MsgEn:
Fort Gritten and this gateway are the key to protecting the
Hyder from the orcs--
It's a big responsibility, even for a watchman.
MsgJp:
グリッテン砦とこの関所が、オークどもから
ハイデルを守る要――
見張りとは言え責任重大だよ

MsgEn: What is it?
MsgJp: ああ、何だ？

MsgEn:
The bridge was destroyed by the big water the other day.
If you need to go to Misliu Forest
you'll have to go the other way for now.
MsgJp:
この間の大水で橋が壊れしまってな
ミスリウ森林方面に用があるなら
今は別の道をいくしかないな

MsgEn:
You can reach Pawn Township and Lynnwood through a cave called "Hunter's Loophole"
located just west of Tell Village.
MsgJp:
テル村のすぐ西にある《狩人の抜け穴》
という洞窟を通れば
《ポーン郷》や《リンウッド》へ行くことができるぞ

MsgEn:
In any case, wooden bridges are vulnerable to heavy water.
If they get washed away, they'll be a pain to repair.
MsgJp:
どうにも、木の橋は大水に弱いなぁ
流されたら修理も一苦労だよ

MsgEn:
Sometimes forest demons come out here too.
You be careful too.
MsgJp:
ここはたまに森の魔物も出るんだ
お前も注意しろよ

MsgEn:
A stone bridge wouldn't break
in a little bit.
MsgJp:
石の橋ならちょっとやそっとじゃ
壊れないだろうになぁ

MsgEn:
You want to talk to me about the Tel area?
Let's hear what you have to say.
MsgJp:
テル周辺の事で相談か？
用件を伺おう

MsgEn: Something engulfed in flames swung from the west of Tel--
MsgJp: テルの西に振ってきた炎に包まれた何か――

MsgEn:
It's like a block of black stone, but
it's just creepy.
Some people have seen strange-looking goblins
near it-- some say they've seen them-- and they're not sure what they're supposed to be.
MsgJp:
黒い石の塊のようなものなのだが
不気味でしかたがない
その近くで異様な姿のゴブリンを
見たという者もいる――

MsgEn: As long as it doesn't affect the village, it's fine.
MsgJp: 村に影響がなければいいのだが

MsgEn:
My role is to mediate between Tell and the White Dragon Temple
about the problems that have occurred in the Heidel Plains
If you want to ask me about it, you can visit me anytime.
MsgJp:
わたしの役割はテルと白竜神殿との仲介だ
ハイデル平原で起こった問題について
聞きたければ、いつでも訪れてくれ

MsgEn:
More demons, lack of materials
and above all, the village's illnesses--
are a constant source of worry.
MsgJp:
魔物の増加に資材の不足
そして何より村の病――
悩みの種はつきないものだ

MsgEn:
I would appreciate your help in solving as many problems as possible.
I will be relying on you.
MsgJp:
一つでも多くの問題解決に、協力頂けると助かる
貴君のことは頼りにさせてもらう

MsgEn:
Oh, thank you for coming.
I just had something I wanted to tell you!
MsgJp:
おお、よく来てくれた
ちょうど貴君に伝えたいことがあってな！

MsgEn:
All of the
sub-crystals set up here in the Heidel Plains have been released!
Now it will be easier to visit every corner of Heidel!
MsgJp:
このハイデル平原に設置された
《辺境の礎》が全て解放されたのだ！
これでハイデルの隅々まで足を運びやすくなるだろう

MsgEn:
I hear that you have recently established your position in the Sentinel Corps and are busy
increasing your activities.
Please make use of it for efficient search!
MsgJp:
貴君も最近は覚者隊での地位を築き、
益々の活躍に忙しいと聞いている
効率の良い探索のためにも、ぜひ活用してくれ

MsgEn:
That black mass that fell to the west of Tel--
"Ark", was it?
There are new monsters roaming that area now.
MsgJp:
以前、テルの西に降ってきた黒い塊――
そう、《アーク》といったか
あの付近を新手の魔物が徘徊しはじめてな

今のところ移動する気配は無いが
万が一、村に近寄ることがあれば
混乱は避けられないだろう

MsgEn:
I'd like to know what's going on with the monsters in the area.
If you can help investigate,
please come speak with me again.
MsgJp:
付近の魔物の動向は把握しておきたいのだ
もし調査を頼めるのなら、
あらためてわたしに話しかけてほしい

MsgEn:
That "Ark" that you investigated earlier--
Did you know there is another entrance at the back?
MsgJp:
貴君が以前調査してきてくれた《アーク》だが
裏側にもう一つ出入り口があったのを知っているか？

MsgEn:
Be wary of the possibility that it may be a trap and sealed it off.
But with your current status, there seems to be no need to worry.
Let's remove the seal.
MsgJp:
何かの罠である可能性を警戒して封鎖していたのだが
今の貴君であれば心配は無さそうだ
封鎖を解いておこう

MsgEn:
If you're interested, it may be good to investigate inside.
However, it is certain that there are enemies inside.
Be cautious during the investigation.
MsgJp:
興味があれば中を調べてみるのも良いかもしれぬ
ただ、中に魔物がいることは確実だろう
調査の際は十分に注意しておくことだ

MsgEn:
Please don't think I'm being annoying.
I don't want to lose my Protector of Tel.
MsgJp:
――口うるさいと思わないでくれ
このテルの守り手を失いたくはないのだ

MsgEn:
Ah, you've come at a good time.
I actually have something I want to discuss with you.
MsgJp:
ああ、よいところに来てくれた
実は貴君に相談したいことがあったのだ

MsgEn:
From the vicinity of the 《Ark》 that you have previously surveyed for me
, insects and small animals have been disappearing lately.
MsgJp:
以前調査してきてもらった《アーク》の付近から
最近、虫や小動物の姿が消えているのだ

MsgEn:
There may be a change in the arc
so I need you to go inside
and check it out, can you do that for me?
MsgJp:
アークに変化が起こっているのかも知れん
そこで、貴君に内部を
調査してきてもらいたいのだが、頼めるだろうか

MsgEn:
If you are willing to accept,
please talk to me again
I've been looking around ARC and found out some things
I'll tell you more about it.
MsgJp:
引き受けてくれるようであれば、
あらためてわたしに話しかけてくれ
わたしもアークの周囲を調べてわかったことがある
貴君に詳しく伝えよう

MsgEn: I and the villagers of Tell are very grateful to you for your work
MsgJp:
貴君の働きにはわたしも、テルの村人たちも
とても感謝しているのだ

MsgEn:
This time, due to strong requests from the villagers,
we have decided to have an even better selection of support items.
MsgJp:
今回、村人たちからの強い希望もあって
支援品としてさらに良いものを揃えることにした

MsgEn:
It is not enough to repay your debt to me, but please accept it as a gesture from all of us in the
village.
MsgJp:
貴君への恩に報いるには足りぬが、
村のみなからの気持ちとして受け取ってくれ

MsgEn:
Please keep up the good work.
Be a defender of Tell and Heidel.
MsgJp:
これからも、よろしく頼む
テルとハイデルの守り手であってくれ

MsgEn:
If you have Leo's trust,
or if you let your curiosity get the better of you--
MsgJp:
貴君がレオの信頼を得ているならば、
あるいは好奇心に身を任せるならば――

MsgEn:
So many, many places
will be visited
and many will be waiting to see you in action!
MsgJp:
それだけ多く、様々な地を
訪ねることになるだろう
そして、貴君の活躍を待つ者も多いだろう

MsgEn:
With the decline of the white dragon,
Lestania has been attacked by various mutations and
demons for the past 300 years.
Of course, they have their own problems to deal with.
MsgJp:
白竜が衰えたことで
レスタニアはこの300年、様々な異変や
魔物に襲われるようになった
むろん、抱える問題もそれぞれだ

MsgEn:
When you go to a new place
don't forget to say hello to the Area Master
Some are quirky, but all are proud of their roles!
MsgJp:
新しい土地へ行ったら
エリアマスターへの挨拶を忘れるな
クセの強い者もいるが、皆この役を誇りに思っている

MsgEn:
So, you are on our side
Please make use of us greatly and solve the problems in various places
MsgJp:
つまり、貴君の味方だ
我々を大いに活用しつつ各地の問題を解決してくれ

MsgEn:
You already have our gratitude
Therefore, to the direction of Missleau
I will provide a way to the villages of Pawn Cathedral and Lynwood
MsgJp:
貴君にはすでに恩がある
そこでだ、ミスリウ方面――
ポーン郷やリンウッドの村へ向かう道を提供しよう

MsgEn:
To the west of Tel, there is a cave, the Hunters' Secret Passage
Make sure you can pass through
It is dangerous for the villagers, but you should be able to pass
MsgJp:
テルのすぐ西にある洞窟、《狩人の抜け穴》
を通れるようにしておく
村人にとっては危険だが、貴君なら通れるだろう

MsgEn:
However, there are many bandits and dangerous animals inside
Be wary
MsgJp:
だが、中には野盗の類や危険な獣も多い
十分注意してくれ

MsgEn: It is recommended to check the information on the monsters and items that appear in "Hunters' Secret Passage" in the "Area Information" and "Spot Information."
MsgJp:
《狩人の抜け穴》に出る魔物やアイテムの
情報は、《エリア情報》の《スポット情報》
で確認していくことを勧めよう

MsgEn:
Sorry for all the help you've been giving me
I've got a support package for you
Keep up the good work!
MsgJp:
色々手伝ってもらってすまないな
貴君への支援品を用意した
これからも手を貸してくれ

MsgEn:
By the way, with the decline of the white dragon,
Lestania has been attacked by various mutations and
demons for the last 300 years!
MsgJp:
ところで、白竜が衰えたことで
レスタニアはこの300年、様々な異変や
魔物に襲われるようになった

MsgEn: ――Heidell is no exception to that.
MsgJp: ――それは、このハイデルも例外ではない

MsgEn:
As you may already know
Tell has been suffering from a mysterious plague
for some time now
MsgJp:
すでに知っているかもしれないが
テルはここしばらく謎の疫病に
苦しめられている

MsgEn: The investigation of the cause of the epidemic has been challenged by many Arisen people, but it is still far from being solved.
MsgJp:
疫病の原因調査は、これまでに多くの
覚者が挑んだが、未だ解決には遠い

MsgEn:
I know it's too much for you right now
but we'll talk more about it when the time comes.
MsgJp:
今の貴君の手にはあまるだろうが
いずれ時が来れば詳しく話そう

MsgEn: Keep up the good work Tel and Heidel at
MsgJp:
これからも、テルとハイデルを
よろしく頼む

MsgEn: Well, you see, something troublesome has happened. It seems that a troublesome goblin has returned to the bridge commonly known as the "Roaring Demon Bridge" to the east of Tel.
MsgJp:
――実はな、困ったことになったのだ
テルの東にある通称《鬼鳴き橋》に
厄介なゴブリンが戻ってきたようなのだ

MsgEn:
He is the leader of the small demons who call themselves
"Bridgekeeper Binshaw" and have occupied and entrenched themselves in the eastern bridge.
Can you defeat and get rid of them if you see them?
MsgJp:
ヤツは《橋守のビンシャ》と名乗り
東の橋を占拠し陣取っている小鬼どものリーダーだ
見かけたらそいつを退治してくれないだろうか

MsgEn:
It seems that he has taken several
"high-grade equipment" from the knights and the Arisen he has defeated.
MsgJp:
ヤツは返り討ちにした騎士や覚者から
いくつも《グレードの高い装備》を奪っているらしい

MsgEn:
If you can subdue him, you will also be able to retrieve it
and get it back.
Please keep that in mind.
MsgJp:
討伐できたなら、貴君がそれを
奪い返し手に入れることもできるだろう
頭のかたすみに留めておいてくれ

MsgEn:
I will express my gratitude on behalf of the village.
You are a hero to Tel.
MsgJp:
村を代表して礼を言う
貴君はテルにとって英雄だ

MsgEn:
I have an idea,
please continue to rely on me, I will try to find what I can do for you
MsgJp:
これからもどうかよろしく頼む
わたしも貴君のために、できることを探してみよう

MsgEn: Here's good news for you!
MsgJp: こちらから貴君に朗報だ！

MsgEn:
The South Heidel Bridge, which had been damaged by the flood, was finally restored.
Lumber arrived from Lynnwood.
MsgJp:
大水で損壊していた
《南ハイデル大橋》がようやく復旧したのだ
リンウッドから木材が届いてな

MsgEn:
Now it's easier to get to
from the
tell to the Misliu Forest without having to go through the loophole in the example!
MsgJp:
これで、例の抜け穴を通らずとも
テルからミスリウ森林方面に
行きやすくなったぞ

MsgEn:
Oh, you've come!
I have something to tell you about
-- yes, about the "Heidel Underground Mausoleum Deep"
MsgJp:
おお、来てくれたか！
貴君に伝えねばならんことがあったのだ
――そう、例の《ハイデル地下霊廟　深部》
についてだ

MsgEn:
Below the second basement floor of the mausoleum
the previous area master
had it sealed off early on!
MsgJp:
霊廟の地下二階より下は
先代のエリアマスターが
早期の段階で封鎖していたよ

MsgEn:
The notebook I found in that "open road"
had that crap and the
spelling to break the blockade deep in the mausoleum.
MsgJp:
あの《開かずの路》で発見した手帳に
そのくだりと、霊廟深部の封鎖を解除する
スペリングが書かれていた

MsgEn:
Now, you should be able to enter the "Hidell Catacombs Depths"
.
MsgJp:
今なら、《ハイデル地下霊廟　深部》へ
入る事ができるだろう

MsgEn:
If you want to continue the investigation
please talk to me again.
MsgJp:
もし調査の続きを頼めるなら
あらためて、わたしに話しかけてくれ

MsgEn:
I'm always sorry
You've been a real help
Let me thank you from the bottom of my heart.
MsgJp:
いつもすまないな
お陰で本当に助かっている
心ばかりだが、礼をさせてくれ

MsgEn:
――I think it's about time I inform you about that matter.
About Menvili, the man who was a priest at the infamous Heidell Church.
MsgJp:
――そろそろ貴君にもあの件を伝えておこう
例のハイデル教会の司祭だった男
メンヴィルについてだ

MsgEn:
Decades ago, the priest was
suspected by the villagers of pagan worship,
chased and disappeared.
MsgJp:
もう数十年前のことだが、司祭は
村人から邪教崇拝の疑いをかけられて
追われ、失踪した

MsgEn:
Because a number of dead bodies and a
suspicious altar were found in the basement of a priest's house.
MsgJp:
司祭の家の地下室から、多数の死体と
怪しい祭壇が発見されたからだ

MsgEn:
Perhaps you have an idea as well?
That abandoned house where you exterminated the monsters earlier--
That place is none other than the residence of Priest Menvili.
MsgJp:
――貴君も心当たりがあるだろう？
前に貴君が魔物退治をしたあの廃屋――
あそここそ、司祭メンヴィルの住居なのだ

MsgEn:
Since then, the passage to the altar that leads from the basement is called
"The Open Road" and is a place that should be sealed
inherited from the previous area master.
MsgJp:
以来、地下室から続く祭壇への通路は
《開かずの路》と呼ばれ、封印すべき場所として
先代のエリアマスターから受け継いだ

MsgEn:
I'm going to check inside too
if you're interested.
MsgJp:
わたしも中を調べるつもりだが
貴君も興味があれば行ってみてくれ

MsgEn:
Priests, mausoleums, and this "open road" -
I can't help but think it has something to do with the plague.
MsgJp:
司祭、霊廟、そしてこの《開かずの路》――
疫病と何か関係がある気がしてならない

MsgEn:
You've been helping me a lot.
I'd like to give you a hand again, if you don't mind.
MsgJp:
貴君には手伝ってもらってばかりだな
良ければまた手を貸してくれ

MsgEn:
Have you ever heard of the "Blood Soak Riverbed"?
A very large lizardman
has come to inhabit that place!
MsgJp:
貴君、《血すすぎ河原》のことは知っているか？
あの場所に、ひときわ体の大きなリザードマンが
棲みつくようになったのだ

MsgEn:
The riverbank is also close to Tel
before that giant lizard attacks villagers and livestock
MsgJp:
河原はテルとも近い
かの大トカゲが村人や家畜を襲う前に
退治してくれないだろうか

MsgEn: By the way, have you tried going to that 'Blocked Passage' we mentioned before, my lord?
MsgJp:
――貴君、そういえば例の《開かずの路》へは
行ってみたか？

MsgEn:
I didn't realize it was connected to the village's dry well--
I'd be horrified if it hadn't
MsgJp:
村の枯れ井戸と繋がっていたとは――
あれが、枯れていなかったらと思うと
ぞっとする話だ

MsgEn:
Sometimes it smells like something, too.
Perhaps that was the reason--
MsgJp:
たまに何やら臭うのも
おそらくそのせいだったのだな――

MsgEn:
I also checked that place and found a clue
that looks like my predecessor's notebook
I'll pass it on to you when I've done some more research.
MsgJp:
わたしもあの場所を調べ、手掛かりらしき
先代の手帳を見つけたのだ
もう少し調べがついたら、貴君に伝えよう

MsgEn:
Oh, by the way!
I have something for you.
MsgJp:
ああ、そう言えば！
渡したいものがあるのだ

MsgEn:
I have kept this for you,
please make use of it on your journey
MsgJp:
貴君のためにこれを取っておいた
どうか、旅に役立ててくれ

MsgEn:
Do you know the most dangerous place in Heidel,
?
MsgJp:
貴君、ハイデルで最も危険な場所は
どこか知っているか？

MsgEn:
It is the underground cemetery of the church in the east,
called "Hidell Catacombs"
MsgJp:
それは、東にある教会の地下墓地
《ハイデル地下霊廟》だ

MsgEn:
Few of the sentient people who went to investigate have returned
and more of the departed have wandered off, so
we've been on lockdown for a while now--and we're still here.
MsgJp:
調査に向かった覚者もほとんど戻らず
さまよい出る亡者も増えたので、
ここしばらく封鎖していたんだが――

MsgEn:
You might be able to check out that place
and open up the "Heidel Underground Mausoleum"!
MsgJp:
貴君ならあの場所を調べることが
できるかもしれん
《ハイデル地下霊廟》を開放しよう

MsgEn:
I'll leave it to you to decide what to do, but
If you go, there's something I'd like to ask of you.
Please speak with me again if so.
MsgJp:
どうするかは委ねるが
行くなら頼みたいことがある
その気があれば、あらためて話しかけてくれ

MsgEn:
Oh, it's you.
I've managed to get some good supplies.
Please take this with you.
MsgJp:
おお、貴君か
良い物資が手に入ったのだ
これを持って行ってくれ

MsgEn:
I wanted to do something for you
in return for all you have done for Tel and Heidell.
MsgJp:
テルとハイデルのため力を尽くしてくれた
貴君に、わたしもできることを探してみたのだ

MsgEn:
I've arranged for the best support goods we can currently get.
Though, I fear it is still far from enough to repay your kindness.
MsgJp:
現状手に入る最も良い支援品を
手配しておいた
貴君の恩に報いるには、とうてい足りていないがな

MsgEn:
Please keep up the good work.
Be a defender of Tell and Heidel.
MsgJp:
これからも、よろしく頼む
テルとハイデルの守り手であってくれ

MsgEn:
You've made it!
Here are the support goods. Please take them.
MsgJp:
よく来たな
今回の支援品だ、受け取ってくれ

MsgEn:
You know, my dear, that the streets of Heidel are often
riddled with wild thieves, don't you?
MsgJp:
貴君、ハイデルの街道に野盗が度々
出ることは知っているだろう？

MsgEn:
Their name is the Black Wolf Bandit Group
, a bandit group that has its hideout in the east.
MsgJp:
ヤツらの名は《黒狼団》
東のアジトに居を構える盗賊集団だ

MsgEn:
The leader, Ladan, who was wanted by the Temple and disappeared
, has apparently returned
to his hideout!
MsgJp:
神殿から指名手配され姿を消していた
その首領ラダンが、どうやらアジトに
戻ってきたらしい

MsgEn:
It is said that they have stolen a considerable amount of expensive accessories and jewelry
.
MsgJp:
連中は、高価なアクセサリーや宝飾品を
かなりの量奪っているという話だ

MsgEn:
Now it's not the Sentinel Corps or the Knights, it's you.
Keep an eye out for them.
MsgJp:
今や覚者隊でも騎士団でもなく、貴君が頼りだ
ヤツらの動向に目を光らせておいてくれ

MsgEn:
Hey, you--
took care of me during the Gardolyn debacle.
MsgJp:
やあ、貴君は――
ガルドリンの騒動では世話になったな

MsgEn:
By the way, how much did you know about the other side of that one
?
MsgJp:
ところで、あの一件の裏側を
貴君はどこまで知っていた？

MsgEn:
There's a young girl struggling
with an ailing mother...
MsgJp:
病に倒れた母親をかかえ
苦労している若い娘がいて――

MsgEn:
Galdrin heard about it and came up with the idea of
gambling over demon slaying.
The goal, of course, is to get her the money.
MsgJp:
その話を聞いたガルドリンが
魔物退治を巡る賭博を思いついたらしい
もちろん、彼女に金を渡すことが目的だ

MsgEn:
The father and son took a hot spring bath in Kinoza and left
If you ever get a chance to meet Galdrin,
tell him I was impressed.
MsgJp:
親子はキノザの温泉で湯治をすると
旅立っていった
もしガルドリンに会う機会があったら
わたしが感服していたと伝えてくれ

MsgEn:
Being an area master is quite a
difficult job, and I'm not sure I've ever had to do it...
MsgJp:
エリアマスターとはこれでなかなか
難儀な仕事でな――

MsgEn: However, I am very proud to think that I am contributing to the Temple and the White Dragon by assisting the Arisen!
MsgJp:
しかし、覚者の援助をすることで
神殿、そして白竜に貢献していると思うと
大変に誇らしい

MsgEn: Please make use of it as much as possible
MsgJp: せいぜい、活用してやってくれ

MsgEn:
I hear that your performance was
brilliant.
MsgJp:
貴君の活躍は
見事なものだったと聞いているぞ

MsgEn:
Each Area Master in each area will be delighted,
and of course, so am I
Thank you for your hard work
MsgJp:
各地のエリアマスターも喜んでいることだろう
もちろん、わたしもだ
ごくろうだった

MsgEn: How about forest materials?
MsgJp: 森の素材はいかが？

MsgEn:
We have good materials here
Herbs and mushrooms, as well as animals, are abundant here
MsgJp:
いい素材が揃ってるわ
ここにはハーブもキノコも、獣たちも
たくさんいるからね

MsgEn:
We deal with good lumber here
It's the greatest gift that the forest provides
MsgJp:
うちではいい木材を扱ってるわよ
森がくれる一番の恵みね

MsgEn: In this village, everyone cherishes the gift of the forest
MsgJp:
この村では、みんなが森の恵みを
大切にしてるのよ

MsgEn:
Rasai!
If you like what you see, you can buy it at
, right?
MsgJp:
らっしゃい！
気に入ったのがあったら
買ってってくれよな！

MsgEn:
There's a lot to discover in the forest, but there's also a lot of danger.
If you're going, be well prepared!
MsgJp:
森は発見も多いが危険も多い
行くなら十分準備してけよな！

MsgEn:
When it comes to animal tusks, hides and meat
Lynnwood is the best!
All the men here can at least hunt!
MsgJp:
動物の牙や皮、肉に関しちゃ
リンウッドが一番さ！
ここの男は全員、狩りくらいはできるんだぜ

MsgEn:
The other day, I got my ass chewed out by a Lizardman
!
Well, that's good, that's good, that's good.
MsgJp:
こないだ、リザードマンに
ケツをかじられちまってよ！
いやぁまいったまいった

MsgEn:
Nice to see you in Lynnwood.
Let me know if you need anything.
MsgJp:
リンウッドによく来たな
用があれば言ってくれ

MsgEn:
Oh, do you plan to stay? If you are going to
<VAL PRICE_INN>, what will you do?
MsgJp:
おお、泊っていくか、だったら
<VAL PRICE_INN>だが、どうする？

MsgEn: Yes
MsgJp: はい

MsgEn: No
MsgJp: いいえ

MsgEn:
Mm, "The Weakening Cure"
then<VAL PRICE_WEAK>but what do you do?
MsgJp:
うむ、《弱化の治療》だな
だったら<VAL PRICE_WEAK>だが、どうする？

MsgEn: Yes
MsgJp: はい

MsgEn: No
MsgJp: いいえ

MsgEn:
But from the looks of it, you're not "weakened."
Stay the night and get some rest.
MsgJp:
だが見た所、あんたは《弱化》ではないようだ
泊ってゆっくり休むといい

MsgEn:
Oh, you want to take a break?
Of course I won't take any money from you.
You're an important problem solver for the village.
MsgJp:
おお、休んでいくか？
もちろんあんたからお代を取ったりはしないよ
村にとっての大事な問題解決役だからな

MsgEn: Yes
MsgJp: はい

MsgEn: No
MsgJp: いいえ

MsgEn:
Patricia is in charge of the village's problems.
You can help her if you'd like.
MsgJp:
村の問題はパトリシアに任せている
良ければ彼女の力になってくれないか

MsgEn:
Have you walked through the Misliu Forest?
To the west is the Cathedral of the Pawns, "Pawn Township"
and there are many natural caves and ruins from the olden times
There is no shortage of places to explore!
MsgJp:
ミスリウ森林は歩いたか？
西にはポーン達の聖堂《ポーン郷》
それに多くの自然洞窟や、旧時代の遺跡もある
探索場所には事欠かないぞ

MsgEn:
Take your time and stay with us, my learned friend.
If you are free, I would also appreciate it if you could look over the "Quest Board" at
MsgJp:
ゆっくり滞在していってくれ、覚者よ
もし手すきなら、《クエストボード》にも
目を通して貰えるとありがたい

MsgEn:
Lynnwood is a village of lumberjacks and hunters.
If you need materials from the woods, hit
Miranda.
MsgJp:
リンウッドは木こりと狩人の村だ
森で採れる素材が必要なら
ミランダを当たるといい

MsgEn:
There is a house
south of Misriu forest where a female magician
lives.
MsgJp:
ミスリウ森林の南にぽつんと一軒家が
あるんだがな、そこには女性魔術師が
暮らしてるんだ

MsgEn:
Her name is Emelada.
If you want to be an apprentice sorceress,
you have to be approved by Patricia of the White Deer Pavilion.
MsgJp:
エメラダさんっていうんだが
もし魔術師として弟子入りを希望するなら
白鹿亭のパトリシアに認められなきゃいけないぞ

MsgEn: Because I heard that only the Arisen she introduced me to can learn witchcraft from Ms. Emerada.
MsgJp:
彼女の紹介した覚者しか、エメラダさんから
魔術は習えないらしいから

MsgEn: Have you been to Glowworm Cave?
MsgJp: 《燐光虫の洞窟》には行ったか？

MsgEn:
It's a dangerous place, but I hear it's so beautiful in the back it's like
you're lost in a starry sky
I wish I could see it too!
MsgJp:
危険なところなんだが、奥はまるで
星空に迷い込んだかのように美しいらしい
俺も見てみたいもんだなぁ

MsgEn: Hello, is there something you want to ask?
MsgJp: やぁ、何か聞きたいことでも？

MsgEn:
There are a few bad ape's
in the Misliw forest.
MsgJp:
ミスリウの森には、悪さを働くエイプが
何匹かいるんだ

MsgEn:
They were nicknamed roaring monkeys, ripping monkeys, and pig-eating monkeys
, respectively.
Well, they kidnap livestock and attack hunters
as much as they want.
MsgJp:
それぞれ、唸り猿、裂き猿、豚喰い猿
ってあだ名がついててね
まぁ家畜は攫うわ狩人は襲うわ
やりたいほうだいでね

MsgEn:
Their territory is marked by abandoned houses.
You should be careful where it smells or looks creepy.
MsgJp:
やつらの縄張りは、廃屋が目印だ
臭ったり気味悪いところは注意した方がいい

MsgEn:
It's orcs, it's war, it's pessimism.
And there's nothing we can do about it.
Well, it's going to happen!
MsgJp:
オークだ戦争だって、悲観したって
どうにもできないしね
ま、なるようになるわよ！

MsgEn:
You look so difficult. Are you thinking?
I don't mind, I don't mind!
MsgJp:
難しい顔してるわね、考え事？
気にしない気にしない！

MsgEn:
Dear knight, dear savant!　I'm counting on you.
Really, really!
MsgJp:
騎士様、覚者様！　頼りにしてるんだから
ほんとよ、ほんと！

MsgEn: Ahaha! Good day!
MsgJp: あっはは！　こんにちは！

MsgEn:
The other day I was about to cut down a big tree
and all of a sudden it started moving!
MsgJp:
こないだ、でかい木を切り倒そうとしたら
突然そいつが動き始めてなぁ！

MsgEn:
It's an Ent, an Ent!
That scared the hell out of me
MsgJp:
エントだよ、エント！
あれは腰を抜かしたよ

MsgEn:
I was outside taking a dip in the river
and before I knew it, there were Lizardmen
all around me!　It was really chilling!
MsgJp:
前に、外の川で水浴びしてたんだ
そしたらいつの間にか周りはリザードマン
だらけでなぁ！　ホント肝を冷やしたよ

MsgEn:
My grandson, Ecole, is a good, hard-working kid, but
he wants to go outside.
I'm worried he's in danger.
MsgJp:
孫のエコールは働き者のいい子なんだが
外へ出たがっててなぁ
危険な目に合わんか心配だよ

MsgEn: Hey, what's up, traveler?
MsgJp: おう、なんだい旅人さん

MsgEn:
In the depths of the forest, there is an ancient ruins from some unknown
era
MsgJp:
森の奥にはいつの時代のか分からん
古い遺跡があるんだよ

MsgEn:
It's called the "Ancient Ritual Site".
I wonder what on earth it's for?
MsgJp:
《古の祭祀場》と呼ばれててなぁ
いったい何のための場所なんだろうなぁ

MsgEn:
You know, I once heard a
tremendous ground shaking from the ritual hall--
I don't know what happened.
MsgJp:
そういえば以前、祭祀場の方から
ものすごい地響きがしたことがあったな――
何が起こったかは知らんが

MsgEn:
Have you tried climbing this watchtower?
The view is beautiful!
MsgJp:
この見張り塔登ってみた？
景色が綺麗だよ！

MsgEn:
One of these days I'd like to travel around
I love this village, but I'd like to see the rest of the land for myself
and walk around it.
MsgJp:
そのうち、あちこち旅をしたいの
この村も好きだけど、他の土地を自分で見て
歩いてみたいんだ

MsgEn:
Mahal and his friends love to play hide and seek.
I play too and it's fun!
If you don't know the forest, though, you'll get lost.
MsgJp:
マハル達、かくれんぼが大好きでさ
わたしも遊ぶんだけど面白いよ！
森を知らないひとがやると迷っちゃうけどね

MsgEn: Hello!
MsgJp: こんにちはっ！

MsgEn:
Hm?　You're a savant or
on a mission?
MsgJp:
うん？　覚者か
任務で来たのか？

MsgEn:
Sometimes forest beasts and demons come
very close to the village, be very careful!
MsgJp:
たまに森の獣や魔物が村のすぐ近くまで
来ることがある、十分気をつけろよ

MsgEn:
We, the Knights of the White Guard, protect
the entire continent as the local guards.
MsgJp:
われわれ白衛騎士団は、各地の衛兵として
大陸全土を守っている

MsgEn: This is the village of Linwood in Mysree Forest.
MsgJp: ここはミスリウ森林の村、リンウッドだ

MsgEn:
There are many different kinds of demons in the forest,
but the most common are the forest dwarves--
forest goblins.
MsgJp:
森には様々な魔物がいるが
中でも多いのは森小人――
フォレストゴブリン達だ

MsgEn:
To the northeast of the village, there is a "forest dwarves' village" where they are huddled
Stay away from them as much as possible!
MsgJp:
村の北東には、やつらの群れる
《森小人の集落》がある
できるだけ近づかんようにな

MsgEn:
Hey, hey, I saw something the other day!
A very big entry!
MsgJp:
ねぇねぇ、こないだぼく見たんだよ！
すっごい大きなエント！！

MsgEn:
I was looking at it from the watchtower and it was really there.
But then it went away...
It's true, he really saw it!
MsgJp:
見張り塔から眺めてたらほんとにいたんだ
でもそのあとどこかいっちゃって――
ホントだよ、ホントに見たんだって！

MsgEn:
Hey, there's an old grave near the waterfall
that's a long way from the village
It's not a village grave, and I wonder whose grave it is.
MsgJp:
なぁ、村からずーっと離れた滝の近くに
古いお墓があるんだ
村のお墓でもないし、誰のお墓なんだろ

MsgEn:
Hey, you came from the temple!
I wish I could go there!
MsgJp:
ねぇ、神殿から来たんでしょ！？
いいなー、ぼくも行ってみたいな！

MsgEn: What?
MsgJp: えっ、なぁに？

MsgEn:
I'm going to be a
wizard when I grow up!
MsgJp:
わたしねー、大きくなったら
魔法使いになるの！

MsgEn:
Hey hey listen, I talked to a beautiful
woman who lives in a house in the forest before!
She said she's a magician!
MsgJp:
ねぇねぇ聞いて、前に森の家に住んでる
綺麗な女の人とお話したんだよ！
魔法使いなんだって！

MsgEn: Aren't we playing hide-and-seek today, Mahal and the others?
MsgJp: 今日はかくれんぼしないのかなー、マハル達

MsgEn: Hello, traveler!
MsgJp: こんにちは、旅人さん！

MsgEn:
I often go to the woods with my sister Ekor!
My sister is faster than a rabbit!
MsgJp:
エコール姉ちゃんとよく森に行くんだ！
姉ちゃん、ウサギより足早いんだぜ！

MsgEn:
Hehehe
I sneaked up to the Cave of the Phosphorescent Worms
once before!　I was pissed, though.
MsgJp:
へっへー
前にこっそり《燐光虫の洞窟》まで
いったんだぜ！　怒られちゃったけどな

MsgEn:
I'll be a full-fledged hunter soon.
I'm a Lynnwood man!
MsgJp:
オレも早く一人前の狩人になるんだ
リンウッドの男だからな！

MsgEn: Huh, do you need something from me?
MsgJp: えっ、オレになんか用？

MsgEn: May the blessing of the White Dragon be upon you
MsgJp: 白竜さまのご加護があらんことを

MsgEn: The radiance of Rift Crystal is always with you.
MsgJp: リムの輝きは常に貴方と共に

MsgEn: If you are thinking of reorganizing your party members, please do not hesitate to ask.
MsgJp:
メンバーの再編をお考えでしたら
なんなりと

MsgEn: Are you looking for a travel companion, Lord Arisen?
MsgJp: 旅の同伴者をお求めですか？　覚者様

MsgEn:
If you're looking for a case in the Misriu area,
I can take care of it.
MsgJp:
ミスリウ一帯の案件なら
私が預かっているわ

MsgEn:
Lynwood has a long history of contact
with the deep forest and its surroundings.
MsgJp:
リンウッドは深部の森やその周辺とも
昔から交流があるの

MsgEn:
Camus and Emerada of the Pawn Cathedral
have taken good care of me.
MsgJp:
ポーン郷のカミュ様やエメラダには
よくお世話になってるしね

MsgEn:
Be careful when you travel to the caves and backcountry.
If you run into a troll or an ent, there will be trouble.
MsgJp:
洞窟や奥地に行く時は気を付けてね
トロールやエントと出くわしたら大変よ

MsgEn:
The forests have become more dangerous, 
and it's getting more difficult to gather wood.
MsgJp:
森が危なくなって、木材の調達も
難しくなってきたわ

MsgEn: You may already know that something called Subcrystal is going to be installed in various places
MsgJp:
もう知ってるかもしれないけど
《辺境の礎》っていうのが各地に
設置されることになったでしょう

MsgEn:
This time, all of Misriu's "frontier foundations" are now available
I thought I'd let you know about this!
MsgJp:
今回、ミスリウの《辺境の礎》全てが
使えるようになったのよ
このことをぜひ貴方にも知らせておこうと思って！

MsgEn:
The woods are so convoluted that
it's easy to get lost or take a long time to get around.
I think this will make things a little easier.
MsgJp:
森の中は入り組んでいるから
迷いやすかったり移動に時間がかかりがちだけど
これで少しは楽になると思うわ

MsgEn:
You've come just in time!
There's something I needed to speak with you about.
MsgJp:
ちょうどいいところに来てくれたわ！
貴方に相談したいことがあったの

MsgEn:
There's a single road that leads from Lynwood
to the depths of Mysree Grove.
A nightmare known as "Maritia the Kidnapper"
has taken up residence along that road.
MsgJp:
リンウッドからミスリウ森林深部に行く
一本道があるでしょう
その途中に、“子攫いのメリーティア”と呼ばれる
ナイトメアが巣食ってしまったの

MsgEn:
It's the most vicious of the nightmares and
with my lacking skill, I can't even get close to it.
Please, can you help me get rid of it?
MsgJp:
ナイトメアの中でも凶悪な個体で
生半可な腕では近付くことすらできないのよ
お願い、貴方に退治を頼めないかしら

MsgEn:
If you want to exterminate them, talk to me before you leave
and I'll explain more.
MsgJp:
退治してくれるなら出発前に
私に話しかけてちょうだい
くわしく説明するわ

MsgEn:
That's right, I've been meaning to tell you.
I've decided to unseal those ruins in the forest,
the "Mysree Ancient Burial Mound".
MsgJp:
そうそう、貴方に伝えようと思っていたことがあるの
森の中にある遺跡《ミスリウ古墳墓》の封鎖を
解くことにしたのよ

MsgEn:
There have been continued calls
to release it for historical research,
but not knowing what could occur, we had to keep it sealed off.
MsgJp:
以前から歴史研究のために解放を
望む声があったんだけど、万が一のことを考えると
封鎖しておかざるをえなかったのよね

MsgEn:
But now that a reliable Arisen such as yourself
will be stopping by Mysree,
I couldn't miss this opportunity!
MsgJp:
けど、今は貴方という頼もしい覚者さんが
ミスリウに寄ってくれることだし
この機会にと思ってね！

MsgEn:
Hmmm, Arisen--
Could I speak with you a moment?
MsgJp:
うーん、覚者さん――
ちょっと相談してもいいかしら

MsgEn:
Actually, about the
Ancient Burial Mound that was unsealed recently,
a problem has occurred right away...
MsgJp:
実は、この前封鎖を解いた
《ミスリウ古墳墓》についてなんだけど
さっそく問題が起こっちゃって――

MsgEn:
It seems that the historian who entered that ancient burial mound was attacked by
enemies, but
we don't even know what kind of enemies they are
MsgJp:
あの古墳墓に入った歴史家が
魔物に襲われたらしいんだけど
どんな魔物なのかすらわからないの

MsgEn:
If we leave it like this,
we will have to seal that ancient burial mound again
while still having this mystery
MsgJp:
このままじゃ謎を抱えたまま
あの古墳墓をもう一度
封鎖しないといけなくなるわ

MsgEn:
I wonder if it's possible to solve this with your power?
If I can ask you to investigate,
I will explain in detail, so please talk to me again
MsgJp:
貴方の力で何とかならないかしら
調査を頼めるようなら、くわしく
説明するから、もう一度私に声をかけてね

MsgEn:
Thank you for always helping Lynnwood.
I thank you on behalf of all the residents of this forest!
MsgJp:
いつもリンウッドを助けてくれてありがとう
この森の住人を代表してお礼を言うわ！

MsgEn: I'd like to help you more, too, but I can only help you with supplies at
MsgJp:
私も、もっと貴方の力になりたいんだけど
物資での支援くらいしかできないから――

MsgEn:
At the very least, I've arranged to have something better
I hope it helps!
MsgJp:
せめてもの気持ちとして、もっといいものを
揃えられるように手配しておいたの
役立ててくれると嬉しいわ

MsgEn: Thanks to you, everyone in Lynwood is able to do this
MsgJp:
リンウッドの皆がこうしてられるのも
貴方のお陰よね

MsgEn:
I know there's not much I can do
but I'll try to repay you somehow!
So keep up the good work!
MsgJp:
私にできることなんてたかが
知れてるだろうけど、何とか恩返しするわ！
だから、今後ともよろしくね

MsgEn:
Your achievements are being talked about!
Yes, as thanks this time
Please let me rely on you again!
MsgJp:
貴方の活躍、噂になってるわよ！
はい、今回のお礼
ぜひまたお願いね！

MsgEn:
Thank you for helping with the village's work,
I have to thank you for something
MsgJp:
村の仕事を手伝ってくれて、ありがとう
何かお礼しないとね

MsgEn:
Thanks for coming!
We all paid a little
for this one.
MsgJp:
来てくれてありがとう！
これ、リンウッドのみんなで少しずつ
出しあって買ったの

MsgEn: It's a symbol of our daily gratitude to everyone
MsgJp: みんなからの、日ごろの感謝の印よ

MsgEn:
Hey, I saved this for you to use
I hope it's of some use.
MsgJp:
ねぇ、これ、貴方に使ってもらおうと
思ってとっといたの
少しは何かの役に立つかしら

MsgEn:
Hello
I'm Patricia, an Area Master
Nice to meet you
MsgJp:
こんにちは
私はエリアマスターのパトリシア
よろしくね

MsgEn:
This area of Misliu is densely wooded
so be careful not to get lost
especially if you are off the path, don't rely on your instincts
always check the map!
MsgJp:
このミスリウ一帯は、木々が密生しているから
迷わないように注意してね
特に道から外れた時はカンに頼らず
かならず地図を確認するのよ

MsgEn:
Also, I'd like to share a bit about the current status of
in the Missouri Forest.
MsgJp:
それと、すこしミスリウ森林の
現状について共有しておくわね

MsgEn:
Since Master Hakuryu's power waned,
demons and beasts everywhere in the forest have become
more ferocious.
MsgJp:
白竜様の力が衰えてから
森のいたるところで魔物や獣たちが
凶暴化してきているの

MsgEn:
Right now, we're just dealing with the anomalies that have occurred in various places
in turn.
Be especially careful in caves and near water!
MsgJp:
今は、各所で起こった異変に
順番に対処するしかないという状況よ
特に、洞窟や水辺には注意して

MsgEn:
I also have some people I'd like to introduce you to if I find out
that you're someone I can trust--
I'll let you do that
after I see how well you're doing.
MsgJp:
あと、あなたが信頼できる人だって
分かったら紹介したい人もいるんだけど――
それは、あなたの活躍を見てからに
させてもらうわ

MsgEn:
Oh, yeah.
Use this. It's not much, but...
MsgJp:
あ、そうだ
これ使って、大した物じゃないけど

MsgEn: Thank you for helping with the village's work.
MsgJp: 村の仕事を手伝ってくれて、ありがとう

MsgEn:
I'll be happy to assist you with supplies at
so that we can support you.
MsgJp:
あなたのサポートができるよう
物資面で支援するわね

MsgEn:
Quickly, we have a problem.
Did you know there is a
settlement of forest goblins northeast of Lynnwood?
MsgJp:
さっそくだけど、問題発生よ
リンウッドの北東にフォレストゴブリン達の
集落があるのは知ってる？

MsgEn:
I got a report that I saw the head of them
in that "forest dwarves' settlement".
MsgJp:
その《森小人の集落》で、連中の首領を
見かけたって報告があったの

MsgEn:
Chief of the Forest Dwarfs, "Griga the Green Demon"
He used to be in a more secluded part of the forest.
MsgJp:
森小人の長、《緑鬼グリッガ》
前はもっと森の奥地にいたはずなのに

MsgEn:
If I see you, I'll see if I can get a head start.
I want you to keep an eye out too.
MsgJp:
もし見かけたら、先手を打てないかしら
貴方にも気をつけておいてほしいの

MsgEn:
You've come to the right place!
The repairs to the West Misriu Bridge are finally finished.
MsgJp:
良い所に来たわね！
《西ミスリウ橋》の修繕がようやく終わったの

MsgEn:
This is all thanks to you helping
solve the village's problems
I'm sure it will make it easier to get to and from Pawnee Township.
MsgJp:
これも、あなたが村の問題解決を
手伝ってくれたお陰よ
ポーン郷との行き来が楽になるんじゃないかしら

MsgEn:
If you can cross the bridge, you won't have to use Rift Teleport
for such a distance
MsgJp:
橋さえ通れれば、わざわざリム転移を
使うほどの距離でもなくなるからね

MsgEn:
I was going to tell you about something
there is an old time waterway along the river northeast of the village called the Lynnwood Underground Canal
MsgJp:
貴方に言おうと思ってたことがあったの
村の北東、川沿いに《リンウッド地下水路》
っていう旧時代の水路があるのよ

MsgEn:
There are so many Lizardmen that it's dangerous,
we had to close the entrance, but somehow
the peddlers got in and--
MsgJp:
リザードマンが多くて危険だから、
入口を閉鎖してたんだけど、どういうわけか
行商人が入ってしまって――

MsgEn:
I think it was from
where the lock I was hanging was a commercial one--I don't know.
MsgJp:
私が掛けていた鍵が、市販品だった
からかしら――

MsgEn:
I went to the canal as soon as I got the call for help
but I can't see him anymore
so maybe he's around
I just want you to keep an eye out for him.
MsgJp:
救援要請があってすぐ水路に向かったん
だけど、もう姿が見えなくてね
もしかしたら近くに居るかもしれないから
少し気にしておいてほしいの

MsgEn: I wonder what happened to them in the end?
MsgJp: 結局彼ら、どうなったのかしら――

MsgEn:
Word is getting out about your success!
Keep up the good work!
MsgJp:
貴方の活躍、噂になってるわよ！
これからもお願いね！

MsgEn:
I can only repay with support for supplies
When I’m not other stuff in my own way
I tried hitting it
If I can help even a little bit
MsgJp:
物資の支援くらいしか報いられないから
私の方でも別の品が手に入らないか
当たってみたの
少しでも助けになればいいんだけど

MsgEn:
Yes!
I have someone I want to introduce to you
MsgJp:
そうだわ！
ちょうど貴方に紹介したい人がいるのよ

MsgEn:
Her name is Emerada
She is a woman in the south of Lynwood, in the "Lone House in the Forest"
MsgJp:
その人の名はエメラダ
リンウッドの南、《森の一軒家》にいる女性よ

MsgEn:
She is my friend
Actually, she is an unofficial job in the cathedral
She is also a teacher of the "Sorcerer"
MsgJp:
彼女は私の友人なんだけど
実は、彼女は神殿では非公式の職
《ソーサラー》の師でもあるの

MsgEn:
I occasionally introduce an Arisen that I think has potential
I'm sure you'll use your magic for good.
--that's what I'm thinking!
MsgJp:
私が見込みがあると思った覚者を
たまに紹介しているの
貴方なら、きっと魔術を良い事に使ってくれる
――そう思ってね

MsgEn:
I'll talk you through it, and if you're so inclined, you can meet with Emelada at
If you don't know where her house is, you can check it out at
《Spot Information》.
MsgJp:
話は通しておくから、その気があれば
エメラダと会ってみて
彼女の家の場所が分からなければ
《スポット情報》で確認するといいわ

MsgEn:
I'm in a bit of a bad situation
I wonder if you know that there are some abandoned houses in the forest
that are littered with carrion.
MsgJp:
ちょっとまずい状況になったの
森に、腐肉が散乱する廃屋がいくつか
あるのは知ってるかしら

MsgEn:
Each of those places has become the turf of the vicious apes
--
we chased them away a long time ago, but
they've been back for some time now.
MsgJp:
あそこはそれぞれ、凶暴なエイプ達の縄張りに
なっててね――
だいぶ前に追い払ったのだけど
いつの間にか戻ってきたらしいのよ

MsgEn:
The monkeys are called
"snarling monkeys," "ripping monkeys," and "pig-eating monkeys,"
respectively.
MsgJp:
猿達は、それぞれ
《唸り猿》《裂き猿》《豚喰い猿》って
呼ばれてるわ

MsgEn:
There are three abandoned houses in the forest that serve as their nests, so be careful when passing by
, and make sure to let everyone in the village know
MsgJp:
森に３か所ある廃屋が彼らのねぐらだから
近くを通る時は注意して
村のみんなにも伝えなきゃ

MsgEn:
--Can I have your attention, please?
There is a huge cave called "Mysree Limestone Cave", the deepest and most dangerous cave in this forest.
MsgJp:
――ちょっと聞いてくれる？
《ミスリウ鍾乳洞》っていう、この森で最も深く
危険な巨大洞窟があるんだけど

MsgEn:
Not long ago, I started hearing the
roar of a terrible beast in that neighborhood, and the earth shaking.
MsgJp:
少し前からその周辺で、恐ろしい獣の
唸り声や地響きがするようになってね

MsgEn:
The Knights who went to investigate
still haven't come back--
MsgJp:
調査に行ってくれた騎士団が
まだ戻らないのよ――

MsgEn:
I've also sent a request for help to the Temple, but
the Sentinel Corps is having a hard time
fighting the orcs.
MsgJp:
神殿にも救援要請を出しているんだけど
覚者隊はオークとの戦いでなかなか
手が回らないらしくて

MsgEn:
So, I was wondering if I could ask you to check
please--help me out.
MsgJp:
そこで、相談なんだけど
貴方に確認を頼めないかしら
お願い――、力を貸してちょうだい

MsgEn: Everyone in Lynnwood is alive and well because of you
MsgJp:
リンウッドの皆がこうしていられるのも
貴方のお陰よね

MsgEn:
There's not much I can do
you know, but I'll return the favor somehow.
I've stocked up on supply support and staked it out!
MsgJp:
私にできることなんてたかだか
知れてるだろうけど、何とか恩返しするわ
補給支援の仕入れ、張り込んだんだから！

MsgEn:
Keep up the good work.
Missouri's Braveheart
MsgJp:
今後ともよろしくね
ミスリウの勇者さん

MsgEn: I need you to do something for me.
MsgJp: 貴方にお願いしたいことがあるの

MsgEn:
――《Ancient Place of Rituals》
It seems that Ents have started appearing in that ancient ritual site, different from those in the forest.
MsgJp:
――《古の祭祀場》
あの遺跡に、森にいるのとは異なる
エントが出るようになったらしいの

MsgEn: -- if it's not a sign of bad things, it's fine.
MsgJp:
――悪いことの前兆でなければ
いいんだけど

MsgEn:
I'm a little concerned about something
I wonder if I could ask you to do some further research
When you're ready, give me a shout again.
MsgJp:
少し気になることがあるの
あなたに詳しい調査を頼めないかしら
準備ができたら、もう一度声をかけてちょうだい

MsgEn:
It's a small village, but I can at least get you ready for your trip.
Let me know if you need anything else.
MsgJp:
小さな村だが、旅の準備くらいは整えられる
必要なことがあれば言ってくれ

MsgEn:
You want to take a break?
The valley road will take some getting used to.
MsgJp:
休んでいくか？
谷道は慣れないうちは堪えるだろう

MsgEn:
It's hard to get to and from the other villages here
and supplies are not coming in as fast as we would like.
MsgJp:
ここは他の村との行き来が厳しくてな
物資の補給も思うようにいっていない

MsgEn:
If you can help, talk to Hayden at
in the back.
MsgJp:
もし手伝ってもらえるなら、奥にいる
ヘイデンに話を聞いてみてくれ

MsgEn:
If you need a break, I'll take
<VAL PRICE_INN>, what do you say?
You better not be tired.
MsgJp:
休憩なら
<VAL PRICE_INN>いただくが、どうする？
疲れは溜めないほうがいいぞ

MsgEn: Yes
MsgJp: はい

MsgEn: No
MsgJp: いいえ

MsgEn: I'll take <VAL PRICE_WEAK>for the "weakening cure", how about that?
MsgJp:
《弱化の治療》なら
<VAL PRICE_WEAK>いただこう、どうかね？

MsgEn: Yes
MsgJp: はい

MsgEn: No
MsgJp: いいえ

MsgEn:
Mm, looks like you don't need the "weakening cure"
Let me know if you need it again.
MsgJp:
うむ、《弱化の治療》は不要のようだな
必要になればまた言ってくれ

MsgEn: Welcome to Zingen, traveler!
MsgJp: ジンゲンへようこそ、旅の方

MsgEn:
Oh, and if you need a break, you can use any available bed.
The only reason this place is still going strong is because of you. 
Want to take a break?
MsgJp:
ああ、休憩なら空いてるベッドを好きに使うといい
ここが何とかやれているのもお前さんの
おかげだからな、休むかね？

MsgEn: Yes
MsgJp: はい

MsgEn: No
MsgJp: いいえ

MsgEn:
Welcome to Jingen
--I'm so glad you care about this place
even in this situation.
MsgJp:
ジンゲンへようこそ
――こんな状況になっても
ここを気にかけてくれるとは

MsgEn:
This place has demons and is inconvenient above all.
I want to move somewhere where I can live peacefully...
I can't believe I kept saying that and ended up ending my life
in Jingen.
MsgJp:
ここは魔物も出るし、何より不便だ
どこか平穏に暮らせる場所に引っ越したい――
そう言い続けて、結局ジンゲンで人生を
終えることになるなんて

MsgEn:
No matter how much the elderly complain,
nothing will change
Whatever happens, all we can do is wait quietly
MsgJp:
年寄りが騒いだところで
何も変わらんよ
どうなろうと、静かに待つしかない

MsgEn:
I'm sure you're tired after coming all this way
at least until it's time to leave
to get some rest.
MsgJp:
ここまで来て疲れたろう
せめて旅立ちの時間まで
ゆっくり休んでいくといい

MsgEn: Have you been to Dreed Castle visible from the village?
MsgJp: 村から見えるドリード城、あなたは行った？

MsgEn:
My good friend also went there
I won't go back until I find the treasure, they said with determination—
MsgJp:
私のいい人もあそこに行ってるんだ
財宝を見つけるまで戻らないって息巻いてね――

MsgEn:
I will save money and expand the shop and house!
Hmm, but there aren't many customers here
MsgJp:
しっかりお金を貯めて、店と家を大きくするの！
うーん、でもここ、お客さん少ないのよね

MsgEn:
Oh, I wonder if that person will come back soon
I earn money, so I don't care about treasure
MsgJp:
あーあ、あの人早く戻らないかしら
私が稼ぐから、財宝なんかいいのに

MsgEn:
Yes, let's make a good transaction!
As much as possible, please
MsgJp:
はぁい、いい取引をしましょう！
できればなるべくたくさんね

MsgEn:
Did you see that sky?
――Seems like there's no time left
Let's make transactions as much as possible!
MsgJp:
あの空を見た？
――もう時間がないみたい
取引できるかぎり、取引しましょう！

MsgEn:
I had all kinds of dreams
to save up money and make this place bigger
and by that time, my good man from Dorid Castle
came back and--
MsgJp:
色んな夢があったの
お金を貯めて、この店を大きくして
その頃にはドリード城から
私のいい人も帰ってきて――

MsgEn:
We've come this far.
I'll wait for that guy until the end.
MsgJp:
ここまできたんだもの
最後まであの人を待ち続けるわ

MsgEn:
Maybe raising money for
doesn't mean anything anymore--but--I'm not sure.
MsgJp:
もしかしたら、お金を集めても
もう意味が無いかも知れないけど――

MsgEn:
You like things too.
What are you doing here?
MsgJp:
あんたもモノ好きね
こんなとこ、何しに来たの

MsgEn: Ugh, I'm bored.
MsgJp: ふー、だるいわね

MsgEn:
There are a lot of places to explore, right here
, like catacombs and ruins.
MsgJp:
散策場所、多いでしょ、ここ
地下墓地とか遺跡とか

MsgEn: Are you going to go all of it?
MsgJp: あんた、全部行くの？

MsgEn: Yeah, what?
MsgJp: うん、何？

MsgEn:
You know, there's a scary story
about a place north of the village called "The Cliff Seat of the Diva"
MsgJp:
そういえばさ、怖い話があったっけ
村の北に《歌姫の崖座》っていう
場所があんの

MsgEn:
When the scary woman's voice sounded
the villagers who were outside--about half of them--were
"taken away."
MsgJp:
恐ろしげな女の声が響いた時
外に出てた村人――半分くらいが
「持って行かれた」んだってさ

MsgEn: It seems to be a story from a while ago.
MsgJp: 相当前の話らしいけどさ

MsgEn:
Ouch!　My back!
Damn, if only I could get to Kinoza's hot spring...
MsgJp:
いたたたた――！　こ、腰がっ！
くそ、キノザの湯にさえ行ければ――

MsgEn:
Hmmm, I wonder if there is a good medicine somewhere
If only my back would heal, I'd be down the valley--
MsgJp:
うーむ、どっかにいい薬はないものか
腰さえ治れば谷を降りるんだがなぁ――

MsgEn:
The scenery is nice, but I can't help but think
Jingen will be a steep road
I can't help but think that's it.
MsgJp:
景色は良いんだが、いかんせん
ジンゲンは道が険しいだろう
どうにもそれがなぁ

MsgEn: Ah, that hurts! It's throbbing in my back.
MsgJp: あぁ、いたた！　腰に響く

MsgEn:
Well, it's not going so well.
Even if you're looking for something you're looking for, a day without a harvest
can make your drink go bad...
MsgJp:
いやぁ、なかなかうまくいかねぇぜ
目当ての品を探すにも、収穫ナシの日が
続くと酒がまずくならぁ

MsgEn:
Harpy's - no, women!
They're flying around on my head
making so much noise!
MsgJp:
ハーピーの野郎――いや、女ども！
頭の上をギャーギャー飛びまわって
うるさくてかなわねぇや

MsgEn:
They attack me only when I'm climbing
!
MsgJp:
登ってる時に限って襲って
きやがるしよぉ！

MsgEn:
Sometimes in the canyon, I see a big demon.
I avoid it, as I should, but if I knock it down,
the payback seems to be huge too.
MsgJp:
たまーに渓谷で、でかい魔物を見かけるんだよな
さすがに避けて通るが、ぶっ倒したら
見返りもでかそうだよな

MsgEn: However, life is what we make of it.
MsgJp: とはいえ、命あっての物種っつーしな

MsgEn: Oh!　What do you want?
MsgJp: おう！　何か用か

MsgEn: Do you know about the Dreed Watchtower? It seems like it used to be the barracks of the White Knights several decades ago, but now it's just a complete ruin.
MsgJp:
《ドリード監視塔》は知ってっか？
何十年か前、白騎団の駐屯所だったらしいが
完全な廃墟だぜ

MsgEn:
Well, it looks like there's still some usable
stuff left
but that bastard - no, the gawking
bird women are getting in the way!
MsgJp:
ま、それなりに使えるものは残ってそう
だけどな
あの野郎――いや、ギャーギャー喚く
鳥女どもが邪魔しやがるが！

MsgEn:
The White Riders are always on the lookout for demons.
There is no need to request support from the Sentinel Corps.
MsgJp:
魔物の警戒は白騎団が常に行っている
覚者隊に応援を要請する必要はない

MsgEn: For now.
MsgJp: 今の所はな

MsgEn:
The Bertrand Plains to the north are close to the orcs' stronghold
Scouts may enter this dhow valley as well.
MsgJp:
北のバートランド平原は、オーク共の根城に近い
このダウ渓谷にも斥候が入り込むかもしれん

MsgEn: You guys watch yourselves.
MsgJp: お前達も気をつけろ

MsgEn:
I hear that Dorid Castle used to be the main castle of the White Riders
when the White Dragon Lord was in good health and Lestania was more
open than it is now.
MsgJp:
ドリード城は、元は白騎団の本丸だったと聞く
白竜様がお元気で、レスタニアが今よりも
開かれていた時代のことだ

MsgEn: Now I hear it's a den of demons.
MsgJp: 今や魔物の巣窟らしいがな

MsgEn: No particular problem.
MsgJp: 特に問題はない

MsgEn:
The White Sand Riverbanks near the village is home to many
Sulphur Lizards.
If you are an Arisen, I hope you can kill them all in one piece.
MsgJp:
村近くの《白砂河原》には
サルファーリザードが多く棲みついている
お前が覚者なら、軽くまとめて退治しておいて
ほしいものだ

MsgEn: May the blessings of The White Dragon, Lady Arisen, be with you.
MsgJp: 白竜様のご加護があらんことを

MsgEn: The radiance of Rift Crystal is always with you.
MsgJp: リムの輝きは常に貴方と共に

MsgEn: If you are reorganizing your membership, please contact me at
MsgJp:
メンバーの再編でしたら
私にお申し付けください

MsgEn: Are you looking for a traveling companion, Master Arisen?
MsgJp: 旅の同伴者をお求めでしょうか、覚者殿

MsgEn:
North of this gateway is the Bertrand Plain.
This gateway is under the control of Fort Gritten, but
Dow's Area Master, Lord Hayden, allows those who have been approved
to pass.
MsgJp:
この関所から北は《バートランド平原》だ
本関所はグリッテン砦の管理下にあるが
ダウのエリアマスター、ヘイデン殿が認めた者は
通してもよいと言われている

MsgEn:
I have a good nose.
If the smell of orcs intensifies, I'll call the fort right away.
MsgJp:
俺は鼻がいいほうでな
オークの臭いが強まればすぐ砦に連絡する

MsgEn:
I feel proud to be a barrier guard
even if thinner than a fortress, this is the keystone of
defense against the land of the north.
MsgJp:
俺は関所番であることに誇りを感じている
砦より薄くとも、ここは北の地に対する
守りの要なのだ

MsgEn: Ah, the Sentinel Corps.
MsgJp: ああ、覚者隊の者か

MsgEn:
The troopers who are granted passage through this barrier will also be
performing duties on the Bertrand Plain
MsgJp:
この関所の通行許可を得た隊士は
バートランド平原の任務も行うことに
なるだろう

MsgEn:
At that time, you will also be given permission to pass through the west corridor of "Fort Gritten"
at the same time.
Remember that
MsgJp:
その際、《グリッテン砦》西側通路の
通行許可も同時に出されるのだ
覚えておくといい

MsgEn:
Oh, Arisen!
I have something I need your help with--!
MsgJp:
ああ、覚者様！！
あなたのお力をお貸しいただきたい事が――！

MsgEn:
Above Zingen, at the highest elevation
on the dhow up the cliffs, there is a place called "The Cliff Seat of the Diva"
MsgJp:
ジンゲンの上、崖を登ったダウで最も標高の
高い所に《歌姫の崖座》と呼ばれる場所が
あるのですが――

MsgEn:
The demon bird, "Lorelei the Spectator,"
has really shown itself this time!
MsgJp:
例の魔鳥、《妖歌のローレライ》が
今度こそ本当に姿を現したのです！！

MsgEn:
Half of the people of Jingen were kidnapped,
a considerable number of sentient beings and knights lost their lives,
and the demon was finally repelled!
MsgJp:
ジンゲンの民半数を攫い
相当数の覚者と騎士が命を落とし
ようやく撃退した、かの魔物が！

MsgEn:
I can't rely on the memorandum of understanding all the time, but
if it is possible--please!
I would like you to accept my request.
MsgJp:
覚者様にばかり頼ることはできませんが
もし可能であれば――どうか！
依頼を引き受けていただきたいのです

MsgEn:
I can't thank you enough for all the
kindnesses that you hang on Jingen--
MsgJp:
あなたさまがジンゲンに掛けて下さる
お心遣いの数々――
感謝してもしきれません

MsgEn:
You are truly
the blessing that the White Dragon has sent to us!
MsgJp:
あなたこそまさに
白竜様が我々に遣わして下さった恵みです

MsgEn:
It's nothing to compare.
We have prepared the best thank you we can.
The people of Jingen are with you.
MsgJp:
比べられるものではありませんが
我々にできる精一杯の礼を用意しました
ジンゲンの民は、あなたと共に

MsgEn:
Since you have been staying in our village
it seems as if the people's faces have brightened!
MsgJp:
あなたさまが村に滞在されるようになって
民の表情も明るくなったかのようです

MsgEn:
Please let this be--
and keep up the good work!
MsgJp:
どうか、これを――
そして今後もよろしくお願いいたします

MsgEn:
Thank you
for accepting the Village's request
It's a small gesture of gratitude from us!
MsgJp:
村の依頼を引き受けて下さり
ありがとうございます
心ばかりですが、我々からの礼でございます

MsgEn:
We thought it would be nice to do something for you, our ever loyal friend
and we have prepared this for you.
MsgJp:
いつも懇意にして下さるあなたさまに
何かできることはないかと思い
我々でこれを用意いたしました

MsgEn: We always welcome you.
MsgJp: いつでもあなたを歓迎いたします

MsgEn:
Thank you for your frequent visits
I don't know if this is a compliment, but
I have prepared this for you.
MsgJp:
たびたびご足労をお掛けします
ねぎらいとなるか分かりませんが
これを用意いたしました

MsgEn: Please accept it.
MsgJp: どうかお受け取りください

MsgEn:
Must have been tough on the valley roads.
Boring stuff, but here's a thank you for stopping by and
MsgJp:
谷道は厳しかったでしょう
つまらぬ物ですが、こちらは立ち寄って
いただいたお礼です

MsgEn:
Welcome to the long way to
What is it like to visit the Dow Valley?
MsgJp:
遠路はるばるようこそ
ダウ渓谷へはどのような？

MsgEn:
Coniferous forests in a beautiful valley
The appearance of Dorid Castle--
MsgJp:
美しい渓谷に針葉樹林
ドリード城の佇まい――

MsgEn:
The Dow Valley is a beautiful place
Please help us help you
for the sake of Gingen!
MsgJp:
ダウ渓谷は美しい土地です
どうかジンゲンのため、あなたさまのお力を
お貸し下さい

MsgEn: On top of the valley mountain, a young man named Chester lives alone
MsgJp:
谷山の上には、チェスターという青年が
一人で暮らしています

MsgEn:
Quite a strange one, but you'll find
no one more skilled in acrobatics!
MsgJp:
相当の変わり者ですが、軽業の技術で
右に出る者はいません

MsgEn:
If you love canyons,
you two should get along well.
MsgJp:
あなたが渓谷を愛する方であれば
あの者と気が合う事でしょう

MsgEn:
The sound of waterfalls, sparse clouds, and lush greenery.
Were it not for the threat of the monsters,
this would be a truly peaceful village.
MsgJp:
滝の水音に薄い雲、豊かな緑
魔物の脅威さえなければ、ここは実に
穏やかな村なのですが

MsgEn:
Welcome!
There is something I must tell you.
MsgJp:
ようこそいらっしゃいました
お伝えすべきことがあるのです

MsgEn:
The "Sub Portcrystals" placed in this Dowe Valley
have all been released for you!
MsgJp:
このダウ渓谷に置かれた《辺境の礎》が
全てあなたさまのために解放されました

MsgEn:
I'm told that this is a consideration in recognition of your exceptional work in this area
by the Temple.
MsgJp:
この辺りでのあなたさまの格別の働きを
神殿が評価しての配慮とのことです

MsgEn:
Please take this opportunity to visit
and
to see every detail of this beautiful Dow Valley nature!
MsgJp:
どうぞ、これを機会に
この美しいダウ渓谷の自然を
すみずみまでご覧ください

MsgEn:
Oh, Lord Sentient!
Please help us--
It is a crisis in the village of Jingen!
MsgJp:
ああ、覚者様！
どうかお力をお貸しください――
ジンゲンの村の危機なのです

MsgEn:
In fact, there has been a spate of missing children
who have been playing outside for a little while now!
MsgJp:
実は、少し前から外で遊んでいた子供が
行方不明になる事件が相次ぎました

MsgEn:
Unable to bear it, the parents and older siblings
and even some travelers who were there
set off to search with a number of others, but
finally none of them returned...
MsgJp:
たまりかねた親たち、年かさの兄弟たち
さらには居合わせた旅の方までが
何人も連れ立って捜索へと旅立ったのですが
ついに一人も戻らず――

MsgEn:
Then, the other day, near Kataconve
Numerous stone statues were discovered
Lifelike figures, as if fleeing from something.
MsgJp:
そして先日、カタコンベ近くで
何体もの石像が発見されました
生生しい、何かから逃げ惑うような姿勢のものが――

MsgEn:
Could it be that those who went on the search
were turned into stone?
I can't help but feel that a great threat is looming over this village
.
MsgJp:
あれは捜索に出た者たちが
石にされたものではないでしょうか――
この村に大きな脅威が迫っているのではと
気が気ではありません

MsgEn:
Dear Arisen,
Could you please investigate once to see if there are any dangerous demons lurking in that area.
Please give it some thought--
MsgJp:
覚者さま
あの辺りに危険な魔物が潜んでいないか
一度調査していただけないでしょうか
何卒ご一考のほどを――

MsgEn: Lord Arisen, actually--
MsgJp: 覚者様、実は――

MsgEn:
An "Abandoned Well" has been discovered near the
location where you previously took down a herd of gargoyles!
MsgJp:
以前、ガーゴイルの群れを討伐してくださった
場所の近くに《見捨てられた井戸》が発見されました

MsgEn:
They also found a
stone statue with it, in a posture as if it were trying to escape from inside!
MsgJp:
まるで中から逃げ出そうとしているような姿勢の
石像も一緒に見つかったのです

MsgEn:
Maybe the stone statues in that area were not gargoyles
but were trying to escape
from some horrible demon in the well!
MsgJp:
もしかすると、あの辺りの石像はガーゴイルではなく
井戸の中にいる何か恐ろしい魔物から
逃げようとしていたのかも知れません

MsgEn:
The crisis in this village may not have
gone away yet--
MsgJp:
この村の危機は
まだ去っていないのでは――

MsgEn: Arisen, please forgive the repeated requests.
MsgJp: 覚者様、度重なる依頼をお許しください――

MsgEn:
As a matter of fact, someone who approached the Abandoned Well
claimed to have heard what sounded like human voices
coming from the well.
MsgJp:
実は、《見捨てられた井戸》に近づいた者が
井戸から人の声のような物音が
聞こえた、と申すのです

MsgEn:
Of course, it could very well be the voice of a demon.
We are not giving up at this point.
Please, go check the depths of the well.
MsgJp:
もちろん魔物の声である可能性も大いにありますが
このままでは我々も諦めがつきません
どうか、井戸の奥を確かめてきては
いただけないでしょうか

MsgEn:
If you accept, please contact us at
and we'll explain it to you in more detail.
MsgJp:
引き受けてくださるならば、
あらためて詳しくご説明いたします

MsgEn:
You are truly
the blessing that the White Dragon has sent to us!
MsgJp:
あなたこそまさに
白竜様が我々に遣わして下さった恵みです

MsgEn:
Your kindness has saved our village many times
and we can never thank you enough
MsgJp:
あなたさまからの数々お心遣いによって
この村は幾度となく救われております
感謝してもしきれません

MsgEn:
We're not quite there yet, but
will provide you with as many supplies as we can gather at this time.
The people of Jingen will continue to be with you.
MsgJp:
まだまだ至りませんが
現時点で集めうる限りの支給品をご用意いたします
ジンゲンの民は、これからもあなたさまと共に

MsgEn: Have you already seen this area?
MsgJp: このあたりはすでにごらん頂けましたか？

MsgEn:
It flourished as the seat of Dorid Castle
a long time ago--
MsgJp:
ドリード城の城下として栄えたのは
はるか昔――

MsgEn: With the rise of the orcs, there are now very few people who live in
MsgJp:
オークどもの台頭で今や住む者も
ごくわずか――

MsgEn:
Therefore, this Gingen and the surrounding area is a district that should be
abandoned!
MsgJp:
よって、このジンゲンとその周辺は
見捨てられても仕方のない地区です

MsgEn:
However, many people come to visit
because they are attracted by the landscape that combines the harshness of the place -
- and the beauty of its ruggedness.
MsgJp:
しかしながら、突き放すような厳しさ――
そして険しさ故の美が入り混じる風景に心ひかれ
訪ね来る人々も少なくありません

MsgEn:
We live here and devote ourselves to
helping the Hakuryu-sama by providing convenience to such people.
MsgJp:
そんな人々に便宜を提供することで
白竜様のお役に立とうと
我々はここに暮らし、精進しております

MsgEn:
I am the head of Gingen--
I am Hayden, Area Master of the Dow Valley
Please get to know me.
MsgJp:
わたくしはジンゲンの長――
ダウ渓谷のエリアマスター、ヘイデンと申します
どうぞお見知りおきを

MsgEn: Thank you for accepting the village's request.
MsgJp:
村の依頼を引き受けて下さり
ありがとうございます

MsgEn: We will continue to support the Arisen with supplies.
MsgJp:
今後は、覚者様を物資面にて
支援させていただきます

MsgEn: - There is something I should inform the esteemed Arisen about.
MsgJp:
――覚者様にお知らせすべき
ことがあるのです

MsgEn:
On the riverbank down from the village, the White Sand River,
there have been a number of sightings of large, ferocious large sulphurs
in recent days.
MsgJp:
村から降りた川べり、《白砂河原》で
このところ、凶暴で大きなラージサルファーの
目撃が相次いでおりまして

MsgEn: I was on guard against a "Sulfur Tiger-Tail".
MsgJp:
《タイガーテール・サルファー》と呼び
警戒をしておりました

MsgEn:
If you go down to the riverbank,
be very careful!
MsgJp:
もし河原へ下りる時は、
十分注意なさることです

MsgEn: It is said that the underground catacombs near Dreed Castle were a burial place for sinners in ancient times.
MsgJp:
――地下墓地、《カタコンベ》
ドリード城近くにある地下墓地は旧時代
罪人を葬る場所であったと言われています

MsgEn:
The power of the White Dragon Master has weakened
and the strange miasma that has been accumulating
in recent years seems to have become--
MsgJp:
白竜様のお力が弱まり
近年妙に瘴気が溜まりやすくなって
しまっている様子――

MsgEn:
So we have decided to open the entrance once
although it is dangerous!
MsgJp:
そこで、危険ではありますが
一度入り口を開放することにいたしました

MsgEn:
If you'd like to explore, please go to
I'm not going to actively encourage you to do so.
MsgJp:
もし、探索をされるのでしたらどうぞ
積極的に私から勧めはいたしませんが

MsgEn:
Did you know that there is a
small tower west of Dow called the "Dorid Watchtower"?
MsgJp:
ダウの西に、《ドリード監視塔》という
小塔があるのはご存知ですか

MsgEn:
一昔前までは、現役の騎士団詰め所でも
あった場所なのですが
今やスノーハーピーが縄張りとする危険地帯
MsgJp:
一昔前までは、現役の騎士団詰め所でも
あった場所なのですが
今やスノーハーピーが縄張りとする危険地帯

MsgEn:
この調子で増えられれば
いずれジンゲンにも彼女らが飛来するのは
明白です
MsgJp:
この調子で増えられれば
いずれジンゲンにも彼女らが飛来するのは
明白です

MsgEn:
どうか、群れの中核をなす
《スノーグーラー・ハーピー》を討伐して
くださいませんか
MsgJp:
どうか、群れの中核をなす
《スノーグーラー・ハーピー》を討伐して
くださいませんか

MsgEn:
あなた様が村に滞在されるようになって
民の表情も明るくなった気がいたします
MsgJp:
あなた様が村に滞在されるようになって
民の表情も明るくなった気がいたします

MsgEn:
It's not a great support item, but
we will try to improve it.
Thank you for your continued support!
MsgJp:
大した支援品ではありませんが
改善の努力をしますので
今後もよろしくお願いいたします

MsgEn:
The Arisen now knows the Dowe Valley quite well--
As I told you before, I would like to introduce someone to you.
MsgJp:
覚者様は、いまや相当にダウ渓谷を
よく知る方――
以前お話したとおり、ある人物を紹介
したいのです

MsgEn:
His name is Chester
a position not handed down in the Temple
a young man skilled in the art of the Seeker.
MsgJp:
その者の名はチェスター
神殿では伝えられていない職
《シーカー》の技術に長けた若者です

MsgEn:
Quick gestures using daggers and
leaping techniques with ropes
MsgJp:
ダガ―を駆使する素早い身ごなしと
ロープを用いた跳躍術

MsgEn:
Because of its characteristics, it is a technique favored by
ruffians such as assassins and thieves, but
you can use it for good!
MsgJp:
その特性から、暗殺者や盗賊といった
ならず者が好む技術ではありますが
あなたであれば善く使うことができるはず

MsgEn:
When the time comes for you to further hone your skills as a Seeker, please visit Chester, the young man in the "House in the Valley".
I'm sure he will be able to help you.
MsgJp:
《シーカー》としてさらに腕を磨かれる時が来れば
《渓谷の一軒家》に居る青年、チェスターを
お訪ねください
きっと彼が力となってくれるでしょう

MsgEn:
I've already talked to you about the Arisen.
You may want to check 《Spot Information》
for the location of the Arisen's residence.
MsgJp:
覚者様についてはすでに話を通しておきました
住居の場所については、《スポット情報》で
確認されるとよいでしょう

MsgEn: There's something I've been meaning to bring up--
MsgJp:
そろそろ切り出そうと思っていたことが
ありまして――

MsgEn:
You have considerable skills.
They should be put to use not only to protect Dowe,
but for the good of as many as possible.
MsgJp:
あなたは相当の実力をお持ちです
それは、このダウを守るためではなく
より多くの人々のため活かされるべき――

MsgEn:
I have come to believe that it is precisely to investigate the orc-occupied
Bertland, north of Fort Gritten, that we need the help of the Arisen!
MsgJp:
グリッテン砦の北、オークが占領する
バートランドの調査にこそ、覚者様の力が
必要であると思うようになったのです

MsgEn:
Of course, this is my own selfish
I spoke to Nommel at the customs house and told him to open a
path to Bertrand
in exchange for the risk of an orc invasion.
MsgJp:
もちろん、これは私の手前勝手
関所のノーメルに話を通し、バートランドへの
路を開けるよう伝えておきました
オーク侵入の危険と引き換えですが

MsgEn:
From either the "Betland East Side" or "The West Passage of Fort Gritten",
you can get to Betland from either of them.
MsgJp:
《バートランド東関所》、そして
《グリッテン砦の西側通路》どちらからでも
バートランドへ行く事ができるでしょう

MsgEn:
I'll leave it up to you to decide if you want to go ahead.
Please make a good decision.
MsgJp:
先に行かれるかどうかは、お任せします
どうぞよき判断を

MsgEn: ――I'm sorry, Lord Arisen, there's something I would like to ask of you.
MsgJp:
――恐れ入りますが覚者様
あなたにぜひお願いしたいことがあるのです

MsgEn:
Have you heard about the large natural cave in the canyon
《Wind Sounding Cave》?
MsgJp:
渓谷にある大きな自然洞
《風鳴り洞窟》のことはご存知でしょうか？

MsgEn:
There, it was once the
lair of a terrifying
monster, in which many of Jingen's people fell victim to.
MsgJp:
あそこはかつて、ある恐ろしい魔物の
住処でもあったのです
このジンゲンの民の多くが犠牲になりました

MsgEn:
It was repulsed and disappeared, but
there are reports that the monster may have returned
and if true, that would be a big deal!
MsgJp:
撃退され姿を消していたのですが
かの魔物が再来したかもしれぬとの
報せがあり、事実であれば一大事

MsgEn:
I apologize, Arisen
would you be able to confirm its authenticity?
We will make a formal request for it ――
MsgJp:
申し訳ありませんが覚者様
その真偽を確かめてはいただけないでしょうか
正式に依頼いたしますので――

MsgEn:
I can't thank you enough for all the
kindnesses that you hang on Jingen--
MsgJp:
あなたさまがジンゲンに掛けて下さる
お心遣いの数々――
感謝してもしきれません

MsgEn:
You are truly
the blessing that the White Dragon has sent to us!
MsgJp:
あなたこそまさに
白竜様が我々に遣わして下さった恵みです

MsgEn:
Although it cannot be compared
We have prepared our utmost gratitude that we can offer
The people of Jingen will continue to stand with you.
MsgJp:
比べられるものではありませんが
我々にできる精一杯の礼を用意しました
ジンゲンの民は、これからもあなたと共に

MsgEn:
Oh, Arisen-sama
, Did you come to investigate the 'Vortex of Destruction'?
MsgJp:
おお、覚者様
《滅びの渦》の調査にいらしたのですか？

MsgEn:
Even though there are only a few Seekers left in Jingen
, surprisingly, none of them were afraid of the sky and fled
MsgJp:
数少ないジンゲンの民ですが
意外にも、あの空を恐れて
逃げだすものはおりませんでした

MsgEn: From the beginning, it seems that there were some who couldn't leave Jingen due to their attachment
MsgJp:
元より、このジンゲンを離れられぬ
愛着のある者が残っていたのでしょう

MsgEn:
It may be better to give up
but again I can't help but think that you
can save us
MsgJp:
諦めた方が良いのやもしれません
しかし、此度もあなたさまならば
お救いくださるのではと
思わずにいられないのです

MsgEn: You are the blessing sent by the dragon
MsgJp: あなたさまこそ、竜が遣わされた恵み

MsgEn:
Whatever the outcome,
I will not regret
my choice to believe in you!
MsgJp:
どのような結果になろうとも
あなたを信じるという選択を
後悔はいたしません

MsgEn:
We've got some good stuff from the Bordo
Take a look!
I'll give you a discount!
MsgJp:
ボルドで採れたいい品が揃ってるよ
見てっておくれよ！
安くしとくからさ！

MsgEn:
Hey, hey, did you know?
Kinoza Kosen has three hot springs with different qualities.
Go ahead and take a bath, your skin will be smooth and smooth!
MsgJp:
ねぇねぇ、知ってるかい？
キノザ鉱泉には泉質が違う３つの温泉があるんだよ
入っていきなよ、お肌スベスベになるよ！

MsgEn:
There's a place called the Volden Large Tunnels, located halfway up the mountain. 
It was closed down because giants were appearing, but there are still many people who go there to mine ores.
MsgJp:
《ボルド大坑道》ってのが、山の中腹にあるのさ
巨人だかが出るってんで閉鎖されちまったが
それでも鉱石掘りにいく連中は今も多いんだよ

MsgEn:
Welcome!
It's a Bordo specialty!
MsgJp:
いらっしゃい！
ボルドの名産品だよ！

MsgEn:
Good weapons need good ore.
It's obvious!
MsgJp:
良い武器には良い鉱石が要る
当たり前のことだがな！

MsgEn: Compromising on ingredients means compromising on the outcome.
MsgJp: 材料への妥協は出来への妥協だ

MsgEn:
If you aim to be a top-notch warrior,
aim for top-notch weapons.
MsgJp:
お前が一流の戦士を目指すなら
武器も一流を目指せ

MsgEn:
But what's important is to know your place.
Don't forget that.
MsgJp:
だが、肝心なのは身分相応ってやつだ
それを忘れるなよ

MsgEn:
Putting your life at stake to wield your weapon,
you, the brave warrior.
MsgJp:
命を賭けて武器を打ち、命を賭けた勇士が
それを振るう

MsgEn: Hahaha, can there be anything more worthwhile than this!
MsgJp: ――フフ、これ以上のやり甲斐があろうか！

MsgEn:
Oh, you're asking for a blacksmith?
Let's talk about it.
MsgJp:
ああ、鍛冶の依頼か？
話を聞こう

MsgEn: Arisen, Kinoza is not as busy as the White Dragon Temple, but it's still busy, right?
MsgJp:
覚者さん、キノザは白竜神殿ほどじゃ
ないにしろ賑やかだろ？

MsgEn:
There are a lot of business opportunities
in that kind of place.
MsgJp:
そういうとこにゃ、商売のチャンスも
多いってことさ

MsgEn:
Whether you are going to the mine or to the forest
the more tools you have, the better!
MsgJp:
鉱山へ行くにも森方面へ行くにも
なんせ道具は多い方がいい！

MsgEn:
If you're out, go to
and buy a bunch of stuff.
MsgJp:
切らしてるなら補充していきな
じゃんじゃん買ってってくれ

MsgEn:
Roy from the big bathhouse sometimes gets some strange
items
I wonder where the heck he gets them from
MsgJp:
大浴場のロイは、たまーに奇妙な品を
仕入れてくるんだが
一体ありゃ、どっから手に入れてるんだろなぁ

MsgEn: Welcome!
MsgJp: よお、らっしゃい！

MsgEn: Oh, are you staying over? In that case, it's <VAL PRICE_INN>. Feel free to use the Tavern as well.
MsgJp:
あ、泊ってく？　だったら
<VAL PRICE_INN>よ
もちろん酒場も自由に使ってね

MsgEn: Yes
MsgJp: はい

MsgEn: No
MsgJp: いいえ

MsgEn:
Soak in the hot springs, relax,
have a drink and have a good rest!
Mountain diggers and adventurers are welcome at our place!
MsgJp:
温泉浸かってゆっくりしてさ
酒のんで楽しく休んでいくといいわよ！
山掘りも冒険者も、うちは大歓迎よ！

MsgEn:
Please try their signature dishes too!
Kinoza uses hot springs in their cooking as well.
You need to get plenty of energy!
MsgJp:
自慢の料理も食べていってね！
キノザは料理にも温泉を使ってるんだから
たっぷり元気つけてもらわなきゃ！

MsgEn:
If you're going to the big tunnels, be very careful.
